name: DUAL FINISH ‚Äì Multi-tasking Longwear Powder Foundation
about: What it is:A sheer-to-full-coverage powder foundation has a versatile, mattifying, and long-wearing finish that is perfect for all skin types, including oily..Coverage:Full.Finish:Matte.Formulation:Pressed Powder.Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.What Else You Need to Know:This versatile matte foundation is buildable, long-lasting, and can be used wet or dry. The face powder is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, covering imperfections, and as a sheer-coverage setting powder. The lightweight formula does not cake and offers a shine-free, natural look.
ingredients: Talc, Mineral Oil, Squalane, Zinc Laurate, Stearic Acid, Linalool, Geraniol, Glyceryl Stearate, Triethanolamine, Isoeugenol, Cholesterol, Coumarin, Aluminum Myristates/Palmitates, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Limonene, Lanolin, Hydroxycitronellal, Petrolatum, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Fragrance, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylparaben, May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-May be applied wet with a sponge or dry with a makeup brush or powder puff..-For a sheer, natural-matte finish, apply over daytime moisturizer or makeup primer with the enclosed powder puff or
it on with a makeup brush..-For full-coverage matte foundation makeup, blend or
product onto skin with a damp sponge..-When using as a dry pressed powder, this powder foundation works well over any Lanc√¥me liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am not sure if I like this or not.  My long time Aveda dual powder that I used for years is no longer available (due to discontinued - really Aveda why? ) and I am lost at what to replace it with.  I usually used two Aveda dual powders that fit side by side in a compact holder (lighter for under eyes and darker for my face) but thinking the shade I got would work under eyes and go a shader up for face but I am still trying to figure out to return or repurchase a darker shade as well.  I really didn't like the last of the powder, and it left a shine halfway through the day.  Then  I would have two compacts.  If anyone used to use Aveda please let me know what you have made a switch to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have use this foundation powder by years. I have tested anothers ( estee lauder, fenty etc‚Ä¶) buy I always come back with Lancome. Full coverage, flawless and buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was not one of my favorites.  I love, love, love Lancome and wear their foundation and eye shadow.  I tried using this alone, as full coverage on the weekends, but it didn't work for me.  I used a wet sponge. I get more coverage using Fit Me powder and nothing else.  However, it did work well for me as a dry powder over foundation.  Maybe I needed a darker shade but I won't buy this product again, especially not for $50.  I bought 520 Suede (W) which doesn't appear to be available anymore.

reviews.review_title: More like a setting powder than a foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations since there were so many good reviews, but honestly was very disappointed.  Just for background, I am in my 20s, have a VERY oily nose, and normal skin everywhere else.   First, as soon as I open the box, the scent of baby powder was SO strong. I applied one side with a brush, and the other using the sponge it came with.   PROS: -After 5 minutes, I did notice my pores were gone, all blurred.  CONS: -The scent started to give me a headache. It doesn't wear off until an hour after application  -Both sides (sponge & brush) barley had coverage. The sponge offered a little more coverage, but still barely any. -The product was nearly gone after an hour and a half.  -The product did bunch around my nostril areas  Overall, this product seems more like a setting powder rather than a FOUNDATION powder. I would not even call this a foundation powder. So if you're looking for a product that will blur pores, set your liquid foundations, this is perfect. But if you're like me, looking for a quick powder foundation to apply when in a rush, or going to a place you just want a quick natural fix-up, this is NOT the one for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome has always been my favorite. I cannot say enough great things about this powder foundation. It is beautiful and smooth on my skin. It is long-lasting and doesn't feel heavy. It evens out my skin tone and smooths away blemishes. I have large pores and this foundation evens out my pores to give me a wonderful finish. There is a light scent when it is first applied but that goes away within a few minutes. There are so many shades to choose from so you are sure to find your perfect skin tone match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage!! Have been using Lancome since I was young. Love the results. Love the scent !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is still the best fonishing powder on the market.. Covers by itself or worn over a base. Flawless skin for certain. I have used for many years. At least 10. I put it on with a soft full brush and voila. Undetectable. Cannot live wthout it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder foundation smells exactly like my mother's purse in the 1990s. That's a weird association, and frankly this product has a weird smell (kind of like clay and drug store mixed together), but the results are worth it. It blends smoothly and matches my skin tone very well. It doesn't get all chalky/crumbly within a couple months like every other powder foundation I've ever tried. Forgive the odd odor and just put it on your face already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Best foundation powder. Oldie but a goodie.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried all the new foundation powders: MUFE, Urban Decay, Fenty, One Size, MAC. This one beats them all. The only one that was close was MUFE, but Lancome lasts longer and smooths better. Also, Lancome is surprisingly the most cost-effective because it contains twice (nearly three times) as much product as its competitors. There is a strong scent, but I find that it disappears after a few minutes. Please never discontinue this gem, Lancome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ladies I would go 1 shade lighter because this does Oxidize obviously depends on ur skin mine is combo slightly more towards oily so it def did oxidize on me. Over all a good powder dual is always a plus. Has fragrance so not for u if u don‚Äôt like heavy fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love powder foundation and this is my new favorite!  The formula is thin and lightweight and even when built up to full coverage, it never looks dry, cakey or heavy.  It doesn't cling to dry patches, both powder and cream products blend beautifully on top and a light mist of setting spray keeps it looking great for at least 7 hrs.  There is a slight floral fragrance but I don't notice it after application and it's never irritated my ultra sensitive and reactive skin.  In terms of shade matches, although 90 and 100 have the same level of lightness, I prefer the slightly cool undertone of 100 to the true neutral of 90.  I can't recommend this enough and think it will work on a variety of skin types. **For reference, I'm 41 with combo dry skin and my best foundation matches are MAC NW10, Estee Lauder DW in 1C0 Shell, YSL All Hours in BR10 and Fenty 120

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

Lanc√¥me has never let me down and this powder is no exception!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: I buy it for the color

So far this is the only POWDER foundation I have come across that actually matches my skin (Fenty has liquid foundation that matches). Having said all that, I think the price is too high & the formula/coverage is good but I like Clinique‚Äôs coverage better.... So if you are having trouble finding your color, maybe try this product. Otherwise, save some money and buy cheaper....

I still gave it a three because the color is gorgeous, I use the liquid version as well and nothing beats the way this makes your complexion look. If you can get past the smell, you'll love this. Unfortunately, I don't think I'll be able to. The price tag is so big I'll definitely have to go through the hassle of returning it. Pretty bummed, I love it so much, its just the smell! :(

reviews.review_text: Ever since I first used this, it's the only powder I use! It makes my skin feel AND look so soft. Only have two problems using this: you have to make sure your skin is moisturized before applying or else it can make you skin look dry, and it breaks very easily if you drop it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this so I would have another option instead of the liquid version. The coverage was great but I experienced breakouts. When I first put it on, I noticed the perfumed smell. Not a big deal, I put it on. I started to have a few pimples on my chin.  Then a few on my check area. I stopped wearing makeup and just did my cleansing and moisturizing steps. The bumps decreased.   I didn't realize it was the powder until I put it on again. The bumps that had decreased flaired up again. A few new ones appeared. I'll stick with the liquid version and consider getting another powder foundation that I can use for other days.  For me,  the coverage wasn't worth the breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Always looks great, regardless of one's age

Hope Lancome continues to make this product fo many  years to come.

reviews.review_text: I used the shade finder in the Sephora app. Oh my god this is so dark  I can‚Äôt even use it. I do love the Santa smells very powdery but I wish it were more close to my color for you to fix your shade finder because it‚Äôs  way off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After finally getting rid of the horrible acne on my face and going bare face for over a year I decided to try something completely different then what I was used to. I wanted something quick and easy to apply so I looked into powder foundation and was kind of nervous to try something because I love a natural look and didn‚Äôt want to look powdery. I‚Äôve been using this foundation for 4 months now and I‚Äôm completely obsessed with it. Looks super natural, I don‚Äôt need any touch ups

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! It looks perfect on my skin, I am using it 2 months ago!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been against powders - I have always felt that they can't do the job I need. I have second degree burns on my cheeks from a sunburn 14 years ago. I want to go without makeup, but I'm still self-conscious about my cheeks.  I went into Sephora and Holly changed my life with this product! I cannot believe how well this covers. I have been caking my face with liquid foundation for YEARS trying to cover my red cheeks, only to still have to use blush.  I use the included pad to apply over my primer, and I let it set for 3-5 minutes before brushing off any additional product. I cannot believe how well this product stays, how buildable it is for being a powder, and how incredible it makes my skin look. My skin gets dry during the fall/winter months, and this hasn't dried my skin out yet.   It does definitely have a distinct smell - it reminds me of my grandmother. The smell fades after the first 30 minutes, and generally a person would need to be directly next to your skin to tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that the shade I chose is a 100000% perfect color match for me. I wish it offered a little more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder foundation does amazing stuff to my skin. My skin looks so smooth and flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! The finish when blended with water on a fat brush is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An associate helped me find a new powder foundation that would match my skin tone. This was a perfect match so I purchased it. When I got home and went to use it for the first time, I was smacked in the face by an overwhelming fragrance from the product. I used the powder to give it a fair shot but I could smell it on my face all day. The sample in store must have lost its fragrance because I did not notice one when I tried it there. I couldn‚Äôt handle the perfumed aroma and had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

Fragrance adds zero skin benefit and is known to irritate sensitive skin - and the fragrance in this makeup is particularly strong.  So disappointed because the powder itself is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using this for over 20 years.  It‚Äôs great for minimal makeup days (like today when I woke up late).  Just throw this on and go.  No fussing with brushes and liquid foundation.  Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

It instantly mattes my skin and blurs my pores   even when I have a zit or two I don't even need to use a concealer because this does an amazing job eliminating redness. I typically use a BB cream under this and only have to touch up my forehead for oiliness at the end of the day before going out in the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My ultimate go-to. Will never need another foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice powder but I just can‚Äôt get past the heavy perfumed smell. It lingered for an awfully long time after powdering and made my nose and throat itch. Sadly, it will be going back.

reviews.review_text: It's okay.  I have combination skin with a very oily and red t-zone. But the powder doesn't really stay on my oily t-zone.  I have to touch up constantly and it cakes in some places.  The powder also has a heavy fragrance which reminds me of the makeup my grandmother used to wear - I'm used to it now, but it's still not pleasant.  All in all, it's fine, not the worst I've ever used, but I won't be buying it again after this one is finished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder for years. It is a great product that covers up like a foundation and evens out skin tone. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I do have to reapply throughout the day, but I attribute this to my extreme oily skin, not the product (I have to reapply any and all products I use, even those formulated for oily skin).

reviews.review_title: I keep returning to this powder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try a different brand of makeup and picked this one because it‚Äôs a big name brand and the mostly positive reviews. I am totally regretting my choice. The other thing that I dislike is the smell. Others have commented on this but since I‚Äôm usually tolerant I didn‚Äôt seriously consider them. That was a big mistake. The scent is horrible and hard to avoid because it‚Äôs on my face so I keep smelling it all morning until it dissipates. This really put me off trying anything new. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is still my Holy Grail although I keep looking for new things yet nothing really ever comes close, mainly because this applies perfectly in literally moments. Perfect weightless, natural looking foundation with varying coverage from light to the fullest. It is best sponged on dry, using the thicker of the 2 sponges included. It even covers my redness and scarring with no concealer or color corrector needed! It applies in seconds with no blending time. I use spreading motions for basic all over coverage (even a perfect base for eyes!) and a blotting motion with the sponge on little spots that need extra concealing. The shades are so natural, never cake-y and sweat-proof. If I have streaks from another foundation such as a liquid, I can use this to blend it out. I rarely have to blot but if I do, then the sleek packaging is nice and it acts as a powder. I used to hate powder foundations but this changed my mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Dual finish has always been my go to powder whether alone or with foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I typically like Lanc√¥me products. This powder has an overwhelming perfume smell, lack of coverage and caused me to break out. The powder literally smells like someone sprayed perfume on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite makeup product ever. Smells so good, offers great coverage. It just makes me look awesome, and it will work for you too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: You can wear this as a light powder or dampen it for heavier coverage.  Shades are extremely forgiving.  I have more of a natural oil that peaks through during the day. I had no idea about skin prep, primers,  etc. when I started wearing this 30 years ago. I used the sponge that came with it. I stopped wearing it because it was clinging to the fine hairs on my face as I've gotten older.  I was ignorant to the technique of just using a setting spray and tapping into the skin with a wet sponge.  But, it works  well.  It's very good over bigger pores and T-zones.  It wears un-noticeably throughout the day if you tend to touch your face. I feel it's too heavy over a liquid.  I use it for fast makeup looks.

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. I really, truly did. It doesn't go away, in fact if anything it lingers ALL DAY, to the point that when I wear it I find myself self-consciously paying attention to people I interact with for signs that they can smell it, too. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I get near full coverage with this method and can add a second layer to cover my particularly rosey cheeks if I want to. The product doesn't seem to settle in my lines, and doesn't wear off or oxidize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely do reviews but this one is must. After MUFE discontinued their powder foundation recently, changing it some other iteration that I don't like, I tried this. Far superior to any other powder foundation. It's buildable, provides good coverage, and I'm fair with pink undertones;  I have a lot of redness and blotchiness that needs covering. Where this product is superior however is its staying power. I apply twice per day, and it takes me right through the evening hours with no touch ups. The colour matching is superb (and really true to life on Sephora's site), and the scent is signature Lanc√¥me. This is my new go-to daily foundation and I highly recommend it as an lighter alternative to liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Wish it could be fragrance free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It's easy to apply and doesn't settle into the fine lines on my forehead like liquid foundations. I use a primer before applying it, and only need a touch up if I go out after work; it doesn't smear or flake off, and it doesn't dry  out my sensitive dry skin. I've found it to be a great value because I only need a little bit to smooth out my complexion. I've had this compact now for 9 weeks; I use it every day and the brush hasn't even made a mark on the powder. A sales associate taught me to use a flat-top brush to press on to the powder, then press/slightly twirl the brush on my skin. You will love it!

reviews.review_title: The ONLY Pressed Powder I Use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ONLY presser powder I use. I‚Äôve been using Dual Finish for easily 10+ years now. My mom, a former Lanc√¥me lady, has wore this powder foundation for probably 30 years and she got me hooked when I was in high school. I had extremely oily skin and this powder would contain my oil for a good part of the day without a primer, without a matte foundation. Now that I‚Äôm on acne medication, my skin is more combo and the Dual Finish still works like a dream. It does not cling to my dry spots in the winter, nor does it break apart in the humid summer months. I will say it‚Äôs NOT sweat proof (but what is). On weekends, I use Dual Finish as a finishing powder over my foundation and translucent powder and it does not look cakey. It sits beautifully on the skin. I highly recommend Dual Finish for anyone of any skin type.

I have not experienced any cracking, patching, melting with this even in hot weather. I am dry on my cheeks and usually an oily T- zone but this stays in place with my primer. I hope if they don't discontinue or change the formula. Easy goof proof and great results.

reviews.review_title: The best compact I've ever used!

It works so well on its own or with my liquid foundations and tinted moisturizers. The packaging is nice and sleek as well. The scent doesn't bother me as much, but I can see how it would bother others. Overall, Lanc√¥me does such a great job with their shade range and formulas for their base products!

This was definitely air light and I couldn't feel it on my face, but the coverage was just kind of meh. I didn't want to build up more product as I was already able to see it on my skin. reviews.review_title: Long live the days of flawless skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this product to apply overtop my liquid foundation. I soon found out that I can use it all on it's own. It surprised me with its coverage but it's not thick nor does it cake up after long sweaty days. I don't like heavy makeup on my face-I just wanted something that is quick to apply and minimizes redness, this product does that. It's the first powder I've bought where I've used it to the bottom of the pan and I'd recommend it to anyone.

I bought this product because I wanted to see how all of Lancome products work together. I use the teint idole liquid foundation and wanted to test this powder with it. I like the powder but I do hate the grandma powder smell. The smell doesn't last too long though. It has great coverage and it doesn't cake. I thought the color was a little off because I am in shade 460 suede(w) and the powder looked really red but it blended out very well I couldn't tell at all. I used the pouf that came with the compact. I will purchase again but I think this will last me awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First, the size of this is .67 oz, where most powder foundations are about half the weight. I have dry mature skin and got tired of liquid foundations settling in pores and fine lines. This does not settle in lines, and is not cakey at all. The finish is natural, not dewy or mat. I have used it over liquid foundation and it works well as a setting powder to blur. I don't really like the fragrance but it disappears after a few minutes. Lasts all day. Lots of shades.
I love how light this powder is but is still able to provide coverage.

I have used different powder foundations and had used this many years ago, and thought I would give it try again. Unfortunately, even though the texture and coverage was good, I just could not stand the STRONG powdery smell that lasted all day. I had to return and purchased the make up for ever instead

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

The smell of this powder was such a strong old fashioned makeup smell it made me nauseous when I wore it. The smell lasts for hours. I also found this was not a powder foundation as much as it was just a finishing powder. Very minimal coverage which is not what I was looking for.

This powder is awesome, I love it as a setting powder for some of my foundations.  The finish is beautiful and natural and helps my foundations last all day.  My only complaint is the smell, it smells very Lanc√¥me so if you are not a fan you will hate this.  The smell goes away after about an half an hour, if this had no scent it will be perfection.

I normally wear liquid/cream foundation but I wanted something a lil different and seeked out a powder foundation because now my skin is pretty much issue free and I want something that offered quick application and even out my skintone versus masking my skin. The finish on this is beautiful. After two hours I have a nice soft luminous glow. Not greasy or oily...just luminous. Before application and after skincare I do blot away any residual moisture so I don't experience the cakey face look. Doesn't enhance my enlarged pores which is a plus because I don't like relying on primer. My only complaint.....the fragrance! It doesn't dissipate after application. It lingers for several hours on the skin which is annoying. It doesn't make me ill but I imagine it bothering someone sensitive to fragrance (pregnant beauties, those with asthma). I wish they made it with it because it's so incredibly loud.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On the one hand, this had reasonably good coverage for a powder and sat lightly on my face.  On the other hand, I tried to use it over top of my concealer to set it/even it out and it caked pretty badly.  I feel like if you wore just this it would be fine but not as a setting powder or anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I apply it with a kabuki brush, but you can use the sponge or puff that comes with it. The brush gives a lighter finish.  It gets 4 stars for not being Nude Miracle.

I expected more from Lanc√¥me. Was matched the color in store by a sales person but the next day with full coverage, I was orange. The coverage is full though, just didn't want to be orange. I'm out $$$ now.

This foundation powder is great, it has a velvety soft touch and the lightest color is great because it's not yellow it's more rose gold.  And the scent is very nice and luxe. Coverage is very good and you can't tell your wearing it.
I received a sample of this powder and I barely left it on my face for five minutes because the smell is so strong and so floral. Why? Why would anybody want this on their face?

This is the best powder ever!!! I have used so many powders before and this tops them all. It is perfect to use all over the face to stay matte or under the eyes to set concealer. It never looks cakey and dosn't make my undereye bags dry. I also love to use it with a damp sponge for a airbrushed look. My skin never has a bad day with this powder.

Take: oil-free, long wearing, buildable coverage, no parabens - sulfates - phthalates, light weight As I've aged I've noticed it difficult to find a product that won't settle into my fine lines and pores. I will never have 16 year old skin I know, but this powder is phenomenal. It hides my hyperpigmentation issues and goes on very smooth and flawless, I WAS ASTONISHED to see that my overall appearance was like the 10 years younger me. I see where previous users had said it can be drying, so using it as a buildable foundation is best. Love it. And the price is actually a steal compared to other brands.

I have been wearing this powder for about 5 years I love the coverage that I get and it gives that natural look. I apply one a day and that's all I need. I was looking for a tan color nothing beige or orange tint this is very good for a tan color person

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample. I used it wet and it provided awesome coverage. Smells like my Grandma's purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a amazing foundation on the run i use it over nars tinted moisturizer and i just love the coverage!
This product is perfect for baking as it leaves no white cast on face. Make up appears flawless. Use with big fluffy brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this powder as a foundation! Do not use it wet as the surface can start to crust and you'll waste product like that. Also the puff that comes with it is kind of low quality - once it gets dirty you CAN NOT wash it without the lancome label falling off - because it's just glued.  Other then those issues, the fragrance is quite a nostalgic scent IMO (like baby powder) and it gives me a very natural look.
Suede 520 W - Lovely coverage for my AA mature skin, but lose the fragrance Lanc√¥me. It's an irritant on the skin and to the the senses and not necessary in a product that covers well.
I really don't like this smell, it's so artificial. And it is too dry for my skin. However, the powder give a good matte look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a great texture on the skin; hides pores, smooths the skin, and doesn't look cakey if you use some setting spray. I have only used it with a brush of the dry puff, so I don't know how it performs wet. I was colour matched as 1Y01 and this was a suggested match, but it is really pink (and I consider myself to have a more neutral undertone. For example, Nars Siberia is way too yellow on me, but I am very pale as well). The smell is also incredibly strong and really not pleasant; to me it smells like old lady perfume, but I guess it's supposed to be roses?
My face is still look good for all day after I used this power. Don't have to use foundation just moisturizer and this product. Worth it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It feels so soft on and gives fairly good coverage. It also has a nice smell to it
Love love is the best can live with outit
Is matte ecru II discontinued, and could anyone tell me what they use now? I was thinking matte new III?

This offers nice, buidable coverage. Lightest shade works for my fair skin. I use it as a light coverage foundation, but can see it getting cakey if building it to full coverage. It can also settle into fine lines and might not be best for extremely dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it, because it does not stain on clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is excellent for touch-ups and travelling. The coverage is customizable up to nearly full, and the finish is pretty and natural, even when applied heavily. I used to swear by the TooFaced powder foundation, but this covers and looks better and you get so much more product in a compact. Also the packaging is nice, with a good big mirror. Perfect for the girl on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was absolutely perfect for me! I have been a lifelong tomboy and I really don't like wearing alot of makeup and I always feel wearing liquid foundation feels soo heavy! This powder foundation was a perfect solution because it provides good coverage and it is super light. The website also made it easy to find the perfect match without knowing much about the shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I would highly recommended. Wonderful finish, the only thing is that it does not last me for more than 4 hours without bloating. I think that it has to do with my moisturizer and primer. Anyways other than that when I set it with my bareminerals veil something it lasts a lot longer. I have combination skin, oily t area.
Live this on top of my foundations. It doesn't look cakey at all. I love it. It makes my makeup be matte. It's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fairly good coverage, lasts almost all day.

reviews.review_title: Surprise - We've changed our shades on you!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this product, but after years of using it, they randomly changed the shade of their foundation with no warning.  Same shade numbers, but totally different shades and tones.  I purchased same shade, one shade up and one shade down, but they've completely changed the undertone.  Talk about bate and switch!!
I only need to wear a little for this to go a long way. Would recommend. Also great for Asian skin.

reviews.review_title: it's been a staple for few years now
reviews.review_text: Love this compact, great to carry in your bag and use thru the day.
Use this as a foundation or finish powder to matte your look.  It is buildable.  No creases, nice blur.  Beautiful color matching.  It smells fantastic!!!

This is one of my go-to products that I've been using since I first started wearing makeup. Whether you want medium coverage and a fresh face feel, or to a matte finish that makes you feel glam, this can do it all. I carry it in my purse and touch up when I notice my (extremely) oily skin, and it hides any sign of shine or oil without making my face look cakey. I don't know what I would do without this product and I highly recommend anybody who reads this review to purchase it
I love this because it leaves you matte but the consistency isn't too powdery.
Dual Finish is my favorite, my skin looks amazing. Just wish it was cheaper!!

I've used soo many different powder foundations and this one is my favorite of them all, even out of foundations that are $40 more than this. It truly is an extremely buildable foundation, you can do a light layer with a fluffy powder brush or a more full coverage look with a damp beauty blender or the thicker sponge it comes with. Some other powder foundations can look too cakey and thick when you use too much or use it wet, but this one has never looked cakey, even with a thicker liquid foundation under it. I don't mind the scent, I can only really smell it when I'm applying it. I don't use either of the sponges it came with, they're hard to use and don't give me the finish I like. A damp beauty blender or powder brush both make this foundation look flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have searched for a very long time to find a foundation that could control my redness, and not feel like I have a ton of make up on my face. I have found it with this foundation powder. I apply it with a foundation brush, and while covering the redness, my natural skin tone still shows through, I don't look like a ghost. I am fair to light with cool undertones, and using the Rose Clair Matte. Contrary to advice, I found that using a yellow tinted foundation never helped my skin tone. I have sensitive skin, and this product does not irritate my skin. Just bought my second compact, and will continue to use it as long as it is available.
When you shell out $40 for face powder, you would hope the powder wouldn't crack and break when you are barely halfway through the product. Really nice powder while it lasted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not into heavy makeup for work and everyday. This is a staple for my 10-minute beauty routine in the AM. Delivers medium  coverage, and is buildable if used wet for nights out when I want to wear a little more makeup. It lasts all day-even thru yoga class, and there's no guilt feeling that I have cake-face. Doesn't break me out. As for the smell, I smelled the rose-like scent the first few wears, and don't smell it anymore.

reviews.review_title: Great on the go cover up.
reviews.review_text: I use the sponge applicator (dry) and it goes on smooth. It is a great quick cover up, perfect for those who like uncomplicated make up. Pairs amazing with the Too Faced Bronzer I reviewed earlier.  These two items are perfect for a quick need to look fresh, even and not over made up!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I travel, I like something quick and simple to take with me. I have dry skin, but an oily T-zone. This gives a great natural matte finish very quickly and works wet or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This did not work for me. Looks great when I first put it on but has an old lady scent. My face looked greasy after a few hours.

This product goes on beautifully and gives long lasting, flawless coverage, but it broke out my very sensitive skin :/ the SA told me it would be fine for me, even after explaining that I can't use oils and fragrances, but it's VERY strongly scented. If your skin is more durable I think it's great!

I am an extremely fair person of Irish descent and the Matt 100 is one of the only powder foundations that seems to really work with my pink tones skin. Most porcelains I see have yellow undertones, but this foundation goes on beautifully, feels great, and makes my skin look flawless. The puff applicator is awful, the sponge is all I use- even for dry application, and I adore this powder. I will continue to repurchase it for as long as it is on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this finish this powder gives me, it makes my face look flawless. When I first opened it I noticed the fragrance, and at first I wasn't too happy about that. However now, I really like the slight scent, it's just so...nice. This powder IS so nice. Gives pretty decent shine control as well.

I use to use Lanc√¥me years ago. You think you should try something new when products come out. I went back to Lanc√¥me, because it is truly one of the best! I would give 5 stars, but I feel I go through a lot faster than other compacts.

reviews.review_title: years using it, it never fails
reviews.review_text: Excellent product! Perfect for day and night, flawless skin all the time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why discontinued the fragrance-free version?  I used to use up the whole pan of this pressed powder, then I could not find the fragrance-free version anymore. It has very strong scent that broke me out badly.  Even though I love the finish of this powder, I love my skin MORE.  Hate its scent!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This powder foundation is beyond amazing! it makes your skin so flawless! i often use this product when i want natural, easy makeup when i don't have a long time to put on my FULL MASK lol. i recommend this to EVERYONE!

I have a hard time finding foundation that matches my cool-toned fair skin, but this is by far the best matching foundation. It looks so natural and seamless. I found that I have issues of it clumping to my concealer when I apply it wet, but used dry with a brush gives me perfect coverage that lasts all day. The scent is amazing and I wish I had an eau de toilette of it. I'll only buy Lancome foundation from now on.
Since switching to this brand, I get compliments on how great skin looks
Great coverage for medium to dark skin. And it smells great. The only downside is that it doesn't completely hide shine.
I like the coverage and it would be perfect if it was fragrance free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've bought powders over the years and this was one was on the expensive side. But I wanted to spend money on a good quality product. I made the right choice! This is full coverage without being cakey looking. People complain about the smell. It smells wonderful and it does go away as soon as you put it on. People need to stop  being babies. This the PERFECT amount of coverage. Best Powder ever!

Love this powder. Very fine so goes on smoothly but still provides the coverage I want. It's also one of the few I've found that actually matches my skin color. I also use it in combination with the Lanc√¥me Ultra 24 Hour foundation and the two work together wonderfully!

I have been using this product for over a year now and it gives flawless looking coverage that is super creamy. If you are someone who is sensitive to scent then this isn't for you . However I got past the smell and I consider this one of my top ten favorite products. Definetly recommend ! There is a reason this has been a best seller for over 30 years !

I completely understand all of the complaints about the smell -- it's a strange combination of old lady perfume and something vaguely medicinal.  However, I have to confess that I quite like the scent, if only because it's tied to the nostalgia I feel because this product was my very first high end purchase. I was eighteen, and before this product I was only using drugstore items. This powder was a major milestone for me, and when I put it on for the first time I immediately felt grown up, (the geriatric fragrance kind of helped - ha!) I have since used many, many other kinds of powders on the market and have loved many of them, but decided to come back to this one for old times sake. My skin is oily in the T-zone, and this powder doesn't do much at all to control that. If you have dry skin, this product will be terrific for setting your foundation without looking cakey.
I use this to set my teint idole liquid foundation & gives me a flawless finish

reviews.review_title: Great color for women of color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder blends very well into your skin. It's lightweight and coverage is good. The line carries a great variety of colors for darker skin tones. Definitely recommend.

This is my current foundation & I'm really liking it. It's not perfect but it does a pretty good job overall. I went into Sephora to do a color match & the girl did a great job assessing my skin & my preferences by asking a lot of questions. And she used the color ID tool which said I have a lot of yellow in my skin. My favorite has always been powder foundations--I hate the way liquid foundations feel & look on me, even tinted moisturizers or BB/CC creams. I have very oily skin & bad acne. So after trying many different shades in many different brands, this is what we landed on. One shade just blended right in, we couldn't even see it whereas other formulas showed up as orangey streaks on my jawline. This line of powder foundation has soooo many shade choices, it's great!  The scent, I must say, is really overwhelming. It smells like powdery old lady perfume. But I will try to ignore that since it blends in so well. The scent goes away & the coverage lasts pretty well for me. I unfortunately have to wear medical masks at work because I'm a nurse so no matter what foundation & blush I wear, it will inevitably come off on those masks but this one seems to do ok or at least better than some others.   It is not a good formula for concealing. I have tried it on some dark post-acne spots & it does not conceal effectively so it's a somewhat sheer formula, only able to blur minor flaws & even out your skin tone. I have to use a thick concealer first then dab this lightly all over afterward using my beauty blender. It can sometimes look a little too powdery at first, but it eventually melts right in & looks smooth.  I use oil-control cleansers, oil-control toner, matte formula moisturizer, topical acne prescriptions & Benefit primer plus this product as my foundation & this seems to be a great combination for my oily skin. I will continue to use this since it has proven to be a perfect match for my skin tone as opposed to other products either looking too pale or too orange for my fair skin. It looks like it will last forever too.

I LOVE this powder... It's perfect for everyday as for setting your liquid foundation. The only issue is it doesn't apply well when trying to use with a wet sponge but other than that it's a doll... The fragrance doesn't bother me, it smells pretty good in my honest opinion... I use the Moprhe E1 delux powder brush and it gives the perfect full coverage finish and if you want a sheer to medium coverage then I suggest to use an angled powder brush or the Morphe E53 brush. This lasts for a LONG time and I will definitely continue purchasing this powder foundation.
I hate the smell of this product also everytime I wore it my skin felt dry and itchy! Also I looked powdery definitely not flawless, I'll stick to their liquid foundation because it's amazing

Coverage wise this powder is great. Too bad it has an overwhelming fragrance. 1- Who wants their face to smell all flowery?! 2- The fragrance irritated my skin so bad. It was constantly stinging and oily. (I generally have dry skin!).... Seriously Lanc√¥me get with the times and drop the fragrance.

I will say that it does give your face a finished look. It's not build able and I did tend to have a lot of oil in my T Zone with this product. Oh and it broke me out bad. I thought it was my eating habits or that I wasn't getting enough sleep so I changed my habits for the better. Wore this and within a few hours breakouts started to happen.

reviews.review_title: great texture and coverage but oily
reviews.review_text: This a great powder to use over liquid foundation or as a standalone. It gives you a beautiful satin finish.  Cons: I do get oily faster than I do with my Armani powder.  Super challenging to color match. Powder oxidizes more than liquid! I'd normally be a light to medium shade in powders, but need to use porcelain for this powder.  Smell could be kind of strong.

I purchased this not too long ago in hopes that it would help with my oily skin, especially with warmer weather arriving. It does the exact opposite, it makes me more oily! I do not mind the smell at all which I've read some complaints about. But for the price and it failing to do what it states it does is a bummer.
This powder broke me out so bad. Doesn't make sense that a mattifying face powder would have lanolin and petroleum in it. Doesn't keep away shine at all. All there other products are amazing though.

reviews.review_title: where have you been all my life????
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I bought it after I had received a sample. Love the coverage it provides.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't purchased a foundation powder in such a very long time. They usually fall flat on me and I prefer liquid.  520 Suede is beautiful! Warm but not too red for my yellow/orange undertone. It does not oxidize or fade, especially on my super oily skin. I love MUFE Duo Mat 178 for setting, but this I can actually use as foundation and it looks flawless and natural as if I used a medium/full coverage liquid. When I'm lazy or in a rush, I can use this alone (over a primer/spf/moisturizer), put on some lips and feel beautiful. You can truly build it from sheer to medium/full.   The only downside is that it can feel al bit heavy when you use it damp... and it's pricy - but worth it. Otherwise, it's amazing!
This product is always flawless. I love the scent of of this item.
I Look fresh... Super soft in my skin... Good coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best brand for a variety of skin tones! love the matte finish. Long lasting, and pretty full coverage.

This is the best multi-tasking product ever! I've been using it for many years, and it's my favorite cosmetic ever. It can be used as a finishing powder, a foundation (used wet or dry), and is awesome for carrying in my purse for touch ups. No matter how it's used it leaves an amazing finish. Evens out complextion for flawless look. It feels light on the face too.  I happen to love the smell.  But I do understand how some may prefer unscented.  I think this product is too good to pass up just for the fragance, however. (Unless, of course, one's allergic.)  Great for all ages and skin  types.  And it's one of the few powder foundations that comes in so many colors for every single skintone- even the palest of skin. I believe anyone who tries this once will be addicted! Obviously, I can't say enough about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this powder. Sometimes I struggle with bad hormonal acne and I will use Lancome's Teint Idole liquid foundation and then set it with this powder for even more coverage and staying power on bad acne days. When I have clearer skin I like to use this powder on its own to even out my skin tone (I have lots of red hyperpigmentation from acne scars) and tone down my oily sheen. It looks super powdery at first but it will sink in and look more natural after a few minutes. This is not a full coverage foundation, but it is great for a more natural look or for setting liquid foundation for heavier coverage. My forehead is super oily so I do have to touch it up midway through the day so I just throw the compact in my purse after I apply it in the morning.

reviews.review_title: Nice Coverage,  don't like the smell
reviews.review_text: The coverage was great. Easy to apply with brush but the smell was so unpleasant,  I returned it. Maybe you can't smell it after you apply it but while applying it in the car, my boyfriend could smell it and also agreed it smelled horrible.  So sad because I liked the coverage
This is the best powder foundation I have ever used, it's the only one I buy now!! It goes on so smooth and leaves such an amazing, flawless finish on my skin I LOVE it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ladies, this is the best powder foundation that I've ever used, and I've used many, including the very popular ones (name it, I've tried it).   I started wearing Lancome Dual Finish powder foundation almost 20 years ago, when I was a greasy, zitty 13-year-old, and it worked wonderfully without making my skin worse. Now, I am a super dry-skinned, zit-free 32-year-old, and it still works great! Having had my skin on both extreme ends of the spectrum (from extremely oily to extremely dry), I can honestly say that this works well for both skin types, from my experience.  When you first apply this powder foundation, it is going to look slightly powdery, and the coverage seems to be medium. However, once five minutes have passed, the foundation will have warmed up against your skin and melts into the skincare products that you applied beforehand, giving you the most beautiful, smooth, full yet natural coverage ever, without any of the powdery appearance.  This powder foundation is scented with the classic, powdery perfume scent (think baby powder), but I find it beautiful and something about the scent just makes the product feel more elegant to me.  I'm also impressed by the wide shade selection, which consists of tones that are realistic. I love this powder foundation and have used it through my teens, 20s, and now 30s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this to set my makeup for over 3 years now and i keep repurchasing it because I can't find anything thats better. It keeps my foundation in place all day and gives it a nice matte finish. Defiantly worth buying!
LOVE this powder! Only downside is I have to apply 1-2 a day to get rid of my shine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Matte Porcelaine 1 is the only Powder Foundation barely light enough for my fair skin, been using it for years. I use it over my concealer and finishing powder on acne/scars to give a little extra coverage. Medium coverage at best, but paired with concealer really helps mask imperfections! Whatever you do DON'T GET IT WET! It ruins the whole compact and you have to scrape it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Although I don't wear this as my regular foundation (due to acne, doesn't cover well) I will put this on once in a while as a powder on top of my foundation for a flawless look! stays on all day all though i wouldn't say the foundation provides sheer to full coverage. I got this as a gift from my aunt, and went out and bought this for all the elder ladies in my life such as my mother, grandma and aunts! perfect! younger ladies, this powder foundation may not be for you unless you like a very sheer- light (but kinda covered?) look. I use this when I want more coverage instead of my urban decay mattifying powder. For oily skin types and mostly flawless skin I would 100% recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder is amazing, and a true multi-tasker. It just makes everything look better, and even applies well on the go. Unfortunately, the fragrance is quite strong - so strong that I couldn't continue wearing it even if I wanted to. I would love Lancome to release an unscented/updated version of this.

This powder is unlike anything I've ever used before. I have extremely dry skin so I use very moisturizing foundations like Mac Face and Body. This powder knocks back any shine, sets my undereye concealer and melts right into my skin without ever clinging to dry patches. As a foundation, I use this powder on top of my Lancome SPF for a very light and natural coverage. I find the smell quite floral like traditional French beauty products. The fragrance is quite noticeable in the pan, but I can't detect it once it's on my face. This has quickly become a HG product for me!

The quality of the powder is ok. Nothing is spectacular. However the smell is horrible!!! It's a very strong old-lady fragrance smell that gives me a headache every time I try to use it. Ended up never using it again after a couple of tries.

I have been using this powder for 15 years. I am a bit of a makeup junkie so I try new products every so often and always come back to this. During the week I wear this, mascara and eyeshadow and that's it. It is great for evening skin tone and mattifying. This product does everything I need and I absolutely love it!!
I used it on top of my foundation as a setting powder with coverage.. The coverage part worked but it made me soo oily.. And it's very sheer on its own.

Great coverage, great blendability, feels nice on the skin. Most full coverage powder I have found. As for the smell people are talking about I guess it's a little bit old ladyish but honestly you can't smell it when you are wearing it and it's not that strong or that offensive. After reading the other reviews I went back to smell my foundation because I honestly never noticed. So unless you are sensitive to smells I wouldn't worry about it. I first uses this on a whim before a flight (tried it on in the store) and when I landed it still looked great so I went out and bought it. Been using it for 2 Years now.

reviews.review_title: still trying to give it a chance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is pretty good from what I've tried. I haven't really been able to give it a chance because of the smell. It smells like grandma's rose perfume... You know that smell? So imagine that all over your face. Not only can others around you smell your grandma scent, but it overpowering and gives me a headache. Since the coverage is good, I just it as a spot coverage should I have a small blemish so the scent stays faint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is really nice and has lots of shades. The only problem is that it has a weird smell.... It smells like old lady. My boyfriend hates the smell!
This powder is amazing and smells so good
I absolutely love this powder and this brand!

I'm 19 I have oily skin and this powder foundation is perfect for me. It doesn't get cakey and the coverage is perfect for me. I don't like to wear heavy makeup on my face but this covers the blackheads on my nose perfectly. I use this on top of all my makeup including concealer blush.

This foundation is great for women of color. The application is easy, it feels smooth on the skin and looks very natural and flawless if you get matched correctly (saphora makeup artists can't match WOC to save their life's)

To be fair, I bought this as an alternative to my go-to powder (Kat Von D Lock It) after a Sephora sales associate suggested it-because they've been out of my KVD for MONTHS! While it goes on well and isn't too cake-ey, it's not at the full coverage level that I was hoping for. But if that's not super important to what you want, I'd say this is a good product. Smells nice, too, which is odd for a powder foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great powder, it has amazing coverage and it looks natural on skin. It has a velvet finish.

I buy one of these every few years and keep it in my purse for touch ups. I don't use it every day, but sometimes will apply it wet as an under eye concealer or dry to set my makeup if I'm out of LM setting powder. It's really a great product - it smells nice, doesn't bother my sensitive skin and looks very smooth on. A classic.

Color matching to my skin was impossible! The Sephora rep who was helping me noted that I was not the first with seemingly common light to medium skin tone that just could not get a good match. She even tried on her own skin, very close to mine, and nothing matched her correctly either. It was really odd, Never had that problem with any foundation before, including Lancome's other foundations. Hope they release more colors bur for now, it's a fail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've never been good with foundations that require sponges, multiple steps, and more than 5 minutes to apply. I've been using Dual Finish foundation for years and have never wanted to try anything else. It's very quick to apply, is a great long-lasting base, and requires nothing more than some moisturizer and the included applicator. I use it every day and have gotten a lot of compliments on how clear my skin looks, despite having very sensitive, acne-prone skin. It does have a fragrance but I've never had an issue with irritation or my skin smelling after applying foundation.
This product is heavily scented, though the finish is beautiful I could not get pass the lingering scent. It makes my face itchy, it is just horrid

The matte rose clair is a good match for my skin tone, which is fair, but with red undertones - it can be hard to find a foundation that doesn't look too chalky on me. I use it as a powder and it holds up well through the day, even on my oily t-zone, and in the rain! It would be better without the fragrance though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation could be used wet or dry, depends on how much coverage you want. On my typical 9-5, I apply a thin layer of this foundation on moisturized skin, with some bold lipstick for a casual simple look. If I have time, I use this as a Highlighter and Contour with a darker shade. Party time - It is a natural and lightweight Powder that keep your skin oil-free for a whole night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used Cover FX Mineral Foundation for the past 7 years which was great for my sensitive acne prone skin... then recently was forced to look for a replacement because it suddenly wasn't working for my skin anymore. I tried Lancome Dual Finish Foundation and Becca Perfect Skin Mineral Foundation after reading the reviews on Sephora, and Dual Finish came through as the clear winner. It goes on beautifully and naturally (I use a round kabuki brush to apply), does not clog pores and is truly long wearing without grease, even on my combination oily acne prone sensitive skin. I don't need to touch up for up to 8 hours, which is a miracle! I am light skinned Asian and Matte Neutrale II is perfect. Only down side is the addition of Butylparaben and fragrance. Otherwise it's such a great product I'm willing to overlook these down sides. This will be my go-to foundation from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this powder and soon after bought the full size. I use this as my setting/finishing powder over my Lancome Tient Idole 24 Hr makeup. Even though I have generally dry skin, this never makes me look dry. I use a large fluffy kabuki brush to apply and the finish is flawless!! I love it so much. It does have a perfumey smell to it but it fades pretty quick upon application.

I used to wear Nars all day luminous powder and I had been going through it so fast (like every 2 months I was re-buying) so I decided to give this a try as I had read it was more full coverage which is what I wanted due to my red spots on my face . This powder is great! I have used for 2 weeks so far. Going from Nars to Lanc√¥me had been an adjustment as I had gotten used to the aluminizing properties of Nars and its full coverage look as well. I tried to apply the Lanc√¥me powder damp since it's versatile and it's a little hard to do but I'm sure with practice it will get easier . The scent of this powder is wonderful! I put it on in the morning and it makes me feel classy and well put together . I just wish the powder would cover up my redness altogether and a few hours of wearing the powder it starts to come off.

This is a matte powder that can be worn alone. If your combination skin and a bit more on the dry side you might have to moisturize alot. Other than that the only reason I gave 4 stars is I got the wrong color its a tad tan on me. Even though I purchased the 3 lightest shade: Matte Porcelaine d'Ivoire I (W). I will plan to buy the lightest shade and try it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best powders I've used! It was a bit difficult to get a color match, but that's true for my olive undertone skin with any face powder/foundation products. I settled with Sand III (I'm a Tawny in ELDW for reference), after trying it in Ecru, Honey and Amande. It's not a full coverage foundation powder like Make Up Forever's Duo Mat or Too Faced's Cocoa Powder Foundation, but with a solid tinted moisturizer or bb cream coverage, this powder works its magic. The powdery finish it gives creates a soft-focus over my face, although my natural oils do seep out through the day. While it's not a product that controls oils, I love the fact that you get double the amount of product in this compact compared to the standard amount you get with face powders from any other brand. It means I can touch up as often as I want without worrying about the product running out too soon! It is light enough in coverage to not cake up with multiple touch ups I find. I have only used it dry, because the only time I tried it wet it created a weird discoloration over the pan of powder, which kind of ruined my compact. So I haven't really tried a full coverage look with this powder, but even when it's dry I find that it's quite build-able and can cover broken capillaries and redness well, but not my acne scars or dark circles under my eyes. I use a concealer to cover those, but I end up having to do this when using pretty much any other product.  It's just such a classic product! I love seeing it sitting pretty on top of my vanity. Something about it screams 'timeless' to me. Even the fragrance in the product that seems to raise red flags, is something reminiscent of a time when such things were in vogue. While the scent is quite strong, I find it very pleasant and it doesn't irritate my skin or anything. I'm glad I found a color that I'm comfortable with and feel so good using it as part of my daily routine. Love love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product because of the great reviews. Noticed a few mentioning the perfume smell but purchased it anyways. First time opening it, the perfume the smell was really overwhelming. It smelled just like my Grandma (I love my Grandma but I don't want to smell exactly like her). Then I thought maybe after I apply it I wouldn't notice it so much....WRONG. I could only wear this for an hour before having to wash it off and go back to my old powder. My review is based off the smell alone. Not how well the product covers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first powder/foundation product I owned as a 14 year old and I'm still buying the same shade 15 years later! This is truly a classic powder. Part of my love for it might be the perfect shade match, but I really love the formulation too. I use this daily, either applied on it's own with a kabuki-style brush or sometimes over foundation. I've never applied it wet but it can also be used that way. I actually don't mind the perfume-y smell, but as other reviewers have noted, it is fairly noticeable. I love this product and plan to buy for another 15 years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this powder! Using it with the lancome 24 foundation gives a more flawless ful cover look. Either way I can use it with or without the liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom had this Dual Finish powder on her vanity, I used it and fell in love with the silky texture and its ability to smooth over my mid-day worn down makeup. I headed over to sephora to pick up one immediately. The associate matched me and applied it all over my face. Right after I made my purchase was when I noticed the nauseating scent exuding from my face. This powder is heavily perfumed. Funny how never noticed the scent earlier in my moms compact...So, maybe the scent eventually dries down the longer you own it with use...??? I hope so, cuz this powder formulation is perfect. I hope Lancome creates a perfume-less version in the future.

I picked this up as an alternative to the liquid foundation that's apparently sold out in my shade (560). I immediately noticed the grandma perfume sent which I didn't like but the powder itself gives great coverage. It's light and builds blue - as marketed. It's definitely going to replace the powder I currently use.

I use the Lanc√¥me 24H foundation in 210buff and dust the dual finish powder in 230 Ecru II over it. The powder gives great coverage, glides on easily, and has an excellent matte finish that gives oil control. I love the black and gold packaging, it looks sophisticated and elegant. My favorite part of this powder - IT SMELLS WONDERFUL! I never thought I would care what the scent of my pressed powder was until now...This stuff is fabulous. Every time I open the compact and swirl my brush over it I feel like a princess who found the Holy Grail of pressed powders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, this powder could probably last for EVER. I only use it as a powder after my foundation (dry not wet), which is probably why I have barely scratched the surface of the powder... have used it every day for almost 1.5 months now and still looks new. It does have a kind of old lady makeup scent, but once I got used to it I couldn't really tell anymore, doesn't bother me at all. Using it as a finishing touch, it does set my makeup and help to keep the shine off my face. However, in the late afternoon, sometimes when I reapply it, it cakes just a little bit around my nose. But I think that's probably due to my skin being a bit dry by then, so I do have to kind of even it out with my fingers or tissue. May help if used with a mist or something. Anyway very satisfied with this powder, really great product which is totally worth the value!

Great full coverage powder foundation. Quick and easy but get a nice powder foundation brush. Must use a good moisturizer under the powder or you can look dry. Or you can use this foundation wet too. I got color matched in the store and it was spot on.

reviews.review_title: One Item that i repurchase Over and Over
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am the type that likes to try new things...always in search of the best. Ive been wearing this for around 10 years and ALWAYS keep it in my collection! i l sometimes use it as a foundation if i am in a rush, or just as an extra coverage setting powder for liquid foundation. This powder is a must have!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would give it an excellent if it were fragrance free. Once it is on, you don't smell anything...just when applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this when i did the color iq test. Normally I would have gone way lighter. But Im glad i decided to get this. First I must say color iq works! it looked great....  as for the product itself. I loved that it applies so well. it really is buildable and doesnt take long to do so. stays put pretty well.  My only downside was the sponge smells weird, but i washed it and well its a sponge, so i only have to deal with it while i apply it.  but my love with lancome is again proven. great stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage! I have blotchy skin . . . red patches and dark circles under my eyes and this covers it all. I apply my moisturizer in the morning and then put this on and bam, perfect looking skin without looking like I'm painted. Most people don't know that I wear foundation but in a good way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this as a sample, I love trying new powders/foundations, but very few have impressed me. I have always seen Lancome as a sort of old lady brand, and have never really tried their products, and the one time I did use their mascara I hated it and returned it. However, this product I fell in love with immediately and purchased a full size. I have normal to oily skin. I get oily in the usual T-zone area and sometimes my powder can look clumpy or caked on even though I don't apply multiple times during the day. This powder does not feel or look heavy but provides great coverage. I have not used it wet, but this looks fantastic over my tinted moisturizer. It's easily build-able but doesn't look caked onto my skin. It lasts throughout the day without any touching up, it has become my go to everyday powder!

I purchased this from Sephora hoping to find the perfect powder with great coverage. Unfortunately, this product did not work out for me because the smell was too strong. I could smell the perfume the entire time the powder was on my face. It would be great if they came out with a unscented version.

So I got a mini sample of this from a purchase I made a while back. I hadn't tried it out until today as I wanted to experiment with something new. (i usually never wear foundation) and WOW. I LOVE this. It's perfect for oily skin and makes your face look like you have no foundation on AT ALL. LOVE IT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about purchasing this product, due to the fact I'm skeptical about anything that says it can be used dry or wet - don't know why, I just tend to have bad experiences with those types of product. However, I wanted to make a shift from using heavy foundation (i have problems with acne) in hopes that allowing my skin to breath more would help. Let me tell you, this was the best purchase I have made in a while. Not only is my skin pretty much acne free (occasional breakout here and there) but this actually does what it says. I apply dry over a tinted moisturized for a light, natural look and it looks gorgeous. When I want to spot correct or have a little more coverage, I simply wet my brush with my Urban Decay setting spray, give it a few dabs in the powder and apply. The coverage is great, but still feels like I'm wearing very little makeup at all and it looks natural. Not to mention, it will last ALL DAY. Only on really hot days to I have to give myself a little refresh in the afternoon. It does have a strong, somewhat old lady-like smell, but it fades fast and you get used to it. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you don't think this product is what you need, I dare you to buy it and leave it sitting in your drawer. Really does everything the description says it can. So nice for touch-ups on the go or to add a perfect finish. I wouldn't call the finish fully matte or light-diffusing/perfecting like a mineral powder, it is somewhere on its own level‚Äîsilky, soft, and even. Great alternative to a full coverage powder to completely even out skin tone. As a bonus, the compact is durable and functional. It closes and stays closed, and doesn't employ any clumsy separate flaps or swinging compartments to store the sponge. Did I mention how soft and thick the sponge is? High-quality product all around. Couldn't recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I went to Sephora last week looking for a new compact. As always I made a beeline for the trendy brands. I got frustrated very quickly with the selection and the quality being offered by all the supposed cutting edge brands. Until a sales person took pity and on and asked me to give Lancome a try. I said to her...really Lancome, the stuffy old brand that I associate with old women?!...  Let me just tell you, one swipe of this powder and I was in love. Never will I again walk past the Lancome display with my nose in the air. The quality of the this product speaks for itself. I am in love with this powder. It works on my olive complexion and goes on like a dream!  I am in love with Lancome :)

This powder is awesome. They have a wide range of colors to choice from and the finish is beautiful. There is so much you can do with this powder. I have oily skin and with the right primer I do not have to touch up my make for 10 or 12 hours. The perfume smell goes away by the time I'm finished putting on my makeup.

it may be expensive, but i've been using this product almost daily for three years now and there's barely a dent in it! it has very nice coverage that's not too light and not too thick, and the variety of shades makes it easy to match to your skin. the only downside is that i feel it doesn't protect from oiliness all day. it definitely helps, but by late afternoon i can feel my skin getting a little oily on places like my t-zone. still, it's great and i really recommend it.
Love it. And the color matches my skin tone perfectly which can be a challenge sometimes for AA women.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for the last few days and Iabsolutely love it. It is so smooth and and they color match matched me perfectly, It does not cause my excessively oily skin to accumulate more oil throughout the day. I get about 10 hours of very nice wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this and love it either by itself on low maintenance days or over foundation to set everything. It keeps the oil at bay although I still need to blot partway through the day but I haven't found anything that will keep my face matte all day. I will continue to repurchase this.

Although the smell did make me think of my moms makeup, I like it. It goes on nicely, has a nice smell. Not too heavy, and doesnt wear off too much throughout the day at work (outside at a beach bar for an 8 hour shift.) Works for me.
