I only use this dry over foundation. Love the silky feel and smooth finish! I love the smell too! Smells clean and expensive! Will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a sample. It was a pretty good sized sample but used the whole thing and couldn't get enough coverage to cover my minor blemishes. But maybe it's easy to get good coverage with the full sized version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it is so smelly, but good coverage.

The biggest down fall was the grandma smell. I think the powder does a great job for coverage (as a foundation) or mattifying powder (lightly powdered on). The biggest reason why I'm not keeping it is the smell, although the smell isn't noticeable after a while, it makes me sick whilst putting it on.

Lanc√¥me is a great brand and I love the 24h foundation they have but this! Omg! No! Let me just say... If you want your face to smell like your grandmas perfume that she sprayed 5 to many times then get this! But if not then don't bother! I could smell that perfume before I even opened the packaging! I sent it back right away! It was nauseatingly strong!
This is the best powder I've ever used has coverage and leaves My skin looking amazing!!!
This product gives a good overall look , but there is a problem. It can look cakey at times. But if you have redness it covers well but by the middle of the day , it shows your redness.
Matches my skin perfectly. Doesn't cake up. Would definitely recommend for a LIGHT coverage.
One word. Gross!!!! It look so cakey. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Lanc√¥me Dual Finish is perfection. I wore it for years. Can be applied over liquid foundation, but no need! I just used the applicator pad, not the sponge. Never needed to use it wet. Just one application and... porcelain! What is amazing is my skin is actually not flawless! I have combination skin oily and dry, some acne on the chin and nose and some rosacea too also tend to get dark under the eyes. None of this caused by this foundation. It seemed to calm my skin. Just one morning application and porcelain all day! Amazing! I now use BE only. I still love this and would use it but the BE foundations are very good and come in most of their kits. Natural ingredients and natural look too. I don't need the absolute coverage like I did then and don't wear foundation as often. Glad to know this is available on Sephora, easy to get if I ever need it again!
This powder is so awesome it's the perfect finishing powder. I use this to set my Lanc√¥me 24 hr foundation and it is flawless. It is my holy grail powder.

reviews.review_title: The BEST! Have used for 4 years straight!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 4 years now. I love it because it blends flawlessly into the skin without feeling heavy. It supplies subtle coverage - just enough so that I don't need foundation (unless I'm going out and get a bit more made up). It balances out any red splotchiness I have on my cheeks and sets my Dr. Jardt BB Cream very well. Never cakes up or falls into weird creases, and lasts all day! I have combo skin so midway through the day I tend to get oily on my nose, chin, and forehead. Some blotting papers or light pressed powder is an easy light touch-up. I do notice that if I use a mattifying primer I tend to get less oily throughout the day. I use this with a nice quality Kabuki brush and apply it in swirling motions. It's build-able coverage as well so I dab a bit more on blemishes, etc. and it NEVER looks caked on. This has never caused me any skin problems and I'm very prone to breakouts and harsh ingredients. I personally do not find the scent overwhelming. It doesn't smell like perfume on your face, don't worry! My facial products have more scent! This is my definite go-to makeup product!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome's Dual Finish powder is the BEST powder foundation of all time. No joke. I have been using this since high school and I still do (I'm 27). I have probably purchased 100 of these in my lifetime. If you are oily, this is a must have. I recommend using this by itself, or over a foundation if you want a very full coverage. That's the beauty of it though. If I want to wear it alone, I use a concealer and this over the top (use the sponge for a more full coverage or a brush if you want a little more medium type coverage). It is beautiful like that for every day. If you want a really full, perfect face, use this over the top of your foundation as a setting powder. Literally EVERY imperfection will be covered. I like to buy this in the fragrance-free version when possible. I do think Lancome tends to over-fragrance things sometimes. Overall though, this really is the best powder I have ever used. I can't believe this is the first time I have ever written a review on it considering I've been using it for over 10 years. This is great for normal/oily/combination skin. I have no experience with dry skin but I'm sure with the right moisturizer this will work for you too. Lancome isn't always the trendiest brand so sometimes I feel like it gets looked over, especially at places like Sephora, but it really is tried and true. Especially this powder. Trust me!

I love Lancome products. I used to use teint idole for years before changing over to powdered foundation. My skin is a bit oily around my nose, so after a few hours of wear my nose would start getting super shiny with the liquid foundations. I also have very pale (porcelain) skin tone, which burns very easily so when Lancome came out with their oscillation powder foundation with SPF, I was really excited. By far that was their best foundation, although a little gimacky with the vibrating applicator. Sadly that was discontinued, but this is the next best thing. It feels great, very light and provides just the right amount of coverage. It is a bit pricy though since it only last a couple of months (tops) and unfortunately hasn't SPF, but it's still a great product. The compact is very convenient for throwing in your purse, which allows for easy touch ups. A few people have complained about the perfumey smell, but I don't mind it. It's only a faint smell and you don't really notice it once you put it on.

This powder makeup would be great if it wasn't for the awful perfume it has. I don't understand the users that give a good review to this product. The scent is so strong! I can now recognize it when someone who's using it walks by. I definitely don't want to smell like that.

I've been using this for at least 7-8 years now. I rarely leave the house without it. I apply this using a stippling brush and it's light and build-able. Great for everyday or I use it to set my foundation when I do use Teint Micacle for heavier coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: especially for sticky summers. Glides on, color is great and it lasts all day. Keeps me from sweating off my makeup. delicate fragrance . Nice packaging, a fave for the summer months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite powder/dual foundation period!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing powder for setting makeup!!!

I'm not kidding when I say I am OBSESSED with this stuff. I use it daily and have been for years. I refuse to switch! It has a great amount of coverage and helps with my oily t zone. All of my friends have now started using it because they know how much I love it.
super like! one of the best I ve been using it for 7 years now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this powder to contour. It goes on smooth and seems to do a good job as a setting powder. It is long wearing and buildable.
This foundation is wonderful. It's versatile and matches my skin much better than liquid foundations from other brands have. The coverage is just enough and it lasts all day.

As a powder, it's great BUT the smell...it smells like sulfur. I swear I smelled light perfume at first and then it went through some kind of metamorphosis until the resulting fragrance resembled a light dust of sulfur on my face. It's not overly strong or lung irritating but I don't exactly want my husband to go in for a kiss and get a whiff of rotten eggs.
I love this powder. It smells nice, you can build coverage, apply wet or dry for full or light coverage. It's great.

I got this in store because the color match only matched me with this and one other foundation (Laura Mercier) and of the two this one looked better, also note I was in a huge rush on my way to an event. When I got home and tried it the next day I just couldn't get over the smell and I needed way more power than I wanted to use for decent coverage. None the less, I hate returning things so kept using it for a couple more days, and then I started to break out so I knew that it had to go. Now I am back to using my old powder foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It wears well. It covers well. It has a fragrant smell to it. I rather enjoy it... You don't need a whole lot either so I am expecting it to last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this powder mainly dry. Love it to do my makeup quickly and unify my skin. Very comfortable, still looks natural. Not a fan of the smell (reminds me of Elnett hairspray), but that's only noticeable when you open the compact. Love it!
This product was not worth the price. The coverage is poor and chalky even when used damp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder, it gives a natural finished, love it, i use it just with my daily moisturized cream and sun protector cream. Perfect for oily skin, it would last all day!. definitely in love with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing for us deeper, darker skinned toned women. This applies like a dream and leaves an airbushed effect on my skin. I love it. I use it alone most times but I have layered it on top of my BB cream and it looks amazing still!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST, most natural looking powder I've found. Great, buildable coverage, with a total matte finish. LOVE it! I use it with the Lancome 24 hr Teint Idole foundation or alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have a chance just stop by and try it on half of your face and you will notice the difference. It gives you a right amount of cover and natural look.. It is a little pricey but i love it very much. This is the 2nd time i purchased this product :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder has an amazing natural matte finish, super buildable coverage, & is great to set bb creams and liquid foundation. However if you do full coverage foundation & add this powder be careful it can get cakey. Smells clean & floral. It lasts all day without needing touch up. Worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: - good for sensitive skin and not comedogenic in my experience - best used alone or over moisturized skin or over a bb cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this with high hopes after reading the reviews on here. The coverage is ok but the strong rose scent is awful. Don't get me wrong, I like roses. But the scent of this powder is so overpowering, it actually made my eyes water.

I bought this product about three weeks ago. I have been using Bar Minerals powder for a good 7 years now, and decided it did not do what I wanted it to. This is a life-changing buy. Makes my skin look even, and flawless. A must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like it a lot. make my skin a bit dry. Good coverage.

reviews.review_title: Looks really good as time goes by
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first I wasn't thinking of buy a lancome pressed powder, but I tried it and compared to the dior one, turned out I prefered this one. It matches my skin more, give rather fair coverage, and even your skin get oily in day, it makes your skin rather radiant. I also like how it comes with two sponges. The one that is thiner, I use it when I have foundation on, and it helps your make up lasts longer, otherwise, I normally just use muf translucent powder to finish up; the thicker one I use as my foundation if I only have sunscreen on. One thing I am not a fan about it, it's the strong smell, it's not a bad scent, but it's really intimating.
Lanc√¥me products are perfect if you have oily skin I can't speak on how it works with dry skin but I love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I¬¥ve tried this powder as a finishing powder to set my make up, it dryed me out a lot, the result was a flaking skin‚Ä¶maybe because of my really dry skin and my occupation as a flight attendant‚Ä¶I¬¥ve no idea‚Ä¶but this product doesn't work out for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I recommend this product to anyone who has oily skin! It really works great & covers every single spot if you apply it well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Matte Amande III for several years now. It is just a superior product and never disappoints. It does not get thick looking on my skin and just always covers evenly and makes my skin look great. Like I said before, a superior product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over 20 years. It does wonders for your skin and I love the smooth texture.
It's a wonderful nondrying, medium-full coverage powder foundation. I think the light fragrance is delightful as well. Gives some pep to an item I use every day.
This is my favorite powder! I've used it for years, & will continue to purchase it.
This make up has the perfect amount of coverage without making my skin look fake but it does seem to make my face get shiny faster than my skin normally does on its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lanc√¥me cosmetic products works well with my skin. The dual finish has been my go to powder for about 2 years now! I have pigmented skin and this provides me with full coverage when paired with the 24hr foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Goes on quickly and easily and provides great coverage. For me it works better to apply dry rather than with a wet sponge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PROS: - Excellent colours - Matte but natural finish - Smooths and sets foundation - Just enough coverage - Acts as a nice base for other face products - Keeps oil controlled - Weightless - Is almost undetectable, never looks heavy - Sleek, attractive packaging - Compact has mirror  CONS: - Scent can be off-putting to some  This powder was purchased upon recommendation of a makeup artist at my local Sephora. She works for the brand and was extremely helpful in shade selection. I can honestly say I've never had a powder match so flawlessly. I wear Buff II and it is virtually impossible to see on my skin. It blends beautifully over liquid foundation with little effort. I wear it in combination with Estee Lauder Double Wear and get excellent coverage and long wear out of this duo! I didn't notice the scent in store but did the second I got home and panicked thinking it was going to be awful and ruin the product for me but I was wrong! While the scent is more noticeable than other products I don't dislike it at all. I haven't noticed any adverse reactions on my skin and will likely repurchase once I go through this compact! New favourite for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The actual powder is great and has a very velvety feel. Provides medium coverage. However couple things-  1) Too much fragrance in the powder it gives me a headache. 2) The compact case is not very useful. There is a thin cheap sponge and a thicker sponge that comes with the powder. the thicker sponge does not fit inside the compact case. So I am stuck using the thin cheap sponge or carrying a powder brush inside my purse, which I absolutely hate doing.  I have switched to MUFE pro-finish, which I LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, as it was recommended specifically for sensitive skin and my skin freaks out at most powders for some reason. I had the SA put a little on my cheek in the store, no problems. The next day a little on my nose, no problems. Finally I put it on my whole face and...terrible! Within about an hour, the corners of my eyes and mouth got really dry and red, my eyes were tearing, and I broke out all over my face. This will be going back. Too bad.
If you need quick fix, you found it. Perfect coverage, looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage & long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using dual finish for about 4 years (shade is Ivoire for my fair skin) and it is a product I could not do without. I can use it wet or dry and the finish is smooth, soft matte (not chalky), does not cake or go into any lines. I usually use it dry with some Dior Glow Primer underneath on days when I just cant do the brushes, liquid foundation and all that jazz. After I apply I buff lightly with a kabuki do a little blush and I'm good for the rest of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 40 with light, sensitive skin.. I have been using this product for 15 years without complaint. It Never irritates or breaks out my skin. Perfectly matches my skin tone with every season and stage. Doesnt settle in my lines! Layers well over ANYTHING. Matte finish and layerable to acheive any coverage witoutlooking fake.. Never orange eben on my pinkish toned skin. I have used everything over the years and have concluded this is the s$&@!!!!!!!

reviews.review_title: One of the best face powders ive tried!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great selection of colors, it is so hard for me to find the perfect shade, but with Lanc√¥me I found the perfect shade that has a great finish as well. it is not too pink, or orange just the perfect tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't really used this product much since purchasing it. I got matched in-store at Sephora and the sales associate matched it to the redness in my face, so it doesn't look exactly the way I would like it to... I think I would like it a lot more if it matched the more porcelain tone that the rest of my body has. It does have a nice finish, it stayed well and while the scent was overpowering at first, after it faded a bit I enjoyed it. Overall, I think I would buy it again if I could be matched with an appropriate shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my friend recommend this to me and it's really good product.

I bought this because Michelle Phan told me to :-(  I don't like trying on skin make up in store. I bought based on youtube tutorials and reviews. It goes on very cakey and highlights my dry skin.  Oh Yeah. It also makes me smell like a scented tampon. I get nauseous whenever I wear it!

reviews.review_title: GREAT for all over Face powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really really like the luminous look to this that I get when I complete my makeup look for the day. I have one for my purse, but honestly IF, i choose to use it, (don't always have to to reduce the shine), but if I do, this goes on smooth without clumping for a second use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only powder I'll use. I've been using it for 4 years and I love how it's light, soft, and minimizes the oiliness on my skin. The smell does not bother me either. I also love how it's portable -- it comes with me everywhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got it in Matte neutral 2 and it matches my neutral undertone asian skin. I use BD40 in YSL touch√© elcat foundation and B10 in Chanel VA. I mainly use it on days when I have a lot of breakouts to cover because the finish is matte, it is more forgiving on the pimples. The YSL foundation will only emphasize the protruding acne and strangely emphasize my flakiness. But this powder mattifies the skin making it looks flat and doesn't emphasize my dry areas. For my combo/dry skin in winter, It keeps me matte for like 6 hours and then I would get a little sheen. It has a strong scent though, I don't really mind that. The only downside is that the packaging is so bulky.

Love this powder! I have oily/dry combination skin with mild acne/large pores- so it's hard finding a powder that works for me. But Lancome's powder is great. It has a subtle powdery rose odor (I like it though) to it so if you prefer an odorless powder steer clear from this. I usually wear it on top of my Makeup Forever foundation and combined gives great coverage without looking over done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this make up. I have very sensitive, oily skin with large pores that breaks out easily. Lancome Dual Finish is the only brand I have found that does not break me out in blemishes and accentuate my large pores. It also smells nice. It's so creamy, pretty and leaves skin looking flawless. Even though I've added to my beauty arsenal, I doubt I'll ever stop using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased and tried it on yesterday. first, cant stand the smell of it!! Smells like old lady. I bought it because I wanted a multi functional finishing powder to set my foundation and products of the like. Since I am having such a positive experience with their Tiente Idiole, I thought I would give this a try. Im am burning as I write this review. Will be returning this today!

It goes well with the foundaton. It keeps the oily face away and very light and soft. However, the powder sponge thing is really cheap-made so it will not going to last so long. With one wash, the sponge breaks in half.

I have several items of Lanc√¥me but I have never tried that powder Makeup and I am really sorry that I didn't try before I just like it fails and just wonderful I love it I love how he looks hot it smells and this is one of the products I won't never let go again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so light weight and sheer. Covers all my blemishes leaving my skin with an even matte tone. This is really important to me because I have an oily complexion. I do recommend using setting spray though to give it a slightly more natural look. I've tried liquid foundation by smash box before but I felt like I had so much product on my face even if I had used a little bit. So this was great. The smell of this product is slightly perfumed which I enjoy. It's pretty long lasting too because you only need a light layer to cover the entire face flawlessly. It literally takes 2 minutes to apply. Lancome never disappoints me! Check it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for many years. It gives you the option to use wet or dry. I have never used it wet as I like the coverage that the dry foundation gives me as a bump for my regular liquid foundation. I feel like it seals it like a powder and helps set my make up all day. The bonus is it is portable and is not messy like loose powder. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancome's Dual Finish powder makeup. I have used it for several years. I found it when the powder makeup I was purchasing from my hair salon was no longer available to me. I have used powder foundation for many years and love its ease of use and control of coverage. The Lancome Dual Finish is so soft going on and provides the right amount of coverage without looking heavy or cakey. It smells nice, too! There is a good range of colors that made it easy to find a match for my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this powder. It glides on my skin and leaves a soft finish. It provides buildable coverage that starts out medium. It comes in very pale shades, which can be hard to find for my really pale skin. The only thing keeping it from getting 5 stars is the scent. It's way too powerful and stays in my nose all day. I tolerated it for a week, then brought the powder back. However, I have yet to find anything like it, so I'll probably be buying it again and hoping I get used to the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The best powder I've ever used! The girl at the store helped me to this one after I was about to buy a make up forever powder & she informed me that for $4 more you get twice the amount in this product and I'm really happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the best sample size I could based on my color ID and I was impressed. It went on kind of pale and made me worry, but once it dried it looked good. It didn't smudge much and it didn't break out my skin. It's not my fave, but I like it.

First, the smell of this powder is so clean and fresh. I can either lightly sweep it with a brush or pat it for fuller coverage. Looks smooth. I'm on my second one. I always change my make up up every nine months or so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first makeup item my mom ever bought me. That was back in 2002 and I still love it. Every few years I wonder if it's outdated and I try out the latest and greatest powder. I ALWAYS come back to this. The color range is fantastic and the coverage is good. I've recently switched to a liquid foundation for a little more coverage, but I still use this when I don't need a full face of makeup and just want to blur imperfections for a more even complexion. I've never used it wet, so I can't comment on that. But dry gives a great satin finish that doesn't look powdery or chalky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this powder is amazing. Probably one of my favorite finishes of any other powder I've used. Feels light, covers well, doesn't settle in lines, and is just overall great. Except for the smell. It is literally like the worst old lady perfume. It smells like something no so great my grandmother used to wear. If you can stand the smell get it, it's great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use Lancome foundation, so this powder works great with it, the only problem being that it's a tad dark for my fair skin. The only improvement would be to have it odorless and for me, just a bit lighter and pinker, not tan.

It had a smell that was difficult for me to ignore when I applied it and the smell continued throughout the day. It was a cross between a chemical lab and an old ladies purse. I hate returning products but this one had to go. Maybe my sense of smell is too sensitive but could not enjoy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth...I use both the loose powder and this one, both are excellent. Cannot be compare with cheap face powder because the quality is superior. You can feel the difference on your face, smooth, super fine as satin.

Like an old friend I can trust to do the right thing! Seems like many of us have used this since back in the day! This was my first department store makeup purchase! I have not found anything I like half as much! Since the early 90's I think I've been using this! Wow is that possible? Where has the time gone? I still love it for its EASE OF USE! It makes my skin look flawless without looking like I have powder on! It lasts all day but is super easy to touch up on the go no muss no fuss, one two three I'm done and out the door! Thank you for keeping this product in your line!
I, like another have used this since my 20's. I'm in my 50's

I couldn't tell you how many of these amazing little compacts I have gone through since 1995-yes-since I've been 15 years old! At least 30 of them. It's all I used for years and years and years. I still use it on occasion, although now that I'm 34, I like something with a bit more coverage. But I still adore it and would recommend to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is absolutely amazing. It gives me flawless coverage without the cake look. I live by this stuff. It's a must have for all skin types. Especially my acne-prone, oily skin folks !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Ive been using it for about 15 years and it is my go to face product. I do not wear foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially purchased the wrong color powder (too light), but decided to keep it for the winter months as a finishing powder. I purchased one color darker, and it is amazing. It isn't cakey, appears flawless on my skin, and finishes my foundation beautifully. I have oily/combination skin and it keeps my skin looking matte with no breakthrough oil. I work 12 hours shifts, and I don't feel as though I need any touch-ups throughout the shift. I highly recommend this product. It may be slightly pricey, but I believe the product is worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing foundation. It provides a smooth, sheer coverage which I find amazingly buildable. I have dry skin and this foundation flakes much less than any other powder foundation I have used. It also gives a gorgeous, luminous finish.  The best part? I have very pale skin and Matte Porcelaine was a perfect match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I really like Lancome and decided to try their powder. It blends great, it smells really nice but after 3 hours I feel like it starts melting. Great coverage but no great for ladies with oily skin.

reviews.review_title: Worked when I needed it the most
reviews.review_text: I've used this as a finishing powder over my Lancome liquid foundation for a while now. I recently sunburned my face pretty bad. I had massive red blotches and peeling dry skin for over a week, including during my mom's funeral. I couldn't wear my liquid foundation because it showed the peeling skin really bad. This powder was my only hope. It performed beautifully! It covered the redness completely and minimized the look of the peeling skin. During the worst day of my life, I didn't have to worry about the horrible appearance of my face after being sunburned. The powder lasted all day without touch ups. It does have a scent,I actually like it. My skin didn't feel caked up either. I will continue to be loyal to Lancome and I recommend this powder foundation to everyone!

reviews.review_title: Great powder, but it does have fragrance.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you can handle a lightly perfumed powder on your face, then this is a great choice. I have fairly sensitive skin, so the perfume became a problem for me in the summer heat. However, if you do not have overly sensitive skin, this powder stayed put and was a great color. It stayed matte for much longer than most powders.
I use this as my foundation. It's awesome and you don't look like a powder puff girl!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the product, although it is not as oil absorbing as I want. The very strong perfume smell is off-putting, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my powder for over a decade. Matte Bisque II is my non-summer color. Loved Dore III for summer, but they discontinued it. Nothing quite like it, but Matte Wheat and 420 Bisque come very close. I have several freckles and this powder does wonders to give a blended smooth finish to my face. Rarely use it in the wet form, but works well when I want greater coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best powder makeup out there ... I've tried many other brands available at Sephora, and keep coming back to Lancome! This powder provides great coverage with or without foundation, easy to reapply throughout the day with no caking. I have acne-prone skin, and this does not cause me to break out.

Great product for light to medium coverage. Totally buildable and goes on top of moisturizer nicely. Not as long wearing as I would like, but the included powder sponge is decent at touch up during the day - still prefer a brush for application though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years!! I love it, it provides good coverage but not too heavy like liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't realize this until my face broke out badly after 2-3 days of wearing it. I checked the ingredients and there you go, of course it clogged my pores. Watch out ladies with sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: Combo Skin - Keep going back to this one!
reviews.review_text: I've gone back to this several times over the last few years and will not bother trying anything else anymore. I have combination skin (oily Tzone) with flaking especially on my nose during the winter months. This powder and sponge applicator keeps everything smooth and covers the blemishes (although I use a little Porefection for my nose as well to complete the look). Love it for everyday use over my Hourglass primer!
Wow. I fell in love with this foundation. It took care of all my concerns and made my skin fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is always great. I buy it all the time. It give you a little color and keeps you shine free throughout the day.
I love this product, it is great for those natural days! I wear this with concealer, mascara, and lipgloss then I am out the door. Does not great cakey even if you build it up! It is beautiful.

I apply this with a brush and it's never cakey. Very transparent yet covers my blemishes well. I don't break out at all with this powder (as I do with many other powders) and it's the best shade I've found for my skin so far. Sometimes I put a liquid foundation underneath when i go to events and my face is flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i found this powder while roaming around sephora because i do need a good one now that it's getting hotter and my already oily skin is acting up. this matches perfectly to my skin and it's incredibly lightweight. i couldn't even feel it on my fingers after swatching it on my face and i love the coverage.

I went into Sephora desperate for a light foundation that would last during the day and during summer. I usually use a BB cream with primer, but at the end of the day it was off my skin. Summer is my skin enemy.  Frustrated, I went in and asked for help. They matched me with this foundation. I was weary, to say the least. I always found that powders made every line and hair (hey, we all have them!) super visible. She put it on me and I was hating it. HATING IT. Then she spritz some UD setting spray...and my face was FLAWLESS. The powdered settled on my skin and it looked amazing.  I bought it and on my way home I was thinking I would probably return it. Well, I haven't. I'm a convert. I get complimented on my skin (my skin, not my makeup) every single day. And no touch ups. At all.  I'm taking away one star because without setting spray, this wouldn't work for me. Also because it says you can use wet, but I haven't figured out how yet. It just gives the powder that dried up film on the top. I find a brush works best.  Also of note, this product is super fragranced. It's powdery and flowery, which I happen to like (it makes me feel like an old timey actress), but if you are averse to scents, you might want to skip it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this in Matte Buff II for years and absolutely love it. I've tried other pressed powders but still come back to this. It doesn't give me a cakey made up look. I usually just moisturize and put this on and I'm good to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lanc√¥me Dual Finish Versatile Powder Makeup is very ultraversatile powder! I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My Lanc√¥me facial power, I use over my foundation to prevent fading so my makeup will last all day. It always works well!

I've tried them all and I can't seperate from this product. I personally like wearing a liquid base first (urban decay) then add this on top. Gives me full coverage and the airbrush look all night long! It's been around all these years for a reason. Everyone's skin is different. I started trying all these other brands and nothing comes close to this powder.
terrible coverage. smells like an old lady. colors are off...immediately returned and will not be purchasing again. wish I could give it zero stars.

This is my absolute must have. I'm a single mom of 4 and I don't have time to put a full face on or a long makeup routine. when I use this Its quick and I get great natural coverage . I get a nice even looking complexion with light to medium coverage it is definitely buildable though. I also love the smell. My mom always used Lanc√¥me and the smell takes me back to childhood, :)

It works as described - and it does work well. Great for shine control touch ups and used wet for a bit more coverage. BUT, something in this product makes me break out and I don't have what you would call sensitive skin. I love that look of this powder but pimples and irritation, I can't seem to avoid. It may be due to the strong fragrance, I'm not sure, but after so many tries, I've finally given this up. Luckily my skin has calmed down since I went back to my original MUF powder. If you don't get a reaction to this product, lucky you!

reviews.review_title: Hands down the best powder foundation in existance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I was in college I decided to try makeup, and not knowing anything about cosmetics I wandered over to the Lancome counter to look at their powders, which I knew my mother and grandmother had used for years. 6 years and many compacts later I'm still using the same Lancome foundation. Although its a powder, it feels creamy, which is great for my dry skin.  I don't wear it on its own but I use it to set all my foundations and tinted moisturizers and it never EVER looks cakey like many other powder foundations. Also, my skin is quite dry but this powder never looks powdery or clings to dry patches.  I'm sad they discontinued the fragrance free version, but I don't mind the scent, which is lovely. I just don't think fragrance is necessary in cosmetics, but that's just me. If you've got dry skin, but prefer a semi-matte finish and are looking for a good setting powder, stop by your local sephora or department store and give this a try. Highly recommended and I will never go without 2 or 3 shades in my makeup stash!
I really like this make up. I have tried many others, but always end up buying this one again. It doesn't make my face feel greasy, on the contrary it makes my skin feel smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the buildable coverage option and range of choices for women of color. I'm unable to give it the 5th star because there's a slight hint of baby powder fragrance... my least fave scent.

Looks natural with a light swipe of the included puff, but can use the included sponge for full coverage, if desired. (I use the puff, and the tap on extra with my finger like you would for a concealer on top of blemishes.) Doesn't dry out skin, and works for my super sensitive rosacea skin. I use the Evian Mineral Water Spray to set, and it lasts through the workday, but is easy to wash off. A classic, for good reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all-time favorite. It goes on smooth and just feels right. It keeps the shine and oils away
Perfect to use after Liquid foundation!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: To be totally honest, I've only used this as a setting powder. It's fair, I suppose, but, but not really any better than anything else I've used. In fact, it doesn't do a fantastic job of setting my foundation. I can see my foundation coming off really easily even after I've used this. It's kind of like using nothing on top of your foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it in shade 550 suede c and it match perfectly with my skin tone. Coverage is buildable sheer to full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it look so nice and soft on skin and it works perfectly on dry skin, buildable coverage and you cant even tell youre wearing makeup. bye bye liquid foundation!

Decent coverage, but I had to use more of it that I wanted. Sephora employee had led me to believe that much less was need for full coverage... I told her that I was looking to minimal makeup without the need for foundation, and I was disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It made my skin look chalky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder. It has a beautiful finish either on top of makeup or all on it's own. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Fabulous coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to go back to exchange for the right shade, but once I matched my shade correctly, I was so happy with this purchase. It covers my redness and makes my skin look smooth, but still natural-looking. LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my current powder foundation. I use it when I do not want to use liquid foundation and I use it to touch up throughout the day. It does not break me out, it doesn't look cakey when I touch up (of course if you apply too much of ANY powder foundation it will look cakey). I always blot my face before I touch up with this and it makes my face look fresh again for the rest of the day.  The reason for the 3 stars is the smell. OH MY. THE SMELL. It smells like a very strong grandma powder foundation. If you do not like that smell, I suggest you run very far away! Also, the smell stays on your face for a good 10-15 minutes. I have to hold my breath when I use it. I don't want to waste this product because it works so well. I probably will finish it up.  Another reason for the 3 stars is that the packaging scratches really easy. I have a lot of deep scratches on mine. Maybe scratches from my lipsticks? I can't think of anything else that could be scratching it because I keep it in a makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought the Makeup forever powder, and while it got the job done with coverage, i was not happy with the ashy look it left on my face. I returned that powder foundation and bought this one and i've never been happier with a makeup powder. This dual finish powder smells like roses BUT doesn't irritate your face with an overbearing fragrance. It a surprising and refreshing experience apply it. And It's finish is velvety smooth and looks phenomenal even after long hours of wear. I would recommend it to any darker toned person, looking for a warm, not-so-ashy finish.

I have a very oily T-zone, I paired this with the Teint Idole in 250 Bisque (W)-the finish was great and the staying power held on for hours with one touch up. Normally I need to touch up every hour, so it was nice not having to cake on powder all day long. I have even used this powder by itself (no water) just to take away the shine, very satisfied. Great coverage & shine control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good for setting foundation and giving your face a matte finish. However, I couldn't get past the strong perfume smell & ended up returning it.. But aside from the smell, the finish was really good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Clinique Almost Powder for many years before discovering this. Will never go back. I use it with Hourglass Immaculate foundation and my skin looks flawless all day long. I have noticed most powders make my foundation look cakey after reapplying at the end of the day but this one doesn't!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This powder truly is amazing. I use it everyday just as a powder foundation, I have used it wet with a beauty blender for a more flawless look, and I have used it lightly over top of liquid foundation to set. Yes it is pricey but it is completely worth it. I use it every day and it usually lasts me half a year or so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder and it matches skin perfectly. It doesn't break my out and I love the finish it leaves. I bought it a few years ago and ran out but never bought it again because of the price. I caved in though because I can't find anything like it cheaper.

I use this powder over my lancome 24 hour for extra coverage that's it. It does an okay job. The smell sometimes do get to me but Im pretty good at ignoring it also Sephora are always out of stock of my color Matte Nu III it's been like forever I love sephora because I hate counters please try to keep items in stock!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This powder has a lovely natural, glowing finish, but I found the perfume too overwhelming and just could not get used to it. The powder also irritated my skin a little. I also found it not to be really great at controlling oil, but I could have worked with it if it wasn't for the scent. It's too bad it has such a strong scent, because otherwise I would have liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this powder at the beginning of January, and now in April, I still have a nice little amount left that should still get me by for awhile, which is important if you're dishing out a bunch of money for one product. It has great coverage that lasts for hours and hours, even on oily skin, and never ends up looking streaky, patchy, or weird. Of course, just make sure to use a quality big brush for application and blend well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the lancome powder and also have the idole 24 hr liquid foundation the powder covers very well without looking heavy or cakey, also it has great saying powers, i applied my lancome powder at 5am and made it home by 6pm stilled looked flawless. I did get a lil oily in my T zone. i would have rated 5 but it has a scent to it, that i had to get use too.lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just absolutely love this product. And it's something I can't even quite put my finger on, but it LOOKS amazing on my skin. I love that it's so versatile - you can apply it wet or dry with a puff or brush, and it gives you a different effect that still looks great. I prefer it applied dry, though.  I'm giving it 4 stars because of the fragrance. When I first started using it, I did find the fragrance very off putting - quite frankly, it smells like an old lady. However, it started to not bother me as I continued to use it, and you can't smell it once it's applied. However, I am still of the mindset that your powder does not need to have a scent...just saying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure why this powder gets such rave reviews. It's just okay. It looks a little too powdery when first applied, yet it has mineral oil in it so your skin gets greasy pretty fast. It is heavily fragranced too, though you can get the fragrance-free version on the Lancome website I believe.  Though there are a range of colors, I have trouble finding a good match for my light skintone. The shades in the 1 range are too light and the 2 range is too deep. Most of the colors are peachy or pink. I can't find one that is a true neutral. Even Matte neutrale (the most neutral) is still peachy on me.  Make Up For Ever's Duo Matte powder foundation is just a million times better than this - much more natural finish, better coverage, better at keeping oil away, and nice colors.

For the longest time I have been looking for a powder that I could use multiple ways. The name of this powder could never be more appropriate with what I've been looking for. This powder is very versatile, just what I wanted! I was looking for a powder that I could use over my foundation and/or as is after moisturizing. I've used this powder both of those times and it has been great! Kept my face matte and looking poreless. The coverage was just exquisite. Didn't look cakey at all. I can't wait to try it on with a wet sponge, I'm sure it'll be just as great. This is now my go to powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the color matte wheat, and I usually match as a NC30. My skin is I usually combination, and this powder never made me oily. The powder has a perfume scent, which goes away upon application. It feels light weighted, and can be buildable for more coverage. I have only used it dry, with a fluffy powder brush. For more coverage, I have used it with a denser brush like a kabuki. I have also applied this lightly over tinted moisturizer. it does give me a matte look, but without making it too dry I which it made my skin itch. I work long hours (10+) and it doesn't need much touch up. I can also wear this powder foundation with primer or none. I highly recommended this, as there are so many uses to it. It also give you a lot of product (19 grams).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a good setting powder as well as something that would work through the day for touchups. I am 47, normal to dry skin and worried that it would be too cakey. It wasn't and works smoothly and quickly to help with hot flash redness and sweaty. The fragrance is quite strong at the beginning but is negligible as it wears. All in all I am pleased with this and with the color match that the Sephora employee helped me with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I apply this powder with a brush rather than with either applicator that comes with it. I love it. Just enough coverage. The scent is strong and some may not like it, but I personally love the scent. I think it's a luxury scent and I can't get enough of it. Using the applicator that comes with it creates too much of a coating of color, so I recommend a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this as a finishing powder and a foundation Lancome has many shades which makes it easy to choose. The compact is a nuce size. Well worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the dual application choice, though I prefer it as a powder. I also am impressed with the coverage and that I still look like me. I find that this powder make up also has a lightly (wonderful) perfumed scent. I cannot recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Could not get along without it.\! Loved it the first time it was applied by a make-up artist! Forever customer.
I love this! This is my second one and it's great. The coverage is awesome and it's good quality. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smelly and powdery, I returned it.

I would've saved a lot of money, if I would've invested in this from the beginning. I love the way it makes face and skin feel! Normally my face will itch or break out from powders or foundation but I haven't experienced either with this and the price was affordable...I LOVE IT! ‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this powder. It really covers well. I have used it for years. It's the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have every so now and then acne and blemishes/scars on my face where it is very visible. I tried a new liquid foundation my friend has recommended me. When I first wore the liquid foundation, I find my skin to look shiny and very tan, so I thought I want to wear both liquid and on top a powder. I am new with make up, so I did my research on Sephora to see which powder foundation has high ratings and read reviews on the cons/pros. I decided to use this for my first powder, and I do not regret my decision at all. The price is a bit pricy but since Lanc√¥me is a high product company, I thought $40. isn't that bad. When you open the product the outside is a beautiful plastic black with the gold near the opening, it looks very classy The product does come with a small flat circle soft sponge material to pick up the powder and a nice big mirror on top to use. I have darker skin than most asians so I got the Matte Wheat II. The product does stay for a long time (I have oily skin especially near my nose). It not only looks great but it smells wonderful too. The powder does not come off too easily when you pick it up which is a great factor, if you are scared the powder will get everywhere. I can't wait to buy more once I use all of mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the product has a great smell but I'm really oily and the oilier my skin got the stronger the smell got. It does have good coverage but I think it would be better as a setting powder because the smell is not as noticeable when applied lightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder compact for 3 years and I'm planning to continue using this powder. I just ordered another one today :) I wear Christian Dior foundation first and put Dual finish after. It goes on light but great coverage.
This a great compact with good, not too heavy coverage. As always with Lancome the smell is really pleasant as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried different things over the years but just recently came back to this as my go-to powder to keep in my purse. It's just the right combination of lightweight and coverage for me that it doesn't feel heavy and make-up-y but gives me great looking skin even without anything else. (Note: I only use it alone - NOT as a finishing powder over foundation, then we enter cake territory!) I also love that I can use it wet for super good coverage when I'm in a hurry.

I have used two of these so far and not planning to stop anytime soon. I actually like the smell of it, and as a 20 year-old don't find it to smell like an old lady as other reviewers have suggested. It can be a bit much when used over a liquid foundation but over just a concealer, it is great. Try a less dense brush for a more natural finish. I love that it can be used in many ways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this lovely powder/foundation after viewing a Lancome ad in Allure Magazine. I was intrigued with the idea of using a powder compact as foundation eliminating the need for regular liquid foundation. I admit I have yet to try using it with a moist puff, but I did simply try it as foundation by using it directly on my moisturized skin. The coverage was excellent, however, at my age (64), I found it accentuated some wrinkles especially near my eyes. So, I need to be careful where I apply it. Now I put some on the apples of my cheeks, nose, jawline, temples. forehead, and the middle of my chin, but avoid my eye region, laugh lines, and marionette lines (boohoo--wish I had a slight facelift to soften the latter two areas.) It looks smooth and silky when I'm done. I also apply it with a very light touch in the same spots when I where my Clinique BB cream when we're going out in the evening. I think it looks great and it lasts all day &/or night without any touchups. I have combination skin with classic T-zone oiliness though in winter it's minor. The color is a perfect match for my fair skin (the lightest one). I'm going to get another one to keep in my purse--Bravo Lancome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: did not like this, i purchased it online and was really put off by the smell its very strong smelling and i don't like the coverage, overall not worth the money and i usually love all lancome products thats all i use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this pressed powder for days when I want to skip the liquid foundation, or days when I need extra coverage in certain areas (like my nose) but it won't replace my translucent powder. It is a little too thick to wear over other makeup in my opinion and I like the smell, just wish it didn't last so long. It's also a bit on the pricey side for a pressed powder.
I love this powder! Beware that the scent is very strong, but it evens out my skin tone and eliminates shine like no other powder. Will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade, lovely coverage, lovely scent. not drying, I like the application sponge it comes with. Just great !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love dual finish. I have been using this for years. It really evens out my skin tone. I apply with a brush for just a touch up or I use the sponge for more coverage. I have dry skin and like that it doesn't dry me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are more than 20 shades to choose from, so finding the right match for your skin is just so easy. It provides a flawless, second-skin finish. Coverage from light to medium/ medium to full can be attained by layering the powder without looking cakey. Upon application, the smell of granny's perfume is assured, though it disappears shortly after. It does not break me out and the staying power is very nice. I really hope Sephora can bring in the fragrance free version for sensitive skin users...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder smells like an old lady. It made me breakout like crazy, terrible. My skin is not breakout prone so I was surprised how badly it made my skin react. I spent my holidays in despair hiding from family photos.

I did use this product before but I didn't like it because I needed more coverage for my acne prone and highly discolored skin. Years later I've stopped wearing foundation on a regular basis and I wear nothing but tinted moisturizer and the Lanc√¥me dual finish as a setting powder. It's not cakey and I love the natural finish it gives me. And did I mention it matches my skin tone perfectly?? Love!

reviews.review_title: Why did I ever stop using this?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why I ever stopped using this powder. I guess just the allure of trying a brand new product. Well, never again!  It has nice build-able coverage, a natural look, and the feel is amazing. I even like the smell. Go and try it. It's amazing. Also,you can use it wet or dry, but I opt for dry. Love it. I'll never leave it again.

reviews.review_title: How did I live without this?!
reviews.review_text: I can't imagine my makeup routine without this powder!! Since switching from my old mineral makeup, my face has looked so much better! I found this powder by getting my color iq done, and I am so glad I did. I have oily skin, and this just makes me look flawless. I found that applying with a brush doesn't give me enough coverage, so I've switched to applying with a triangle sponge and it works great! I wish they had this in a mega size, because I feel like I go through it so quickly!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail foundation. After applying Shiseido Refinishing Makeup Primer, I wait 2-3 min and apply my Lancome Dual Finish Powder Foundation dry with Sephora's Pro Visionary Modeling Foundation Brush (#111). The coverage is buildable and perfect. The scent is light, but sophisticated and elegant. The case is easy to carry and sometimes I apply touch-ups throughout the day under my eyes and at the corner of my eyes.
I have used this powder for years and probably always will. It's awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Depending on the day and how much time I have, I may swipe some of this over a few discolorations on my face or wet it for more coverage. I like that it provides a matte finish.
in love with it..esp its fragrance..:)

I use this as a finishing powder on top of the Teint Idol foundation. It doesn't make my makeup look cakey at all and it lasts all day. At first I was worried about breaking out since it's scented, but I haven't had any issues! I find the scent quite pleasant, but probably not for everyone.

My skin type: dry/normal, redness, very sensitive. This product works wonders! This is my first powder foundation and I was amazed at how beautiful and flawless it made my skin look (I dab it on top of my sunscreen).I wanted something that wasnt heavy and provided a light coverage that was buildable. This powder did everything I was looking for and more. Stayed on all day - received a ton of compliments. Very easy to apply. Beautiful packaging as well.

I have tried other powder makeups but this is thus far thee best out there, at least in my opinion. It's light and it does the job. I find that most days I don't even have to use under eye concealer because my powder makeup helps cover the dark circles. I also love the smell.

reviews.review_title: Works great; strange smell at first...
reviews.review_text: This powder covers very well and the color is great. I did notice a strange smell the first time I used it, it smelt like old lady cheap perfume lol.. but either I got use to it or the smell went away but overall a great product and worth the price. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i love to do matt finished make up. this product perfectly worked with me. but i don't like the strong fragrance of it

reviews.review_title: Was worried about the smell - pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the past four years I used the unscented version of this for extra coverage under my eyes and it's been so good to me after all this time! I'm running low now, so I figured it was time to stock up for the next four years (lol).  I was concerned about getting the scented version, as I have sensitive skin and I don't want to break out because of it. It hasn't been a problem after a week of wear so I'm absolutely thrilled. The scent may be hit or miss for you but I quite like it. : )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for on-the-go coverage! It also smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! I have been using for over 10 years. Feel very light and last all day long.

The powder I previously used got discontinued. This powder was the best alternative I have found. I used for 2 years, but after givenchy brought back their compact foundation, I realized what a mistake those two years were. It does offer great coverage. The smell is little strong at times. The texture did not work for me. I felt like the powder was drying my skin, without absorbing the oil. After wearing it for more than 4-5 hours, I would have a mess on my face. The worst is that this powder is not great for retouch. Every time I would reapply, it would make my face look like is if I wore a mask. Another minus, it feels heavy and tight.

I have been using this powder for over 20 yrs. It's the only powder I'll use for now. I love it, keep it coming Lanc√¥me, this is a great product. It lasts too, and looks so nice over foundation, not too heavy. Would recommend.
I've been using this for 9yrs now. I love it. So Natural. I use it with a damp sponge and it looks so skin like finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: and I feel naked without it. I love the scent of it as well. You can layer it with foundation for a full coverage or use alone.

Your search for a good versatile powder ends here! Looks great whether you apply it wet sponged. Dry sponge. Or with a large brush to set makeup. Awesome powder!! Love it. Matches my skin perfectly, covers as well as a foundation yet looks sheer
This is the most FLAWLESS powder Ii gave ever come across! Will be definitely purchasing again.

This stuff is amazing! It covers redness, looks natural and gives you a camera ready complexion. I agree with other reviews that the smell isn't too pleasant but so what? It makes your face look amazing and that outweighs the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Silky with great coverage. Lightweight and applies beautifully. I got caught without mine and bought Chanel. Not even close. I have just purchased 2 spare, so that won't happen again!! I have used this for years and years and cannot find another better. I usually apply over a foundation, but use alone for a lighter finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well, i just love the scent of these compact make-up most all, and it's natural finish on my face everytime i put it on, though it's really expensive but i will definitely buy another one in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this compact. In the morning when I apply it I use a brush so I can cover my large pores. Later in the day I blot with papers and reapply with the sponge. It's does a wonderful job of covering everything; from acne and acne scars to random redness. It makes your skin look wonderful. I will definitely be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like Lancome blush, I returned this powder. I so wanted to love it, but couldn't take the extreme scent of the product. Why this is so heavily perfumed is beyond me.

This was easy to match to my skin-tone and the formula is powdery smooth but not overly cakey. You can use it as a light dusting powder or you can pack it on. I love it. Threw everything else out, won't go back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's easy to find a perfect color match with this line. I use matte buff II. the only draw back is it's super expensive but it has a lovely consistency and it really does help with my shiny skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and I'm about a MAC NC 25-30. I use this in Matte wheat which is very good for yellow undertones. I really like this powder because it is not too thick and cakey, yet not too sheer. And it doesn't dry my skin out on the dry areas. I use it as a quick coverup when I want to look casual or over regular foundation as a finishing powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best scent of any powder, ever. Takes me back to my youth! Not to mention the near full coverage it provides. Awesome product all around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. It is the best powder I have found, I have tried others, but they have always felt heavier.
Nothing better! Used for 15 years and tried other brands in between and nothing ever compares! Always come back to this..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great colour--used to wear Estee Lauder until they changed their formula, and I despaired of finding another foundation. This one did the trick! It's really light, but buildable. If you need heavy coverage, this is not for you, but it's great for light-medium. Lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've already written a review for this (my HG foundation), but I finally remembered to look at my VIB acct to see how long one compact lasts.  I use it daily, and it lasts 4.5 months. Incredible stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: they make a fragrance free version, you just have to order it directly from lancome. I love this foundation and have no qualms with it other than the fact that it has parabens in it. ive been using this foundation for almost ten years and unfortunately am looking to switch just due to the paraben issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Dual Finish since the day it came out and I love it both wet and dry. It's been my only foundation - through the ages. Every once and a while I'll try a new liquid or cream foundation - and I immediately come back to this. It's just the best for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 12 years. My grandmother used it and on a shopping trip with her she said you need to stop using drugstore foundation, let me get you this! At the time I thought it was cray to spend that much on a powder, but on the first try I fell in love with it! I wear it wet and it gives me the perfect medium to full coverage. Dry it just gives that flawless skin look. It makes my skin look matte and perfect! To the people that complained about the scent.....they do make an unscented version. I for one LOVE the scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This ended up being a little too sheer for my tastes for a dry powder, but it would work well over a liquid foundation for touch ups. I also tried it wet and it eventually dried on my face and left weird thicker patches? I'm sure it's probably me not applying it correctly since it's such a widely loved product, but it seemed great when I put it on wet and then it dried into an uneven surface where I guess some areas had gotten an extra layer that I couldn't see while it was wet. I returned it, but it certainly wasn't awful. I'll stick with my liquid MUFE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't keep this due to the Strong Scent. Please Lancome make your products without fragrance!!! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this to set my 24H foundation, even though its really not a setting powder. For me though, it gives that finished look to my makeup. I do have to apply it - just by dabbing it on lightly - once or twice throughout the day. I have not been using a primer with my make up which would probably help. Also, take note - the matching color to your 24H foundation may be too dark! I'm using a lighter powder than the foundation color and it goes perfectly!

reviews.review_title: Didn't work for me, & contains mineral oil.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first, this is great, easy to apply touch up powder. But, give it 20 minutes, & it's a greasy mess on my oily skin. May work great for people with dry skin, but on oily or combination skin, no way!! Sadly, I returned this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this about 6 years ago but switched to mineral makeup when that became hot. I recently went on an extended trip and didn't want to bring brushes with me, so I bought one of these again. I think I love it more than before and I am wondering why I switched! It is easy to use and provides excellent coverage that can be built up. It's very lightweight so you don't look like you are wearing powder. It's perfect for touchups throughout the day. For oily skin like mine, it's very mattifying (is that a word?). Definitely going to keep buying it.

I've tried a lot of different powder like Bare Minerals, Laura Mercier, and Clinique, but this one beats them all. I really like a natural non-cakey finish and with the Dual Finish it's just what I got. And if I wanted a heavier coverage I added water to make it more of foundation, If you're looking for a natural finish that last all day and doesn't get shiny then this is the product for you. I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matte Rose Clair II. 48 years old. Very good skin. Love this powder. Is light, soft, and i got that natural effect, velvet skin look, and no shine, either cakey. Is a keeper ! Worth the price. I never wear foundation in my life, just powder, since i do not like my face to look like i am wearing a mask or makeup on it. This is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great powder for summer. You can wet the sponge and get full coverage or just use a brush and get medium- sheer coverage. Good for oily skin. Not as long wearing as i would like hence the 4 stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder for over ten years now. Although I still prefer liquid foundation with moisturizer, I always keep this powder ready at hand for when I have only a few minutes to apply my makeup in the morning and running late. It takes only seconds to sweep it over my face and coverage is amazing - even over drk circles under my eyes and over large pores on my nose. This can be used over a good quality facial moisturizer to prevent your skin from drying out- just make sure the moisturizer dries first or you could have streaking of the powder and you also make the powder stick to the powder puff applicator. Love this. Hope Lanc√¥me never stops making it. I won't use any other powder foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best foundation, cover-up ever. I only use it dry, when it gets wet it covers well but gets hard shiny spots on the powder. It is so good, that I have been trying for 25 years to find one I like as much and can't. Now all three of my girls swear by it also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've purchased and repurchased this powder multiple times. Its the best for setting foundation. Makes your skin look flawless too :) Kind of pricey, but well worth it. Also it does last a long time.
