reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for 25 years. One compact will last at least 9 months if not longer. (the older I get. the longer one lasts.) It gives you great coverage and lasts all day even if you have oily skin. I have tried other products to save money and that was such a huge mistake. This is the best there is on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't wear face make up more I could say Eye make up , I bought this a week ago and I am totally in love with the product its just amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Daughter swears by this stuff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. I have not tried the wet version yet as I just use this as a touch up. It feels light and yet still provides good coverage. A must have in my purse now!

This is a lovely finishing powder; soft, smooth and with good coverage. It nicely sets your makeup and controls shine. I don't have much use for it as a foundation either wet or dry. I tried it as a wet foundation, and while it may work for you that way in a pinch, I would not find myself replacing my regular foundation. I do wish Lanc√¥me would include a nicer puff; the included puff doesn't reflect the high quality of Lanc√¥me products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth, full coverage, takes little powder, lasts all day, clean, smooth, no punching, no smearing. well worth the cozt
Love this!!! Have used it for many years!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very, very oily skin in my t-zone (especially my forehead), but I'm more normal on the outer edges and can even be dry if using too harsh of skin care. I've been tempted by countless liquid formulas and could just never get one that made me happy. They caked, slid around, didn't cover redness, or just wore heavily.  This product is terrific because it is buildable in coverage (all the way up to full), lasts all day (12+ hours), does not settle into lines, does not cake, and has a really wide shade range. I'm very fair complected, and I've always had to blend my foundation past my jawline because my neck is so pale. Not anymore! This takes out any redness or ruddiness of my skin, but it still allows my skin to look like skin.  Move over liquid formulas--even Lancome's Teinte Idole. This stuff is awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This incredible compact has been living in my purse for years now and it's not going anywhere! (I was actually introduced to it in high school by a girl who had the most lit-from-within, AMAHHZING - I mean, even for an 18-year-old! - skin). It gives great coverage without getting gunky or clumpy. Lasts all day. Provides a matte, yet velvety texture to skin no matter HOW many times you layer it without ever feeling tight or overdone. I've tried SOOO many other comparable products and none hold a candle to Dual Finish. It lasts a long time and will get you through your busy day looking magically, no-fuss flawless. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this as a powder on top of Teinte Idol foundation for 5 years now and have tried other products bc of their great claims and have never found anything that compares to the coverage, staying power or mattifying of this product. Comfortable yet long lasting, buildable coverage. A must have.

reviews.review_title: One of the best products I ever had!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very sensitive to all types of powder, and powder is only foundation I can use, my skin and healthy look for me, no matter how much it would cost is number one priority, tried different verities of powders, as of now this DUAL FINISH is # 1 best powder I ever used!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has good coverage and it smells nice. I dont remember exactly how long, but it was pretty long wearing.

It's Lanc√¥me, only expect the best. This powder foundation provided light to medium coverage for me, it blended well and covered up all my dark spots. It just really honestly doesn't stay on all day, it wears out super fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is perfect for days that I don't feel like wearing foundation. The coverage evens out my skin tone the best a powder can. It doesn't cause me to break out and they have a good colour selection.

So I used to use this before make up forever. Then I used theirs bcuz it was good for shine control. Since they are discontinuing the powder I preferred and that drove me back into the arms of my Lanc√¥me ! :-). While I do have to use a few more steps for oil control with this, I must say the color looks so natural ! It is a nicely milled powder! I love that they have so many shades ! I love this powder and I prefer powders for coverage. . So I'm very happy I ended up using this again ! :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Powder. I actually feel like it helps my skin the more I use it.
Looks way to powdery, and the smell is horrible, had to wash it off within 15 mins. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally I've found my HG powder!!! This goes on so smoothly. I am very amazed. You get so much product for the amount you pay too. $38 for 0.67oz compared to other brands with little 0.25oz or 0.32oz. This is definitely a good deal and will last you for a long time. I am Asian with medium skin tone and Matte Neutralle II matches me PERFECTLY. It blends in so beautifully you can't even tell that I'm wearing it. Two thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Goes on flawlessly. Covers well!
Not at all drying, nice smooth finish . Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I try other brands periodically. I never use other brands more than once. Whatever it is Lancome is doing by making Dual Finish [unicorn tears? baby lambs breath?] keep doing it. I won't stray any more, I promise....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after I returned the terrible Bare Minerals pressed powder. This one is great, you can apply wet or dry, and it builds coverage. And it doesn't make my skin go crazy. Just what I wanted.

reviews.review_title: Been using this for the last 6 years
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since I started wearing makeup on my face and I love it. I've tried other powders and foundations and they've all caused some kind of breakout on my face. If something isn't broken don't fix it right? Ill stick to this forever if I can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just love this powder. It provides such excellent coverage and leaves my skin tone looking even. It is light enough to not look cakey, but has the coverage to last all day. I use it at work with no foundation or anything beneath it and it lasts me throughout my 12 hour shift. Much love to this.
love the way this product feels on my skin I have sensitive skin an this product didn't irritate my skin or make me break out like the others

I just this powder as a finish to set my foundation and blush, I really enjoy it , it has staying powder for my 10 hour work day and I don't get too oily, a little at my t zone , but that's just a norm for me. Ok the only down side is the fragrance, it smells like old woman perfume. I don't smell it all day, just during application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color matches up really well to my skin tone (Matte Wheat). Doesn't cake or smell funny. Very good product and I've been using now it for years. It has much better coverage than the Makeup Forever pressed powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG!! this is the best powder i have ever used! it never looks cakey it is THE BEST! this is my HOLY GRAIL of powders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Lancome off and on since I was a teenager. I've used this powder off and on as well. I think it is decent. The texture is lightweight and soft. It's buildable sheer-full coverage. It has a good amount of colors to choose from. One of the only few brands that accomadates my extremely fair skin with a pink undertone matte porcelaine I.  Just a note though if your looking for very good coverage you will go through this powder faster than other ones because of it being sheer and buildable. It is a good finishing powder or for touch ups. It will be my last time buying this powder however. I am going to try sephora brand because it's a lot less expensive and I hear good things about it.
Love it. Gives and evan coverage.

I am a huge Lancome fan. I have only bought Lancome for the past 5 years. I decided to give this a try to save some time in the morning. However, I hated this product. It is not full coverage at all. When I tried to apply this with a wet sponge, it made the makeup in the compact gunky. Definitely a disappointment. I had to return it. :(
Great for everyday and it makes me look like I'm not wearing any makeup. It also has a nice scent to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Silky, matte look that smells great. I put it on top of my concealer to finish my look, so I don't look dewy. Makes my skin look soft and silky. :)

I have tried many powder compacts including bareminerals and make up forever, and this powder is definitely one of the best. I don't like wearing foundation so this is good for minimal coverage and is buildable. Definitely a staple in my make up bag. It is scented but I don't really have an issue with it, and I am pretty sensitive to scent. Comes in a variety of colors - Sephora doesn't carry all of the colors so you might want to check on Lancome's website if you dont find your exact match or try a department store.
Have used this product for the past few years and love it. Most days I don't even use foundation, just the powder.

This is my go-to for foundation. It goes on light enough that I don't feel like it clogs my pores, but still provides me all the coverage that I need. Plus it looks great all day and doesn't need to be touched up.

I tried applying this with the sponge sent with it and I tried other brushes but to no avail. It gave me pancake face... This is the exact reason I have stayed away from matte makeup and this is no exception.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GREAT coverage, moisturizing, lasts all day with no touch ups! Occasional pats w/tissue on t-zone, and face looks just powdered all over again! And the Texture is amazing!! It's soft with a velvet feel to it!! I like using my kabuki brush over NARS BB...tried other brands but keep coming back to this. Worth every penny! Did I mention the texture? Love it!!

Dry is ok. Nice match for pink undertones in my case. Wet doesnt provide full coverage in my opinion no matter how many layers.. (i consider coverfx full coverage)but stayed without too much streaking. This powder smells pretty strong..i didnt like it. At any rate, i thought it was about average, no better than bareminerals. I returned it and bought some coverfx..
I am pretty much impressed with this powder makeup..so silky, and smooth. Its not full coverage but its intermediate coverage. So far I live it

My mom, my aunt, and my friends have all used this product and they all seem to love it. I buy it infrequently, but whenever it's in my beauty arsenal, it goes quickly. It has a great smell - I usually don't enjoy scented makeup products, but this has a really light smell. I also like the variety of shades the product comes in. I'm very pale, and usually get the lightest shade, but this time, I opted for the Matte Porcelaine d'Ivoire I (W). This is probably better suited to my skin during the summer instead of the winter, but it does the job if I blend it a little more thoroughly.  I recommend going to the store in person and finding the right match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup is great. Easy and quick to use, versatile, lasts all day, and makes pores disappear! Geat price, too!
Soft, medium coverage, the powder smells nice and applies nicely onto my face.

Amazing color and long lasting finish. It doesn't look or feel cakey at all and blends naturally with skin. It can go on light or heavy depending on how much acne I need to cover up. My favorite makeup product, hands down!
I use it with the teint idole foundation and it's the perfect combination! Flawless coverage. Outlasts all tasks during the day and all night with one application! Well worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 22 years old and have never liked wearing products on my skin other than blush. recently my complexion has been worsening so i figured i have to start covering it up. i don't like stuff that will clog my pores or make my acne worse and definitely not something someone will see. this product goes on naturally so it looks like im not wearing anything at all. it also hasn't made my ance worse. I gave it 4 stars because its not super covering (although ive never tried it wet), but i figured it wouldn't be since i dont want it to be obvious im wearing something. even though it's a tad pricey, ive had mine for over 6 months and its not finishing any time soon. i use a big brush to apply and have occasionally used the one included. i too love the smell and have always trusted lancome with good products for my skin.

reviews.review_title: My Photo Stylist Said This Is the Indispensible 1
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: and iit is.....Plus it seems like you get a lot for your money, it's a big compact......AA++++

reviews.review_title: I love you but I'm not IN love
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder for years. Now that I'm in my early 40's I've noticed a bit of redness and hormonal influences in my face. (Ugh!) The Lancome powder is nice going on but only seems to last about 5 hours and the coverage isn't supreme, even with the wet option. I KNOW there's an abundance of amazing powders out there, so I decided to go into my local Sephora. For $40, I demand amazing coverage at least for 5 hours.  I suggest going into your Sephora and trying this powder because everyone's skin is different. What works for your skin, may not work for mine and so on.  My Sephora consultant recommended Laura Mercier. As soon as she sampled it on my face, I was sold! I felt so weird breaking up with Lancome, but we'll still see each other...as their mascara is amazing.
The best compact I have ever layed hands on... better than MAC, Estee, Clinique, Mercier, Stila, Two Faced, Makeup Forever, etc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm extremely acne prone when it comes to any kind of foundation, and lucky for me, this never caused any problems for my skin. The color matches my tone perfectly, and I love the fact that you can use it for sheer to full coverage depending on your needs.

I have been using Lanc√¥me for about 5 years now and I highly recommend for all skin types. For years I struggled with unpredictable complexion including dry, oily, constant breakouts and pimples and I have tried EVERYTHING on the market. Lanc√¥me is the only makeup that has evened out my skin, amazing coverage without irritation. Worth every penny!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many powders and foundations and never got the desired airbrush look I wanted. I bought this with the Lanc√¥me foundation and I'm in love! I use a primer and the foundation and then apply this powder with my kabuki brush and I instantly have the photoshopped airbrushed look! And the color matches perfect as well! Only down side, I wish it was more oil absorbing.
Love the coverage and it smells great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never really been one for powder, but I love this. It covers blemishes well, without looking too cakey. And the best part is that it wear extremely well. Once it settles on your skin it appears very natural and flawless. I've probably been wearing it everyday for like, 5 months. I really love ittt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne, redness, acne scars, and dark circles, and this powder covers them all! I absolutely love it. I use it dry for better coverage - tried using it wet once but didn't seem like it did anything. It is lightly fragranced, and I don't find the scent offensive at all, but if you're sensitive to perfumes, you might not like that. Also, it's a bit matte, so if you don't use a highlighter, you will definitely end up with a pancake face.
Is the best, i just love it!!
Very good coverage and not caky.
Love this foundation - perfect light coverage and wears well!

I have used this powder for years, the coverage can be light or full depending on if you use it dry or wet. I am of an age that I don't want anything cakey or drying on my skin and this gives me a finished look without being heavy
Love this powder! I have used it for 12 years and counting. I do not wear any base the powder is enough without being too much.
If you fear drying from a powder foundation, there is no drying with this one...and I have dry skin!!! The color is great at nuetralizing the red tones in my skin as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer to use this powder as setting and touch up powder. The coverage is medium-full, buildable but not as good as I expected it to be. Very natural finish, great for everyday use. Highly recommend. :)

reviews.review_title: Never used face make up before
reviews.review_text: I had neve used faces me up before because I neve needed to. During high school I was too scared to try to find a make up that would match my skin tone. Everything was too yellow, a shade off, or it'd leave steaks. This make up is light weight, flawless, and doesn't leave marks. It fits my skin tone amazingly. I'm a yellow-undertoned tan color, from African-American and Danish mixed race. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got mine from Macy's because they carry the Fragrance-Free version, so anyone who loves this but is bothered by the smell can get that instead!
I use my powder everyday. It's light enough to set my liquid foundation and great by itself too. I have it in 2 different colors though for when I don't wear liquid.

I absolutely ADORE Dual-Finish powder! The scent is so pretty as I powder my face after applying liquid foundation. On days when I want a lighter foundation I use it alone over moisturizer. This is the best compact powder I have ever used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It covers, is light, it does the job especially for my delicate skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a setting powder after my foundation and I absolutely love it. It provides that finishing touch, does not show and give off that chalky powdery finish on face. I've tried several other high end brands and this one is my favorite. I do not have oily skin therefore I cannot comment on oil control, however I do have dry skin and apply the powder after my hydrating YSL foundation and it works great. I loooove it. Also, does not cake up on top of my under eye concealer, Lancome as well, which is a majoooor plus. Anything that cakes, does not work with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the whole shootin' match‚Äîfoundation and powder in one with buildable coverage. I've used a variety of these types of products and this one is the best yet. It is not drying or talc-iike and you don't end up wasting a bunch of it as it flies off your brush or pad into the air.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am not too pleased with this compact powder for a few reasons.  I will tell you why I kind of like it first: When I put it on, my skin looks flawless. It smooths out my skin and covers my huge pores really well and my skin looks amazing.  Why I do not like it: Within 10 minutes, my oily shine breaks through this for all skin types powder. It smells HORRID! I do not understand why people think this smells good. It smells like an older, much much older woman. I cannot stand the smell. Last, it is not long wearing, likely due to my oiliness which was not at all controlled by this powder. When I wore it out, people were actually asking me if I was hot because the shine was soooo bad it looked like I was sweating.  I am hoping to return it soon.

The Lancome powder in Matte Amande is perfect for my skin (caucasian, medium tone). It goes on lightly yet covers well and doesn't look cakey and can be used day or night. I use a large brush, not the pad that comes with it.
gives a beautiful smooth coverage without looking heavy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this powder for a while now and this was a repeat purchase. First of all I love that this powder has buildable coverage and is not cacky like other powders can be. It blends easily and just gives my skin a really nice finish, you can wear it alone or over a tinted moisturizer or foundation. Overall, it's a really great product and it lasts for a long time, my other compact lasted over three months and that was with me using it on a daily basis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would definetly recommend the Lancome Dual Finish Versatile Powder Makeup!  I have light-med. skin with warm undertones (about MAC NC 25-30) and use Matte Amande III. I don't like the heavy feel or cakey look foundation sometimes give me, so I like to use this powder instead overtop a little liquid concelaer to set and pressed with a powder puff on problem areas. The possibilities are absolutely endless with this powder - it can be used wet or dry (depending on coverage needs) as a foundation, though I personally prefer using it dry as a good coverage foundation. Truly, the best part is that it doubles as a pressed powder with a MATTE FINISH - so if you tend to get oily it will help to control mid-day shine! It has good staying power and comes in an array of colours to fit your skin tone!  For day to day versatility - be sure to check this out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this makeup for over two years now and I love it. Can be applied three different ways. This is great for me since my skin tends to go from oily to dry on a daily basis. It is also great for days I would rather have a lighter coverage and for those days when I need fuller coverage.
Very dependable product. Buildable coverage. Although I use it as compact primarily over foundation.

I LOVE this product. It's full enough coverage to be used alone, or it can be used as a powder over my regular makeup or just tinted moisturizer. There's a good assortment of colors. Doesn't cake like some other dual finish powder makes ups do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder has good coverage and a great selection of colors. I just get shiny after wearing this. I wish I wouldn't get shiny or this would be my favorite powder. I would still recommend to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loooove this powder and it also smells great! It's not too drying, and if you use a good brush, it's fine enough to create a perfect natural finish, not dry looking. I haven't had much success using it wet, but I still give it 5 stars just as a dry product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using it forever, trying to switch to something else time to time but always coming back to dual finish. It is simply the best!!! Provides the best coverage, goes on easily, lasts long. I have combination skin and the powder works equally well with my dryish and oily areas.

I have been wearing this powder for years, never found anything that compares. I love the finish, makes my skin look like porcelain. I typically wear it over foundation, but it works great alone as well. It doesn't get cakey and sink into any of my fine lines. The color are options are fantastic as well. Some complain about the smell, but there is nothing unusual about it, just regular makeup smell that I don't even notice when wearing, I have smelled much worse. This is a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this foundation right before my senior prom. I loved it then, and one compact probably lasted me a year and a half. My skin can be dry, but I don't feel the need to cover very many blemishes, so I just use this dry over lotion. I can get a super light coverage that lasts all day. I've tried other products in between-- Bare Minerals and the Sephora version of Bare Minerals, and neither worked as well. I also hate all the fall out that you get with loose powder, it's such a waste, so this is a nice alternative.

reviews.review_title: Didn't work so well for me
reviews.review_text: Made my dry skin flaky and didn't help my overall completion.

Very versatile wet or dry. I use it dry and have fine lines around the eye meets the cheeks area and it does not settle in and make them worse like some finishing powders do. The final finish is flawless ! LOVE IT !
love, love, love this powder! this is my second one to purchase, and I will keep purchasing!! Im fair complected and red headed, Porcelain 1 is the perfect shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this powder. I'm really pale, and have pink undertones, and it's very difficult to find powders that are pale enough for me, and aren't also yellow undertoned. The dual finish option is also excellent, though I rarely feel the need to use it wet for a heavier coverage. Its medium coverage is more than adequate to even out my skin color and texture. I know a lot of people don't like the smell of it, and I think this is one of those things you should check out in store first. I like the scent of it. There's something very french and old, not aged, but antique, about the scent. I could see my grandmother using this very same powder, and it not being out of place.

reviews.review_title: Beware those with a sense of smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup smells terrible!! It even burned my eyes the perfume was so strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fantastic coverage (i apply with a face brush after liquid makeup), which lasts a good 8 hours without a touchup. the smell can take some getting used to (very perfumed), but i've bought this 3 times already without plans to stop. great product.

reviews.review_title: I've been wearing this for almost 10 years!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was nineteen when I first worked for Lancome. I've worked for other major cosmetic companies since, but this is the absolutel best product. You can wet if want, but I like full coverage so I wear a foundation and cover with the Dual Finish. Sometimes I even wear Dual Finish without a liquid foundation it's that good. I would recommend this product to anyone, no matter their skin type.
I have used a lot of powders, I love this one. It's milled very fine and nice. It goes on smooth and they have several color selections.
Not great coverage and makes my face oily after two hours. I try to like this but the perfume is overpowering. Don't like it at all

reviews.review_title: All you need in a powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I've tried several powders before and this one seems to have it all - light coverage, doesn't clog your pores, smells amazing. I have combination skin type, so it's good that this powder takes care of oily zones without being too dry on the rest of the skin. It might seem a bit pricey, but trust me, it's worth every penny!
I've used this product for three years and love it! It looks natural and is easy to color match with your complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and makes my skin look and feel amazing. i highly recommend this product (: sometimes i even use it without any concealer or cover up or anything and it works!

I use it as a finishing powder in the morning, but my favorite thing about it is the way it freshens up my afternoon face without looking cake-y or makeup-y. Smells good, too. I've been using this since I was 19 and it doesn't disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just did not like this at all. I can't even explain how weird the finish looked as my setting powder. This did not control oil, and I was oily after 1hr!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this powder because it makes you look done. I feel like it lifts my skin somehow and makes my face look firming. Natural and nice finish.

This works pretty well! It does have a slight scent to it when I put it on. I can't really describe it though. It doesn't smell bad or anything (: but i usually put this on over my foundation and apply it through out the day when I start to look shiny. Or something when I'm not wearing foundation, I put this on and it makes my skin look smooth and even (: however, the first few times I started using it, I broke out a little bit. But I'm not anymore! I guess my skin just needed some time to get used to it? I dunno haha
Great coverage as a powder or foundation. Found my perfect match. Feels silky smooth on my skin.
i have oily skin and usually get 'shiny' fairly quickly. I still do with this, but not as fast. I also like that I can wear this with our without foundation and it looks good either way.
So far the best powder ive ever used!!

I had been using bare minerals for the last 6 years, because I love the light weight feel of the powder...I never had any intentions on switching until I tried Dual Finish by Lanc√¥me. It's light weight feel with extra coverage does not dry out my skin like my previous powder. I'm 36 now and I need all the help I can get! Sephora has wonderful return policy!! Worth trying.. I love it!

I wanted a foundation that matched my skin tone perfectly and this does - as with all other Lancome products, it feels smooth, it goes on effortlessly, does not cage up, and smells luxuriant. It is definitely a keeper.
The daddy of all foundation compacts.

I use this as a dry powder, and the coverage is AWESOME! Really gives me a fresh look. However, the tinting is very strong. Like some products are semi sheer so you can still see your natural features, but this is total coverage.  It melts away in the heat, which is disappointing. My girlfriends are always wiping away the lines.  The smell is SUPER strong perfume scent. And it is right on your face, so you keep smelling it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried numerous powders and find this one to be best as it's got good coverage but looks very natural. I use Hourglass Veil and find that this dusted on top evens out the foundation a little more and gives it a more matte look without looking cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Dual Finish Powder is my favorite makeup product by Lancome! It feels light and fresh, but still provides buildable coverage without looking cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this powder on in the Sephora on Chestnut Street in Philadelphia and it looked great, so I purchased it. I didn't realize that it was scented, though. Maybe the tester was unscented? It looks great and provides nice coverage, but the scent is cloying. It smells like a grandmother's bathroom. On the lancome website they sell both scented and unscented versions, but I can't seem to find the unscented on the Sephora website. If you don't like powdery-smells or scent bothers you, I wouldn't recommend this. I'm going to return it and give the unscented version a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice powder with light to medium coverage. It leaves a natural yet matte finish and can be cakey if too much is applied throughout the day. Therefore I would not recommend using this as a blotting powder. I do have combination skin with an awfully oily t-zone, normal cheeks, and very dry skin around the mouth area. Yes, my skin is a nightmare to deal with. On my oily areas, this powder does not hold up too long, maybe 2-3 hours. It's perfect on my normal cheeks. But the dry areas around my mouth and on my jawline become extremely flaky and with the color of the foundation, the flakes are even more pronounced. I do apply heaps of moisturizer (a very thick and creamy moisturizer I might add) beforehand and my skin is just fine but this powder soaks up any moisture I have there. I do still like this powder, I find using a primer helps a lot. I like the rosy smell. I do not use the puff provided, I use a blush brush for lighter application and more of a natural finish even over foundation to set. I would repurchase.

I wanted this for so long, it feels flawless and is a great product, but doesn't hold up at all, and actually makes my skin feel oily. and I have dry skin, I could just be using it with the wrong foundation or applying it wrong i.e. too much in the wrong areas

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used plenty of brands to say so, in my title. I even tried the more expensive ones but always comes back at this. It gives me just the right coverage I want depending on my mood (from natural look to a party look). I cannot leave my house with this in my purse. When I break out, this is my hero! It's true you can wear it dry, wet, over a foundation, a Bb cream or a tinted moisturizer... just how much you would like it. This is a compact face powder so do not expect for this to work as your concealer. If you don't like the coverage it gives, I'm sure make up is not what you need!

I have NEVER found a powder foundation that works with my skin. First of all, I need decent coverage to hide uneven skin tone. Secondly, I have a VERY oily t-zone, but the rest of my face is rather dry. This product blends in so seamlessly...it was pretty amazing. The coverage is perfect and easy to build on without looking cakey. I have NO complaints, but I do have a warning for people with oily t-zones like me: it does not do well absorbing oil. I had to use some translucent powder over the top to keep the shine at bay. But, all in all, it's worth the extra step.

I love dual finish. i wear a lot of other brands other than lancome. however, dual finish has been my go-to power/foundation for at least half my life. i've tried switching to (supposedly) less clogging brands or mineral make-up, but i always come back to this. it has talc, so i guess some people don't like that, but the coverage is amazing. it's available in scented or unscented. i prefer the nice, light scent. I use it over my lancome foundation for full coverage and i use it alone (dry or wet) for quick coverage to go to the grocery store etc. Hope they never stop making this one, it's my main stay.
As always great powder!!!!! Name says everything!!!!!
I only buy this powder because it is amazing. I wear it dry over a tinted moisturizer and it gives my skin a flawless finish. The best!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used many powder foundations over the years but there is nothing that compares to my Lancome Dual Finish powder. It is medium coverage and can really be used wet or dry. It's light weight and doesn't dry out my already dry skin. One of these usually lasts me for about a year using it maybe 5-6 times per week since I don't need a lot of coverage. Also leaves my face matte but not dry looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i've used this powder for quite a while now, and i've tried different ones throughout as well, and i always come back to this one. it just gives the best results. i love that you can control the coverage with the different sponges, and even applying wet. it really gives you 3 products in one. it leaves a smooth, matte finish, and lasts all day, even running around and sweating for 12 hours (i'm a nurse, and believe me, i put it to the test!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i am baffled by the generally good reviews of this product. pressed powder is the staple of my makeup routine, and this one just fails to deliver. i had to apply 3-4 layers to see any real difference, and it still provided no significant coverage. I never got around to returning it, so I've been using for touch-ups throughout the day, still needing 3-4 layers! Waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used a variety of brands and you can NOT do better than this smoothing,matte producing and pore reducing stuff! You won't need to go anywhere else...BUY THIS! yOU'LL LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product has been my foundation for years! I love it, it really stays troughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: it's really nice! I like the coverage and the finish it gives, very polished looking if not overdone. the only complaint i have is..the smell!! the perfume is so strong and old-lady :( i would have bought a fragrance free version, but they didn't offer one for my shade, Ecru. oh well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since it was first introduced through a 'gift with purchase'. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Even if this was the world's greatest product, I'd never buy it again simply because of its strong, horrible scent. I hate fragranced makeup, and this is very heavily perfumed. It smells like a grandmothers' perfume- not pleasant. The product itself isn't so great either- despite its claims, it does not offer buildable coverage, especially not without caking. Huge letdown from Lancome. Will never buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is good, but the Dior Forever Skin Compact. This Dual Finish just doesn't offer as much coverage for me.
Didnt like this powder, had too much fragrance, and not a really pleasant one.

reviews.review_title: Great for normal to dry skin.. not for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is a great powder foundation that you can get sheer (brush) to medium (sponge) coverage with. the only thing missing for me is spf. it has ingredients that give it a natural finish and keep it from looking too dry and chalky, but the same ingredients wont be good for people with oily skin.

I bought this to use as a finishing powder and to help keep me matte and control oil through out the day. It is smooth and natural looking but it doesn't control oil at all. I applied this about 3 times and I still continued to get oily. I gave up and returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: You know, I kept watching those commercials with Ellen Degeneres and thinking that power foundation would never really work. I was sure that it would never stay on my face all day. I have been so pleasantly surprised. The powder actually stays on much better than the liquid. And it reduces the fine wrinkles. Hooray! And people keep telling me I look beautiful and I am glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really love this powder. It goes on so light but I feel like it makes my skin look so flawless! You can do lighter coverage with a brush or heavier coverage using the sponge it comes with. It does have a bit of a scent when you put it on but I feel like scents in makeup never last after application anyway. Also I have very sensitive skin and have had reactions using bare minerals and other mineral makeups and this compact does not irritate my skin. I tried smashbox halo before this and absolutely loved it, but the price was too steep for me. I'm glad I tried this however, because I think I may like it more than Halo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like this powder--it perfectly builds from light to full coverage, and can serve my needs no matter how bad or beautiful my skin looks that day. It is also lasting me a long time. My only problem with it is that it has a slight smell that reminds me of something my grandma would wear. But it doesn't linger on my skin, as far as I can tell. Otherwise, this is a great product!
I used it for 3-4 times. It lasts long and has great coverage. Love the smell also.
This powder gives a great coverage. I use this as a foundation. It is mattifying and lasts all day. It doesn't clog my pores and smells great!!! It is a definitely my go to powder.
I love this. I only use it dry, but it is natural looking and I just love how Lancome products smell great. Smells like a beautiful flower in spring..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a very oily T-zone. This powder is a good coverage, great smell but mattifies only for two hours. I still did not find a perfect matte powder for my skin. I do not want to say whether I recommend it or not because everybody has different skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually use a makeup setting spray but I use this when I want a matte finish. It has a lovely silky feeling. I recommend applying with a brush and not the applicator that comes with it. I layer it over Lancome's Teint Idole for absolutely flawless looking skin. Beware fragrance sensitive people! It does have a lovely powder fresh scent, which I love but those who have irritable skin should get the fragrance free version on the Lancome's website, I don't think they have it here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: After trying this powder, I am devoted! I have combination skin and this powder makes my skin look flawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like this powder, it gives a perfect finish every time!!! i will so recomand my friends to try this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a really hard time finding a power that works for my fair skin, this seems to do the trick as it is not too red or too yellow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just love this product. Versatile by name and versatile by nature! I use this for day wear where I apply it more softly and for night where I apply it a little heavier and then for functions where I can apply it so that I am photo ready! I product for all day and everyday...perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Have used this product for years and loved it, however, the new compacts have a new style sponge and they are useless. Lancome are trying to cut costs it seems as the sponge is half the thickness it used to be and really not user friendly at all. Very difficult to get a nice smooth look when the skimpy sponge drags and folds in on itself - very disappointed in Lancome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have only used this as a pressed powder. I am happy with the coverage. The color is a little lighter than I have worn for their products.
Excellent product. Great coverage. Natural finish.

reviews.review_title: I always go back to Dual Finish!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder for years on and off. It lasts a long time and has versatile coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i am on my second one!! this really does not cake up and my skin feels sooo silky. i am a lancome believer forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: excellent in every aspect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I hate finding new powders. Luckily I was helped by a wonderful mua. She recommended this powder to me AND matched me perfectly. What I like most about this powder is how natural it looks! I hate when powders look super ashy and I don't have that problem with this at all. I've used it alone and to set my liquid foundation, both look amazing. I apply with powder brush when using it to set foundation.  the only thing I really don't like about this powder is the smell...it smells like an old lady :( my boyfriend said it reminded him of his mom.

I really like this compact. It is buildable coverage with being too heavy. (It smells good too!) When my skin is dry, it doesn't make it worse. I have been looking for a good compact for a long time. I think I will stick with this for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder as my primary cover-up for 6 months now - I will not go back to mineral or liquid foundations again. Just wet the sponge (comes with it) and it provides more coverage. Love it - worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best stuff!! I have been on a quest to find a good powder and have spent a lot of money trying to find the perfect one. This is it!! I think the fragrance is nice and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years and it never fails to give me a flawless finish. I hope they never stop making it! I don't know what I would do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: all I can say is  flawless  powder, and it has a pleasant smell too. this is my third compact of this brand. I find it has the best coverage without feeling pasty, and I have two choices, wet or dry !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best powder ever! Have been using it since I was 15!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a light powder that does its work. If you want a heavier powder with more coverage, this isn't what you want - but if you're looking for a powder to wear on top of liquid foundation, this is perfect. The smell doesn't bother me much as it goes away pretty fast. I wear this on top of Lancome Teint Idole Fresh Water.

I wanted something quick for days when I don't feel like putting in too much effort, and this does the job really well. However, the brief time I played with it wet, I wasn't loving it... will have to try again when I have more time, but for a nice sheer/medium coverage in a hurry, I'm happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I've been using it for over 20 years now. I always use it dry or over liquid foundation. Over liquid foundation, it makes my skin look flawless. I've never been able to get the right look with using the sponge and wetting it. It doesn't settle in my pores like some powder and the matte porcelain delecate is a perfect match for my skin tone, I've never been able to find a better color match in any other product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this powder on a whim because I forgot my usual pressed powder (CHANEL). This powder is 10 times better with a beautiful soft matte finish; not to mention $15 cheaper! I am now in love with Lancome powder,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Have used this product for years. I love that you can use either wet for fuller coverage or as a powder. I have very sensitive skin and can handle this just fine. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this for years, best quality. Workes great on no makeup day just to take out red and shine or has a fininshing touch to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: On days when I don't want to use a foundation all over my face (most days), I use this in the color Rose Claire II on my T-zone. It really covers the thin red capillaries and light brown spots on my nose as well as redness on my chin. I've been using it for at least four years and wouldn't be without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I think I'd buy again. I don't really wear make-up... I just want something light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder for years. It's reliable and does it job. No magic here, but creates a nice, softened look. Have not used it wet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's one of the best Powder Makeup I've ever tried, It is light enough to wear in the day and it covers like no other. It is a little bit pricier than other ones I've had before but worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! It looks natural since I have oily skin, it doesn't make my face look shiny. It's great and I recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Its very weird to find a powder conteining mineral oil among it ingredients but this one does(it is not oil free), I think it is because the oil is necesary forthe powder? foundation option. Yes, you have the option to use it as a powder OR a foundation. To use it as a foundation u have to use it with a wet spponge. Once you do that, the poweder will change it consistence and u will never be able to use it as a powder again. Good luck with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used Lancolm for years and this powder is my daily routine. It beats the liquid for daytime use and covers enough to make my skin look great. The colors are fabulous for every season when your skin gets some color (I go a little darker) and paler.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder is amazing it gives a flawless appearance and I always get compliments on my makeup when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my first time purchasing this product in combination to the Lancome Idole foundation and both work great together so far. i love the smell and how soft it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 5 years now and i can honestly say that I can't leave the house without it on! It leaves your face looking so flawless and I get complements all the time of how great my skin looks (i have acne prone skin). a definite must have to all make up bags!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It is the best powder foundation ever, matches my skin tone and look brightened!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since its inception when it was in a gift-with-purchase bag. I hope they never stop making it; I keep two shades since my skin tone changes with the seasons.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love love loved the coverage, color and feel of this makeup but I'm sensitive to floral smells and this one just made me sneeze while wearing it, so I had to return it. If it weren't for that, though, I'd have given it 5 stars for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the dual finish powder. It has great coverage, and I don't have to use different products. I use it as a dry powder, right after my moisturizer. It doesn't get cakey, or flakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage of this powder makeup. Not heavy - just perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for over 20 years , i use it over a foundtation, its the best !!!
I have used this make-up since its introduction. I use it daily right over my moisterizer for light coverage. Need it heavier- a little water on the sponge- works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I originally went to Sephora to look for the Laura Mercier powder foundation. But I came across this one and decided to give it a try. I love it. I use it as a setting powder over my liquid foundation and I also use it as my foundation. I love it either way. I feel like I have flawless skin with this powder. It's great! A lot of people complain about the fragrance and I thought it would be an issue for me...but I really don't mind the fragrance. It's a fresh powdery scent and as soon as I apply it to my face, I can't smell it anymore. I guess it depends on your sense of smell. I love this powder foundation!! This is my first Lancome product and it has convinced me to shop for their other products! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This make up goes on flawless. Very easy to apply . Does NOT fall in creases .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was looking for an alternative to the messy Bare Minerals foundations. I liked the all day coverage for my oily skin, but the fragrance was so heavy that I had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is for my mom and she said its not bad.. she already bought 3times..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: lightweight, covers blemishes and skin imperfections wonderfully. perfect for everyday wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder makeup since I was in college and I haven't gone a day without it. It minimizes pores, reduces dark circles under the eye, doesn't irritate my very sensitive skin, doesn't clog pores, and is a wonderful product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing foundation, I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is going back to the store. It looks awful & cakey (wet or dry) and the fragrance is soo strong. Too much perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Goes on smooth and adds a flawless finish to your foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder for several years now, and couldn't be happier. It's the best coverage you can get without using foundation. I only use it dry, and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I first apply this powder over my liquid foundation in the mornings, it looks awesome! 2 hours later there is a visible difference from it's original appearance. I wish it would last longer, but it is a good powder to set makeup with. I'm still on the hunt for the perfect one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder! You get so much for the price and it actually smells nice. I use it on top of my Lancome foundation in Buff and it works perfectly. Or I can use it by itself for something light. I haven't used it wet I just use it dry and I get a great coverage from it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder! On top of my Lancome Teint Idole foundation, it gives me such a smooth finish! It also smells really good! It's very lightweight, which is good because I don't like heavy make up. It doesn't cover as much as I would like when used by itself, but still very good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Was skeptical but bought it anyway....I'm in love with this, it smells wonderful! Moisturizing and covers very well! Only use it dry over tinted moisturizer. Definitely will buy another when I run out! Much better than other brands I've tried!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this powder is the perfect finish to the Lancome liquid makeup. It gives an amazing finish, lasts all day long. I get so many compliments. Worth every penny and the compact last forever. A little goes a long way. I do apply with a makeup brush vs. the sponge that it comes with. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i've been using this for a while and i love the feel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The coverage was nice and the powder went on smoothly. I wasn't as impressed when I used this wet, it didn't cover as well as I hoped. I really found the scent offensive, it was like a cheap aerosol perfume from a drugstore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is okay, not great. I recomend this to people with more oily skin type than dry skin type. Good coverage, but can be a little cakey. Good for touch-ups throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love Lancome's Dual Finish Powder Makeup because is has a lovely scent and goes on so very smooth. I only use it dry so I can't comment on it's use while applied wet. I did order a shade too light so and I disposed of the packaging so I can't return it but I do love it's coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Been using this for YEARS!!! Something I can't live without

reviews.review_title: THE BEST! I recommend to everybody!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is insanely great. I have very interesting skin-- some days it's bone dry, other days it is shiny. Sometimes my skin looks so clear I am tempted to wear no makeup, and other days I have a wild break out. I can honestly say I have come back to this powder and have loved it in all of these circumstances for years!!! It is amazing!  It comes with two ways to apply it-- A fluffier, lighter powder puff thing, which I love for the days I just want light coverage to set my skin and avoid shine. Then, it comes with a heartier spongey foam applicator, and this is the one I tend to use more. It allows you to really apply it and achieve the coverage of a foundation.  I am very weary of foundations as I absolutely can't stand cake face or an obvious color difference, but this powder has allowed these issues to almost always be avoided. Even when I lay it on thick (on days I feel pimply or red) people still tell me I have beautiful skin and that I look glowey. They never say, oh your makeup looks good. Instead they tell me my skin looks good! It also is sheer enough that I can wear my dark summer color well into the fall. I do however need to get a lighter color for winter, as my summer color is now just too dark on my paler untanned skin.  Something to keep in mind is that it may be important to try colors on in the store. I am of swedish descent-- I am very fair naturally, but somehow I tan very well and get pretty dark in the summer months. My summer color is matte sable IV, and when I saw this compared to other colors I was shocked-- thinking it was so dark!! But, it works for me, so that is why I recommend trying colors on, as you never know what will look good.  Another thing to keep in mind that this powder does look a little cakey to me initially IF it is applied with a brush! I went in with a friend to get her to try this, and the employee put it on her with a brush. It looked a little too obvious that she had makeup on and not as velvety smooth as this usually does. However, after about 30 minutes it seemed to set in and looked perfect as usual.  VERY HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: the lancome powder works nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had never bought Lancome powder until I purchased this. The gal that helped me at Washington Square Sephora was so helpful asking me exactly what I was looking for in a powder. This is it. I wanted to be able to have light, natural looking coverage, or apply over a freshly moisturized face or foundation and achieve full coverage. This powder does it all. AND, it comes with two foam rounds so I use one for dry coverage (light/natural) and the thicker I store separately and use over moisturizer&foundation. It rocks. All around. Also, she casually mentioned to me that this powder is known as tv powder...apparently it's used on people like Preisdent Obama etc, because it makes you look FLAWLESS!!!! I currently use: Matte Porcelaine d'Ivoire 1--I am a blonde haired, blue eyed, Swede so the coloring is absolutely perfect for me! <3 <3 <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this dual finish powder because it sticks to your skin and doesn't lay on top of it making wrinkles look deeper. I've used it for years and no other product I've found does this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just love this product! Covers great and the smell is wonderful. Ideal for when you don't have enough time to do the whole foundation process. A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for an everyday makeup, this is it. I do not go without makeup, but on weekends, I want to do something quick-this is it. The coverage is good and the feel of the finish is wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I ADORE Lancome's Dual Finish powder- the coverage can be whatever you want from very light finish to foundation with excellent coverage. I also love the pretty scent! This is a favorite of mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: It smells like baby powder. It leaves my skin smoth and soft. My friends ask me what foundation I use because it looks very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Ladies this is the best of the best and don't start your day with out it! I've been usinig Lancome for over 30 years and my skin still looks fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This foundation to powder is fab !  Its light, airy and verstatile. You can use it wet or dry. I prefer dry and the finish is flawless.  Love love love this product...<3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've used this powder as my foundation for over 10 years. I used to wear it alone, now I use concealer where I need it and and put this on over top. It works to take the shine away from your moisturizer so you are left with a matte medium coverage. I always apply this dry and with the round sponge it comes with. I did try it wet but that didn't work for me, it looked unnatural. I also like this product because its easy to apply and doesn't require a lot of time, steps or brushes. It also has good staying power throughout the day.  It comes in a variety of shades so you should be able to find a match (not sure about darker skin tones though-it may be more limiting). I have some of the fairest skin and this is one reason I've stuck with this product as the lightest shades work for me, where as 95% of all other foundations seem unnatural or one shade too dark for my skin tone.  I took one star off because sometimes if your skin is dry or flaky this powder won't look as natural or nice as a foundation. So you just have to be careful of that.  This is probably my most used make-up item and most repurchased as well so for that reason alone I'd recommend trying it out to anyone, esp if you've been eyeing it for a while or just want to try something different then liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Actually, I bought this powder yesterday and only tried it on this morning and I have to say : it makes my skin look perfect! I applied it on top of my foundation and it exceeded my expectations. Because I have incredibly pale skin, I purchased this in Matte Porcelaine D'Ivoire 1.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love evrything about it: great coverage, leaves my skin matte, lasts the whole day, doesn't leave spots on the face. The smell is nice, however at first i had to get used to it. It was too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This has really good coverage for a pressed powder but too many coats and it becomes obvious you have makeup on. It has a really pleasant smell and is really convenient to pop in your purse and apply at work when you're running late. I wish it wasn't so drying... it dries out my skin even with a hydrating moisturizer and primer underneath.
Very natural feel. I have been using this for many years on and off...I always end up going back to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this powder, it smells amazing too. One of the best powder ive own so far. I wish it can be a lil cheaper on the price wise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a superior match to my skin shade and I found it in this product. It takes very little powder to even out my complexion, The powder is also very smooth and seems to just float on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great powder. I use it over my foundation on days I need makeup to last all day or alone for those quick makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I ADORE this wonderful product and have been using it for years! The wet option is nice but I always apply it dry with the puff. From the pretty scent to the smooth coverage and easy application, I love everything about this product. My skin looks beautiful and it serves as a perfect canvas for my blush. Please don't stop making it Lancome!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder is perfect! I either use it over tinted moisturizer (stila illuminating) or by itself, and it gives a perfect matte finish every time. It covers redness really well, and doesn't leave my cheeks all dry and flaky like many other products do. Also, many people mentioned granny smell, but to me it doesn't smell like anything at all; so unless you are ultra sensitive or something then I wouldn't worry about it at all. Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this powder for years - it goes on great and gives my makeup a soft matte effect. I highly recommend it. I have not used it as a foundation, just as a powder over my liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great foundation, I have extremely dry skin and usually do not use a powder at all, but now that I am living in a hotter climate area a powder is needed. I use lotion and then the powder and love the coverage. I have clear skin except for my freckles. It also stays well through-out the day. Which is uncommon for me because of my dry skin and the sweat from the weather. WISH IT HAD SPH THOUGH!!! - hint hint - That is a must have this day and age!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder gives an amazingly beautiful matte finish, and I love that it has versatile coverage, can be used as a setting powder or powder foundation, and can be used wet or dry. I love the smell of this too, and I can smell it all day and smells fresh and puts me in a good mood LOL! The only thing I don't like about this, and the reason I gave it 4 stars, is because it has NO oil control whatsoever, and if you apply it throughout the day it gets really heavy and cakey. I love the finish, but just have to pass on it because I'm super oily and get no oil control, which is very disappointing. Anyone who has normal to dry skin though, this would be perfect for you!

reviews.review_title: Gets my vote for BEST POWDER FOUNDATION
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Ladies, I have tried many high end powder foundations and this is the best one I've found so far in terms of quality and size. For this price, most powders give you .25 oz or less and this compact gives you .67 oz! It gives medium coverage, covers everything from redness to acne marks, evens skintone perfectly and its weightless. It never breaks me out, lasts such a long time and it comes with 2 applicators, a puff and a sponge. I wear the Matte Porcelaine d'Ivoire I shade and its a perfect match. It also comes in a secure and durable compact with a huge mirror. I will absolutely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this powder and have worn it for years. I hate wearing a makeup base and, with this product, I don't have to. Everyone tells me what beautiful skin I have! Gives you a really beautiful finish without much effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product. The coverage is wonderful and I personally do like the smell. The only downside is that it sometimes gives that powdery look. Overall, I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It's a great product. The feel of the powder is silky smooth and went on smooth with a natural finish. As great as this product is, it made me break out. Had it not made me break out I would've continue purchasing it. I have yet to find a powder like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Lancome dual finish powder is really good for my skin. It instantly makes it even and feels great. I use it with the brush, not like foundation, and extremely satisfied. And it smells great, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: this powder feels very light on your face yet covers very well and it smells great too! The only down fall is that touch ups are required half way through the day. I get shiny and the powder settles into some of my facial creases. Over all I would recommend this product for its great coverage and soft matte effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It does have an old lady perfumy smell but the smell does not last long once it is on. I really don't mind how it smells anyway. Its more of a sophisticated old lady smell, if that makes it better. It provides a natural finish, not very heavy. If you need something to hide spots, this isn't the one. If you are looking for light coverage, this is a good product. It does not have that powdery look that drug store brands give. I use liquid foundation and then apply this over it to give me moderate coverage. It will require touch ups in the afternoon as it does not seem to last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Been using it for over 10 years. This has the perfect coverage if put on wet. Covers all of my flaws and doesn't feel or look heavy. I HATE makeup that looks like makeup. This is great if they can match your skin color. -I would love to purchase it from Sephora but they don't have my color :( I even went in and had one of their girls try to match me to one of the colors in stock. But, not perfect like Matte Nu III (my color).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin, and this is the only base makeup that doesn't break me out. The color blends better than any other foundation I've ever used. It is literally a perfect match, and my skin is tough to match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is such a shame... It really applied so well and looked great but I can't stand the smell. I'm usually not super sensitive to the smell of makeup but this just reaks of grandma and I had to return it. It's really sad because it looks gorgeous.
sephora you need to get this product in color MATTE CARAMEL 111 DUAL finish press powder .. i would like to purchase it from sephora and you guys don't have my color please get it in ...!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the texture of this powder, it's very fine so it goes on super natural, it also comes in an array of shadows to compliment any skin color, however I find the scent completely overpowering! I wish it was unscented! I had the compact on my desk and I could smell it all the way across the room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: A little expensive, but worth it. The colors are true and the compact lasts longer than most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I needed a setting powder to use over my liquid foundation throughout the day as a touch up. This one didn't really do the trick. It went on super cakey and made my face a different color. Probably should only be used as a powder foundation. Not one to go over liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I first bought this in the store, where a wonderful clerk helped me dig through countless brands to find a powder that would suit my skin tone and offer a matte finish. I just bought another compact for my purse. I really enjoy this product because it lives up to its brand promise at a reasonable cost. The coverage is just right for the hot climate where I live. I won't wear foundation because the heat and humidity melt it into slime, so a powder that can hold a matte finish is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder provides wonderful coverage when first applied. I have very oily / problematic skin, so even with a primer + finishing powder it tends to slide everywhere and look like an absolute mess only a few hours after applying. Wonderful product overall, but if you have oily skin I would advise you to avoid this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just as the title says...Effacernes in Porcelain has been one of my staples for 10 years so I figured this would be a quick win, but I can't get past that granny smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this and my 20 year old daughter does as well. Truly a dual finish product. She uses it dry,for day and I have used it damp with a sponge for light evening coverage. Not heavy, nice and light either way.

I love that I can just quickly smooth the powder on my face where I need it with the pad and be done. No brushes needed, no extra touch-ups required and no clean up of excess powder on my sink. I'm quite happy with the sheer coverage the dry powder provides so I haven't tried it damp yet. This product makes my face feel clean and fresh. Will continue to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This has been a staple in my makeup bag for over a decade. Although it worked better with my skin when in my 20's, I have found new ways to use it with my drier skin. I always get wonderful compliments on my skin/makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
