reviews.review_text: i like this powder finish because its light and you can wear it alone without foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the one makeup product I have used all my life. Discovered it in my 20's and now at mid 40's I still use it everyday. Smooth application, medium coverage in one step. No liquid foundation needed. I've tried it damp but it was a mistake and not necessary. The finish is perfect straight up. The Porcelaine d'Ivoire has a yellower base to counteract pink undertones. Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes
reviews.review_text: I have used Lancome Dual-Finish in Matte Honey for ten years now, ever since I could wear make-up. I have never been able to find a better powder to replace it. I use it with a sponge for heavy coverage or swirl it up into loose powder with a brush for over foundation. It always has a beautiful finish and blends perfectly with my skin (whether is winter or summer, doesn't matter). I LOVE this product and will use it the rest of my life, so long as its never discontinued.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: It does not dry your skin. Great coverage without caking

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin. This is my all time favorite powder. I have been using it for years. It doesn't clog my pores or feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Bought this powder for my friend. She's been using it for a few years now and doesn't want to use anything else. You can get just a little bit of coverage or get medium to full just by damping the sponge. It looks very natural. And it smells good too:)). It's great, but a bit pricey though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: my title says it all. to me it has an old lady pressed powder scent. yuck. i returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i had to use a kabuki brush to see any kind of coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder! It covers skin very well and hides all imperfections and shine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, I wear Teint Idole Ultra in Ivoire 4N and I wear this in Mate Neutrale II. I havent used it wet before but I put it on over the liquid foundation, or just dry by itsself to use as a light powder or a setting powder. Im oily to the extreme, and this makes my face so much less shiny. I find it does have a scent and smells like my grandmothers older make up, but its never really bothered me, the smell goes away after awhile. This stuff is exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.review_title: If you like cake, you'll love this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Unless your skin is flawless, I would avoid this. Mineral powders are much more forgiving.  I had slightly better results from damp sponging.  Goes on several shades darker and oranger than it appears, and it might make you look flawless, but only from a distance.  It also needs about 10 minutes to settle before it starts looking decent. Eh, I just didn't like it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: It goes on smoothly and stays on all day. Doesn't feel thick and gives a natural look. I am very happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My light skin gets very pale in the winter and I usually have trouble finding products that are light enough -- not this time. I used this as a foundation at first (great coverage), but I was starting to break out a little bit. So now I use a powder brush and dust a light amount over my tinted moistuizer--still looks great and no more break outs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've heard good things about this product in the past and decided to give it a try, and I was very disappointed. I have skin problems and I am prone to oily skin, and this just seemed to worsen the issue. Within an hour or so my face was a greasy oilslick. The smell is also overpowering and tacky. Will be returning for a refund.

reviews.review_title: Can't tell you what I like more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: About this powder, the scent or the performance of this. It's great to set liquid foundations or to wear alone. I love this, it also smells divine!

reviews.review_title: Best Powder make up out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product has always been a winner. Especially good for dry skin where powder may look caked on. This powder is matte finish and pore coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I have very good 58 year-old skin... that being said, I have a few freckles I rather not highlight and some variations in pigment. This light coverage is all I need to smooth on in the morning over my moisturizer and brush on some blush, with a lightener undereyes and a little eye makeup and I'm ready for most daytime accasions with all sorts of compliments. There are many colors too to match your skin with the seasonal impact on it for a bit of a tanned effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this to touch up my makeup during the day. It provides great coverage without going on cakey. It also helps eliminate shine, which I need as I have oily skin. It does have a rather strong fragrance to it, which I kind of like, but sometimes it's a bit overpowering. My boyfriend says it smells like old lady perfume, but I kind of like the smell I guess, although I may try the fragrance -free version of this next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I literally purchased this product earlier today and I really like it! The lady tested my colour match on my skin and I looked flawless. The scent is very nice but it can be an annoyance at some point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I was 18 years old, a Lancome salesperson recommended this product to me. She told me that I should never cover up my freckles, and that this product would provide me with all the coverage I would need to even out my skintone without concealing my freckles. I have been using Dual Finish ever since, even though my needs are no longer as simple as they were back then! I apply this over my moisturizer, and it gives me the perfect amount of coverage. I live in a very humid climate, so I have always shied away from liquid foundations, but I don't think that I'm missing any of the benefits that you can get from liquid foundation. Dual Finish is the one staple in my makeup routine, and it always will be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i ve tried a lot of powders but this one, i have to say, it's the best. it gives a very matte finish and it won't give you a heavy feeling. my skin is oily but never turns oily with this powder on my face. and it is very faithful of how long it lasts. my skin breathes perfectly with it too. it's just the best/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this in Paris and lost it! I bought it again at Sephora Tampa and I love the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you want to make your makeup last longer and get that extra flawless finish, THIS IS IT! :) I put it on right after my lancome teint idole and then this and some blush and voila! Money well spent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Excellent product. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because of a very light parfume smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The product is great for setting your foundation. It doesn't look cakey or dry. It has the perfect matte finish.
It works really well as light coverage, but if you have redness it doesn't really help. But I like it a lot :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for so long I remember paying 19 dollars for it back in the day! :P It gives great coverage with the sponge but I feel I never need to do that. I use the pad and the coverage is lovely, the powder lasts quite a while and there is no scent. Well done Lancome. A classic. I use matte buff II.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried many but alway go back to this product. It has excellent coverage and makes my skin feel flawless without a heavy made up look.
I love the way this looks when initially applied, but the coverage doesn't seem to last very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product because it says you can build coverage with a wet sponge and also use as a podwer dry. the price was so good it seemed like a steal. i need full coverage so i followed the directions exactly on how to apply wet but i didnt get coverage. My cheeks, nose, and chin get red on my fair skin which need the most coverage but even after applying about 8 coats i could still see pink and did not get an even color. it also looked very cakey and does not spread on evenly. After it dried i had some patches of cakey makeup. when i use it as a dry powder with the puffer it makes my face VERY cakey. I cant return it because i used too much of the product trying different ways to get coverage. I read all the great reviews about it saying how natural and easy it is to build coverage, but not in my case. I have naturally dry skin which is why i stay away from powders but i moisturize with two of lancomes moisturizers and i use a good primer so i thought this would work. this has been the only thing from lancome i have been very disappointed with. i guess you get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: It didn't cover as much as I had thought it would, and it didn't do much for my oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I loved this 15 years ago when I worked for Lancome, had gotten away from using it to try new things. Went back to it just for giggle and I love it all over again. Lancome is a very consistant and great skin care and makeup company. Will buy again. In a year when this runs out :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder, it's so great for oily skin! I usually don't like powders but i decided to try this one and now I can't leave the house without it! It also has a nice scent :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years, it gives good coverage, but not too much and it is so easy to apply. LOVE IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used these produscts for years and have gotten many compliments. I use the Dual Finish Powder on a easy day for a quick basic face lightly covering skin color irregularities. It easily matches my skin, and my blush and eyemakeup go over it easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I can't really say there's anything wrong with this powder. I use it everyday and only have to reapply it once or twice (but because of my oily skin, not the product itself). It looks extremely natural and covers up everything that needs to be hidden. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best powders I have tried. It is very natural looking. It does not break me out or dry me out and leaves my skin looking flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used this many years ago....but for some reason starting trying all the newer hipper brands. About 2 years ago I bought this again I wonder why I ever stopped using it. It is by far the best natural looking foundation/powder. Sometimes I use it dry and other times I use it over a light liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this powder for years (probably 12+ years and I'm only 26)! It covers great and lasts a very long time! WORTH THE MONEY!!!!! Try it once and you will be hooked, I promise! I don't use it wet. You can use it wet or dry but if you use it wet it isn't as great. If used as a pressed powder only, I recommend this powder! Great coverage!
Great product, natural looking

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Couldn't live w/o it ! Provides flawless finish alone or w/ liquid base m-up. Great coverage- feels light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it goes on wet or dry. Wet it can be a tad heavy but it still nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: With the large selection of shades to choose from, I was able to get the perfect tone for my skin. I am naturally blonde with very pale skin, which has a pink undertone. I struggle with going too light, as it usually appears ghostly. I chose Matte Clair I, which is perfect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love this powder, it is amazing and so much better than any other pressed powder I have ever used. Worth the money in all aspects!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this powder. I wear it over my bare minerals ( I don't feel like it covers well or for long), and it makes my skin look matte and refreshed while covering. I honestly did not expect to like it this much and was worried about paying so much, but I think it's worth every pennry. I have sensitive skin and thought that Lancome's scented products would break me out, but my skin is looking better than before wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product and recommend it to all skin types. It goes on smooth and lasts all day.
I absolutely love this product, but I don't recommend having it shipped to your door. My powder was broken. It's better to just buy it at the store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Dual Finish by Lancome is a classic product that is perfect! I only use it dry, but have found no other product that offers the finish and wear of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have extremely oily skin and my friend who also has oily skin used this powder. I tried it and fell in love. It's a bit pricey for a student, but totally worth it. It stays matte all day and I never have to touch up. It also reduces my redness, which is always a plus. It's the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Just love the natural look this leaves. Basically a one-step process!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great Product! Good coverage! LOVE Lancome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just had a brand new baby so getting enough sleep was not possible and that caused my face to break out bad. I was using chanel and clinique products but they did not do anything great for my face, i've heard and read great reviews about this powder foundation so i decided to give it a try and let me tell you, it's the best!!! I will not try another brand, it covers everything. Goes great with lancome foundation, try it you will like it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use it in place of foundation and sometimes as a touch-up during the day. It's heavier than a pressed powder, so if that's what you're looking for you love it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Only powder/foundation I will use. It smells nice, goes on evenly and covers fantastically -- I almost never need concealer.  I like to use both the sponge and the puff, so my only complaint is lack of storage for both in the compact.

reviews.review_title: I Keep Coming Back to It!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I use this product in Matt Neutralle II which is perfect for my warm skin tone. They had previously recommended Matt Buff, but it was a little off. This is a more neutral color which really helps even out some redness. Partly, I know that this is one reason I love it so much. (A great product that doesn't match your shade will never look good.)  I've only tried using it wet a few times, and don't really care for it that way. It seems too much gets lost in the sponge, and it has less coverage that way. It stays on best dry over a light moisturizer.  I love this foundation, so I don't know why I keep trying other brands. (Maybe I'm looking for that impossible-in-real-life look the models have.) Every time I try another brand, I either throw some away or use it up then go back to the Lancome.  I've used both the regular and fragrance free, and aside from the scent, they're exactly the same. And the fragrance-free is really completely without any fragrance at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I haven't bought this product for years. I am very happy with how beautiful my skin looks when using this product...it is absolute perfection. I am glad I decided to try this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just bought this product today and couldn't be anymore pleased with the results. I apply the smashbox primer before, then this powder and it gives me a very natural sheer look. I need a very good coverage, and that's exactly what I get. You can also apply after a liquid foundation & not look cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this product looks very natural when it goes on but it also covers blemishes very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and like to add more coverage (after foundation) to make my skin look even. I use a big brush to finish my make-up. Sets make-up, gives me even coverage, and looks finished. I also use during the day to give life back to my foundation and skin. Have used product for decades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Good coverage, very matte. Wish it had more of a bronze finish, seems a bit pasty. Maybe I got the wrong color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using Lancome products for years. I like a full coverage make-up. I use it dry and it covers great without that caked make-up look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: as all euro cosmetics it's very good value ,smell of this powder remind me Europe :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder multi-tasks for personal results. As a powder it helps to set your foundation and has an enduring quality. You can also use as a foundation by applying over moisturizer. Your skin is dewy; fabulous. My daughter loves it, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: A friend, and former Sephora GM, helped me find this powder. I don't wear foundation because I'm too lazy to bother. For the last few years I've been using a Laura Mercier foundation powder and while I liked it, I found the coverage too sheer. Similarly, it didn't last through the day. This Lancome product fixes both of those issues and it's a perfect tone for my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love how well it matches my skin. How soft and natural it makes my face look and feel. And it seems to last longer then most powders do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This press powder is amazing. it leaves your face completely flwaless. covers up all blemishes and gives you a natural look. It stays on all day so you don't need to worry about re-applying. Its wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product and how it makes my face feel soft and the smell. Lancome is the only powder make up that doesn't make my face break out or feel greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I hate powder makeup because it always feels caked on. With this powder though it's so weightless I can apply as much as needed to cover what I need and I still feel like I'm not wearing any makeup and my face looks flawless! I will definitely buy this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this powder for over 15 years. I'm so glad they haven't changed the formula. I have medium toned skin and I use the Matte Linen. The coverage is always even and never cakey and I always use it dry...never wet, even though you can if you want to. And the scent is so wonderful when you open a new compact!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This compact comes with me everyone! By far my best find and lasts all day. Light weight and does not make your skin dry at all. Perfect!

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder foundation for nearly 13 years. It gives me the perfect coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been splurging on this since college. It is excellent coverage and evens out my blotches and hides my pores. I only use a tinted moisturizer under it and that works great. It is worth every penny.

reviews.review_title: The best powder in the world
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: disappointed with the last powder i bought, I went ahead and spurged on this because the best foundation I have ever used is from Lancome. I was BLOWN AWAY! I have never used a powder that has such amazing coverage.  My skin is very fair and every blemish/mark/etc shows up, but with this powder I have been able to just cover any dark/red spots lightly with concealer and just wear powder if I want.  Overall amazing product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: My it powder. I pair this with Lancome's Teint Miracle and, ohmagosh, PERFECT! Beautiful coverage that really makes your skin appear flawless. LOVE this.

reviews.review_title: Matte Bisque and Matt Clair were my shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this twice. I liked it because of the dual finish. It was a sheer/medium coverage, more medium when applied damp. It was nice but ran out quick with daily use.
I never buy same product twice but this one. I keep comig back to this powder. My color, matte finish, full-coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: * This compact powder smells great and is a great fit for my face. With a bit of foundation under the bit of dark spots and under dark circles this powder is great for a flawless finish. * This product is a bit pricey but it is well worth my money because it lasts me about three months and it stays on long and doesn't do any damage to my face like most pore clogging cake looking foundations and powders. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this prodcut for years. So long, I forget how long!!! I have tried others and they just are not up to par. I use it primarily as a dry powder over moisturizer or foundation depending on the day. It is light, silky with great coverage. Nothing like it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that tends to be more on the oily side in the warmer months. I can use this powder year round and it provides great matte coverage. I do not wear any foundation, so this is great for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I bought this in exchange for the Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup. I've always liked Clinique especially how affordable it is but, for some reason, it had a chemical smell that I just can't stand, plus, it felt heavy on my face, too. This one allows for buildable coverage and you won't feel it building up on your skin at all. It has a soft, powdery scent. And it comes with two puffs. One for application as a powder and another for application as a foundation (which I haven't really used yet). It comes with a whole selection of shades, too. Lancome's always been a good product for me, despite the price, since I easily react to others. I highly recommend this powder for those who want more coverage plus the mattefying effect of a powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like it! It's buildable, doesn't seem to break out my sensitive skin, and doesn't change colors over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been searching high and low to find a powder that matches my skiin tone to a T. I've finally found it!! Only problem is, the smell is soooo strong, especially when coming from brands such as Bare Escentuals where everything is fragrence free. I wish Sephora would carry the fragrence free line of this...looks like you can only buy it at Lancome counters/website. It makes my skin so soft and looks almost flawless--WAY better job of covering up my rosacia than any other makeup does. I highly recommend it if you can stand the smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a powder that gives me a good coverage because makeup on my face tend not to last all day. This powder is perfect because it gives good coverage and doesn't make my face shiny. I didn't like the smell at first but now i dont smell it (after a couple usage) Maybe I'm just getting used to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I actually purchased this for my daughter. She has used this foundation/powder for years. She is fair skinned and claims this is the only foundation that truly matches her skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. Very light, no powdery residue. I use it dry (over my daily moisturizer) instead of foundation for the perfect light coverage. Soft matte effect is subtle perfect all year round. The smell is light and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i really dont like the smell, it smells like the soap in a hotel room. and the sponge came with it seems so cheap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: LOVE it! Good coverage and it smells nice! I wish I would have gotten a darker shade, but it is super....

reviews.review_title: Too heavy and don't like the smell
reviews.review_text: I bought this powder after Lancome discontinued their Photogenique. But this powder is much heavier, more like a powder foundation. It just wasn't what I was looking for. Plus it has a strong powder smell, reminds me of old ladies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful product. Very light, no powdery residue. I use it as a powder as I like a light coverage. This is perfect. Coverage is subtle, smell is light and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This foundation powder is great. I have used it off and on ...more on.....and really have not found anything comparable. When I want sheer coverage I apply it dry then buff it down with a cotton ball. All that remains is good looking skin. The nice thing is that I can ramp up the coverage without looking mask like. It travels like a dream. The scent is nostalgic for me but there is a fragrance free one if you like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love it and it smells incredible. My skin is so soft and smooth. Great coverage. Not caky, goes on like a dream.

reviews.review_title: amazing for someone that needs full coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not good for someone with dry skin. VERY good coverage but you can't reapply it more then twice through ought the day or it will get very thick and cakey. You DEFINITELY feel like your wearing make up with this on and with bronzer and blush over it you look VERY finished and matte but be careful when reapplying. you're better off taking your old make up off with a wipe and redoing it from start. DEFINITELY must use a lot of moisturizer under this. I have been using this since I was 17 but as I get older and dont need as much coverage I'm growing out of it. I switch between this and Cliniques double face powder on good skin days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder is okay. The scent is strong for a powder in my opinion. After opening it, it smelled. I'm not a fan of the scent at all. The coverage is sheet and is a nice setting powder, however, it's just OK to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I am a fair-skinned blonde that's just beginning to see hormone/age-induced spots around her upper cheeks. This powder smooths the blemishes/freckles, and looks completely invisible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Used it for years, it's my old stand by...love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff and have been using it since before I could really afford it. I live in a small city where lancome is not sold so thank goodness for sephora. This dual finish has made my skin look better when it was younger and oily and now when it has changed a bit and it takes out redness and covers everything. So worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for many years. Dry, it gives a natural finish. Wet, it gives fuller coverage. For extra coverage, you can apply this over liquid foundation. It's portable and sturdy (i.e. it doesn't get broken up in your purse). Tip: use a moisturizer under it to give it something to stick to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absoutelly love this powder!! I've spent hundreds of dollars trying to find a a press powder that works for my oily skin and this one in fabulous. I will purchase another one once I'm finished with this one. I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was looking for plain translucent powder and this was recommended. It has 3 levels of coverage, looks natural, the color is perfect, it lasts and lasts. What more can I say. I've thrown out all my other foundations and face make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i just currently bought this after a summer vacation. it is great for oily skin as it is very matte. i was told that it had a bad smell, however i thought it smelt good. it also gives a natural finish. i like this powder foundation as a finishing powder instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Pros: Long lasting, keeps oily skin in check, nice satiny finish.  Cons: melted a bit in the heat, smells bad.  I would definitely recommend this especially if you have oily or combo skin, but don't forget to touch in up on hot days. It does have the potential to melt a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: the powder feels a bit on the dry side. Initial application made my skin feel kind of tight, but went away within a few minutes. I have problematic skin, although not severe, it makes my skin look smooth and gives me a porcelain glow. I love that I can use it wet and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: used this in matte wheat for a couple years and then wanted to try something new. Big mistake. I haven't found as blendable a foundation powder as this one. Especially for a Hapa girl(Asian mixed descent) like me who's skin is hard to match. Went back to this one and doubt I will find something better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup! I can use this with a sponge to go on wet for a super matte look, or with the powder puff dry for a great coverage look! This is great for a light feel with good coverage! I love this color also, great for fair skin without making me look so pale! This makes me feel very natural, almost like I am not wearing foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this product as I do not always want to wear foundation. This acts as both a powder and foundation yet it is light enough on the face. I have worn this product for several years and will continue to wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: i love the lancome oscillation powerfoundation, and so when i wanted an on-the-go compact, i thought this would be perfect. and it's okay. the powder smells amazing and goes on easily for great coverage. the mirror is nice and does not get excess powder stuck in it. the sponge is very effectual. i only have to complaints -- it can get a little cakey, so i have to use a tissue afterward to wipe all but the bare minimum off. i'm also kind of pale, and so there's always the danger of products looking too orange. other than that, it's nice and goes on well over concealer. i would recommend it but only as a backup compact for your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup, but i got the wrong color and its way too light. Hard to tell online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Have been using it forever. A very natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over twenty years. I have minor scarring from years of battling adult acne and dark patches from too much sunbathing. This product provides me with coverage that I can't get anywhere else. I would NEVER want to be without my Dual Finish Powder. Lancome is my absolute favorite make-up line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder as my sole foundation now for the last few years. I find that it covers my freckles and light blemishes perfectly, and that I don't need a liquid foundation (thank goodness). It works well over concealer. I have not tried it wet. It goes on smoothly, and feels light all day. I do need touch-ups during the day, as I don't feel it is full coverage. But I love this product. I recently ran out of this product and had to use a back up Laura Mercier liquid foundation for a few days- and then I found out how addicted I actually was to the Lancome Dual Finish! I took a star away due to the scent of the product, and the fact that I have to touch it up several times a day. But otherwise, no other product makes my skin look as great as this does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great for covering up the redness on my cheeks. The color looks very natural (not heavy at all) and does not look too powdery under the sun. My friend recommended this product to me and I would also recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: it looked too cakey and got to oily too fast. Thought id spend the extra money and buy this but i didnt like it at all gave it 2 stars because i love the packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I adore this powder. It is very easy to apply and covers evenly. It gives my skin the perfect matte look that many strive for. I always have the compact in my purse for quick touch ups anytime of the day. Dual Finish is the only powder I'll ever use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the texture, it's not too thick while covers well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Blemishes, spots, acne are all gone once you apply this. It's not heavy or pasty like liquid foundation and ir is not too powdery like powder foundation. Perfect balance of both, all the good things you want from both into one. Definately recomend this.
I use this really just to cover under my eyes and a general dusting all over my face because I dont wear foundation. It really is a very silk feeling formula that is very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: first time I have purchased anything from this Sephora, I am hooked. The service was exceptional and I felt very at home in the store and with the gal that helped me.
1 star for great coverage, 1 star for easy application, 1 star for great finish, 1 star for long wear-ability, and minus 1 star because it breaks me out :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: The title explains everything... This is one of my favorites pressed powders.... I totally love it!:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: The only thing I don't like about this powder is the scent. It lasts for a while. However, it matches my skin tone perfectly, has a fantastic finish, and doesn't feel dry or cakey. I apply it with the sponge, instead of the poof, and it's the perfect coverage for my skin. Will definitely continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This a great powder if you want to look natural. It can be buildable however it looks cakey and very thick if too much is used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love the smell of it, makes me think of my grandma, haha. Great finishing powder, I use it with the airbrush brush from sephora. I use this to offset the orange tint the teinte idole fresh wear makeup gives me and it works! Only 4 stars because in the summer when I sweat, it can get sticky/runny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder make-up. I use it throughout the day as a touch up for my Lancome foundation. My days are very long and I pull it out a few times over the course of the day! I wouldn't leave home without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Feels Great. Nice and Light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the one product that I can't go without! I have wandered to other brands to try out their pressed powders, but I always come back to this one.  The product has a very light, clean, fresh scent. Although I primarily use this dry as a light powder foundation to even out my skin tone and mattify my face, coverage is very buildable (both wet and dry). I do have a few scars and imperfections on my face, and this does a good job of covering them up without drawing attention to these areas. The powder goes on very smooth and looks very natural, especially on normal to oily skin.  In the winter, like any other powder on my dry, winter skin, it does sit on top of my face a bit more and look more noticeable, but this is very easily fixed by applying just after moisturing or applying the powder wet for touch ups. This is not a fault of the product though, it is not drying or irritating to my skin at all!  It seemed expensive to me, but this product is truely fantastic and worth the price (and that says a lot because I have a student budget). With everyday use (and I use this frequently to control shine throughout the day), it lasts me at least a year (though I do tend to buy a fresh one instead of digging into the pan).  I would recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I purchased this on behalf of my mother, who has been using it for years. She loves this product and uses it to finish her makeup in the morning, plus for one or two touch-ups later through the day. It provides sheer to nearly-full coverage and has a soft, pleasant, very light scent. I personally love this product, too, but find it quite a bit out of my price range, and have found another powder that I use. Meanwhile, it's a great product from Lancome, we love it, and will continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love it although I wish it has a really small compact size so I can carry it with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very happy you had this product in I was also looking for other products but they were not in stock. I wish that the stock was a little better every time I come in for something or I see something I would love to have your store is out of it.

reviews.review_title: Nice coverage, especially for the eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder for close to 10 years... I love it. It does especially around my eyes after I put concealer on to set the look. I don't use it wet as I don't want that much coverage. And the scent of a brand new one is fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: By itself as a foundation, I didn't like it much - it was like applying any regular powder directly on my face: drying.  As a finishing powder over foundation (I use original bare minerals), however, I love love love it. It gives my skin a matte and smooth look.  One thing that is misleading about this product is the matte in its name. This product does have mineral oil in it so the powder doesn't do so much controlling of oil (so the matte effect may be more temporary for some) - I'm not sure how oily skinned people feel about this product ..  Otherwise, this product is a must have!
I've been using this product for years and still love the versatility of using it wet or dry. I usually use it dry with a full brush over my face. Nice coverage.

reviews.review_title: loved it, except for the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the way that this powder looked on my skin. It offered good natural looking coverage, and did not make my face look cakey. Like other reviewes have mentioned, the powder does have an odd old lady perfume smell. If you don't mind the scent, it's a good powder to buy. I could not stand the smell--as it lingers for a bit after you apply the powder--and returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I won't tell you how many years I've used this product. You can't beat it for a quick, non-messy, natural coverage. It can be used wet or dry and is very convenient to pack for trips or in your purse. It may not be enough coverage for someone looking to cover skin problems and you have to be careful not to get too generous when applying, or it can look dry and cakey. I like that it adapts well to different moisturizers as you transition from winter to summer moisture needs.I haven't found anything I like better and I've tried 'em all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I liked that this gives a matte finish with good coverage, however none of the colors work for me. I've tried many besides the Matte Neutrale and I give up. The designated warm colors are all sort of peachy rather than golden, so they look unnatural.

reviews.review_title: Lancome- DUAL FINISH - Versatile Powder Makeup
reviews.review_text: This is a great product, providing excellent coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite powder compact at Sephora. Although many people wear it alone, I like it over a liquid foundation. It sets it really well, and gives you a flawless matte finish. It's lightweight, but has great coverage. Not cakey, not drying, it's perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Really good powder. They have every shade you could possibly imagine so it is easy to find a color that suits you. It does have a perfumy smell, but - it goes away pretty fast and then it just doesn't smell like anything. It is a really light powder (in the past I have used Shiseido and it always felt really heavy). The puff is kind of strange but it comes with a sponge to put it on with as well which works well. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this powder!! I use it with the Benefit Cosmetics Some Kind-a Gorgeous. I am 40+ and love the fresh look it gives my skin all day without settling in to my fine lines & wrinkles. Really helps with evening out my skintone. I would recommend this wonderful product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best powders available. It give such nice coverage and yet it's very lightweight. Doesn't cake on, it looks pretty natural. One of my favs for on the go :)

I love that I can bring this with me everywhere I go, and even if I don't have any of my other make-up I can put this on and still feel pretty and cover up the acne scars and discoloration I have. I sometimes use a powder brush to brush this on and then use a concealer brush and it applies more heavily for those darker spots. It never looks dry even if I didn't have moisturizer or primer! Its perfect too for when I want to just look a little cuter when going to the gym or the grocery store!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using Lancome for years. This is one of my favorite products. It gives me full coverage without having to wear any base. I hate having to load on layers of makeup so this product allows you to skip a step.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best pressed powder in the market. My skin is very sensitive and it covers well without breaking me out.

reviews.review_title: like it but not in love with it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i like it because it gives me a soft, natural finish. but i have to apply it several times more than my clinique almost powder. i just use it dry with the sponge because i don't see the difference with how it can give a fuller coverage when applied with a damp sponge.i think it's not as versatile as it promised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wish it was less drying, otherwise it is fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful. Gives great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: My skin is changing now that I'm forty. I have oily and dry parts on my face. Dual finish covers well without leaving a cakey feeling.

reviews.review_title: True to claims, but why the perfumy smell?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have found that this powder is very fine in texture, you don't need a lot for a pretty matte finish with good coverage. Good color choices for the fair skinned. I also really like the sleek black case. It would have been 5 stars if not for the perfume smell. I find it to be too strong and for that reason alone can't buy this again. If you don't mind the smell it is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually never write reviews, but the dual finish is AMAZING. I perspire a lot, so unfortunately for me I cant wear much makeup without melting it off instantly. This is light enough to wear so it won't make you sweat. I tried many products &this helps hide my sensitive easy to sweat skin. Thank you lancome. If I am willing to shell out 32 bucks for something as small as this then it is a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i like the coverage, but I have oily skin so I get 'shiny' after a few hours of wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product has excellent coverage used dry with the sponge. I just add a bit more to my trouble spots and lightly rub in using a circular motion. I've used this product for many years and will continue to do so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a couple of powders in my rotation and I really love this one for a smooth natural look. I LOVE the smell of it, it just reminds me of a classy lady lol. I used this in high school and have returned to it once again. It's like putting velvet on your face. I would definitely go to store and get your color matched because taking the extra time to do that will really ensure a perfect match that will flawlessly blend into your own complexion. I have always loved the fact it came with a puff and a sponge applicator. I don't use foundation with this because it can look like its just too much. It really is a one step process for you face which is great when I'm running late. Definitely one to try if you are shopping for a new powder. Worth the money because the compacts are huge and very little product is needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for 6 years and will continue using it. It makes my skin look smooth, even and radiant and it lasts all day. I use it with puff and Lancome Brush #7 to blend evenly. Really love it.

reviews.review_title: Used it for years and will keep using!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have never been much of a fan of liquid foundation and years ago I was nosing around a Lancome counter and the sales rep mentioned maybe trying it. She helped me with the color. Porcelaine d'Ivoire I has a very slight yellow tinge which offsets my pink complexion. I use it dry and use a large powder brush. It is my daily go to for my foundation. It never feels mask-like and it never dries my skin out either. I have been using it for about 12 years and will stay with it. Go to a store for your color match though. The computer swatches are not easy to use. If you are not a foundation user try this instead. It converted me and makes my skin look wonderful.

reviews.review_title: No longer a walking caked face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: When it comes to pressed powder foundation I am very picky, as my discoloration, combination skin (dry cheeks and oily T-zone) is very picky. The foundation has to cover my discolored cheeks yet doesn't clog my pores. Thus, I had a hard time finding my right foundation until I came across this gem. It seems as if it was created just for my skin. I've been walking around with a fresh and flawless face.  Choose your right shade and it'll give you a natural finish looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I don't need a lot of coverage so I was looking for a powder foundation that would be suitable for that. Applying is can be pretty versatile, and it does double duty as foundation and/or powder. I prefer to use the sponge that comes with it over moisturizer, and it gives a pretty softly matte finish (as it claims), and the coverage is pretty buildable .I carry it with me in my make-up bag as powder for touch ups too!

i was expecting fuller coverage as a powder foundation. it's possible i also chose too light of a color. what i didn't like was the perfume smell of the powder. reminded me of something grandmas wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this powder for decades and people often tell me they think my skin looks flawless. You can use it more as a foundation by using one side of the sponge applicator damp for more coverage, then use the other side of the sponge dry for a powder finish or alone as the foundation for your face. It's NOT pore-clogging at all--the BEST in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder but I've never found it easy to apply with the powder puff or the sponge. If this came with a mini brush applicator it would get 5 stars from me. Coverage is great though, and very soft finish. Does not leave wrinkles or build up too much on a single spot. It smells pretty good too.
What a surprise. Truly wonderful and I've only just used in over moisturizer to even out skin tone and provide a smooth finish. And the salesperson chose the exactly right shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just purchased my third compact. It provides a beautiful finish and the color is perfect for me. The compact is a good size (containing a lot of product) and is worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I went from using Bare Minerals to this because I was trying to find a bit more coverage... I do like it, but if you use too much it can look thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have loved this powder for years; now my daughter is hooked. Wonderful coverage and beautiful shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder, it is great for everyday coverage or use the sponge for more coverage. It leaves my skin looking and feeling great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This goes on and stays well. I use it as a touch-up, rather than as my base in the morning. A little expensive for a touch-up; however worth the expense for the Lancome quality. Very versitle and very handy to have if your day goes longer than expected and you need a professional touch-up. A definite buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i like this when i dont really want much coverage, but it still is a smooth and natural look, i dont like to see my make up on me, i want a natural look and also for it to just give me a bit of overall coverage. this is an excellent coverage and excellent product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to be cheap during the economic crisis & buy from the discount store brands - but nothing compares!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This makeup is wonderful. I have tried many of powders and foundations this is truely the best.It has a flawless cover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: LOVE this powder!! I can use it alone and it gives just enough coverage to hide blemishes and even out my skin but it NOT cakey at all. I will never buy another powder, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over 10 years! I have tried out other a few other powders through out the years, but i keep coming back to this one! There is nothing like it! It gives me full, lasting coverage and must say the smell is divine!!! I love it!!! It's perfect for my oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Its ok as a setting powder.... but if i used too much , or tried it as my foundation i felt liek it looked dirty. i returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product looks lovely over a primer (like Smashbox), liquid foundation (like DiorSkin Forever Extreme), concealer (like Estee Lauder's Double Matte concealer).  The coverage looks nice and smooth.  You do have to blot and reapply touchups as needed if you have oily skin though. Also, I disagree with the advertisement about it being able to be applied wet, when I tried it, it the effect was uneven and cakey.
it is very nice coverage but with very stong fragrance,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Smoth - perfect texture and a clean fragrance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the way this makes my skin feel!it feels like i am not wearing any makeup,nor does it look like it!I have oily skin and this really absorbs it perfectly without making it feel like I have cement on my face!lol!love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Loved Lacome the first time I bought it last april and since then just loved it. =]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Did not like the coverage of this makeup dry or how it settled into my fine lines. I also tried this makeup wet as well since i is advertised to work wet and dry. It was a mess. I will stick to my mineral makeup for the quickest and most natural coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great powder, but sheer coverage. Doesn't work so great when sponging on damp--hard to get even coverage. Fantastic color. Probably best for summertime if using as a foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin that is prone to acne and scarring, especially during stress. For years I have used this product - it helps to minimize breakouts and the scars. I don't even need to use liquid foundation with this powder! It comes in so many shades, and after a few minutes or so I swear the powder changes color to match itself to the different colors on my face. It blends THAT well. The finish is also very natural. THE BEST.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite powder ever, I don't even have to wear foundation with it if I don't want to. I have used this product for a few years and can't ever see myself changing. It's long lasting, good coverage without being heavy very smooth finish.
This product is amazing! Goes on beautifully with a brush, soft natural finish.
Great for that flawless finish. I use alone or over liquid makeup. Lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Can say I've tried mostly all the powders out there and this by far does it all for me! I'm picky about the coverage and this gives the best coverage and i must add the smell is sooooo good! I have oily/acne prone annoying skin.

reviews.review_title: great for my acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product gives good coverage for my bad skin, but you can get it looking cakey if you are not careful. It wore really well all day when I used a primer. It doesn't feel as heavy as other pressed powders I have used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Okay so it may be a tad early to review this, since it's only been day one so far.. But I really like this powder. Their are a few cons that go along with it however, but not enough to give one star off.. since it's sort of unrelated to the actual performance of the powder. I bought it in matte honey, which was the darkest color they had in the store. I have a medium skin tone. PROS: Color blends well, goes on super smooth, leaves a matte finish and controls shine better than ANY powder yet! i never thought it was possible. Skin is left looking near perfect. Coverage is really good for a powder, too. Comes with two different applicators, one for lighter coverage (I have not tried it yet) and another for more coverage (a sponge which I like). CONS: The smell of the powder is pretty strong for the first 30 minutes or so. I've never experienced that, and I really don't care for it. It's not a gross smell, however. Also, I wish the sponge applicator fit in the compact, since that's what I use. It's a little too thick to keep the compact closed. NOTE: I have only used the powder dry, not wet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this powder foundation. I went around the Sephora store, trying all the powder foundations, and found that this and Clinique's version have the softest, smoothest feel and offer the best coverage. (And both actually come in colors pale enough for me.) I got this in Matte Porcelain I, which is described as a warm shade, but I find it to be neutral. My skin is neutral/pink, and it matches perfectly. I don't use it as foundation, but as a setting powder over my foundation, and I don't look cakey or like I'm wearing a mask. And because it's matte, it keeps my oily skin from turning shiny. Beautiful powder, and, like all Lancome products, it smells good, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a great product! I always get compliments when I wear this makeup! It really is versatile too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Best powder I have ever used. It has a silky smooth texture that I don't find in others. It stays on all day- and it does not cake. The color blends really well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The product is good on quality and covers pretty much all skin issues on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love lancome products. Excellent for older skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the last 8 years and absolutely love this powder. It had good coverage but never looks caked on. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i was looking for light and little covered things. and this is exectly what i want. just one thing ,sponge cover is not inside. and its not fit in case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had used this product when I was in my teens and early 20's and absolutely LOVED it, unfortunately as I enter my late 20's it is just not compatible with my skin any longer. About 1 1/2 hours after application my skin looked so greasy and I had to apply another product to give me a more matte look which then looked very caked on... needless to say, I will be returning this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: excellent coverage of all spots, no flawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder:) So good. I've never seen perfect match powder like that for my skin type. This is the best one. After foundation and use this product with powder brush. looks so natual :) I will buy again :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been switching between Lancome Dual Finish and the Photogenic for years now and cannot complain about either. The only bad thing about the Dual Finish is that if you have even a patch of dryness on your face this is going to flake. Great coverage but doesn't look cakey or have the Dirty look to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it!!!! I have been using it for many, many years. Will not use anything else.

reviews.review_title: Great to Control Shine But Not For Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really love this product as it is extremely versatile (you can apply with a fluff for sheer coverage or with a damp sponge for full coverage),controls shine very well and lasts all day. However, it smells as though someone drenched it in your Grandmother's perfume. I'm afraid my skin is just too sensitive for a product with this much fragrance but if you do not have sensitive skin, it works wonders and delivers on everything that is promised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years- I use it dry over 'under -eye' 'concealer and it doesn't cake. I use it all over my face for special occasions and it stays just a bit' dewey' but no 'shiny nose' to ruin a photo, or when I audition for T.V. commercials . ( I modeled in the 70's. 80's and beyond!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using this forever and have no complaints. I love the coverage, the natural finish, and how it can be applied wet/dry. It also comes in SO many colors- I have a shade for spring/fall/winter and another shade for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: excellent coverage. smells great. does not look like powder - very natural. it evens out everything. just perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe the coverage of this powder. It also lasts and lasts. I have big pores and ruddy skin and it covers it so nicely. Will be using this regularly. The smell is nice and fades quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used Dual Finish in the past and decided to try it again. The fragrance was just too much and it was not great for as dry as my skin is. Better for the summer time. The finish is much better with a powder brush for a softer look, but I needed it for my purse and the puff just applied way too much product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: When I apply it (sponge on dry) over only my Smashbox primer, it can cover a bit, but the lasting power is very poor. When I apply it (sponge on dry) over my Missha BB Cream (BB cream is somehow similar to tinted moisturizer), my face looks really matte. Almost all the large dark pots on my face dissappear. The coverage is even better than when I use Smashbox primer with MUFE Panstick foundation. However, at that time, my face looks quite unnatural! The good points are that it goes very smooth and that it does not dry out your skin. Overall, I think it's not worth nearly 40 bucks. Sorry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love this powder. It gives my face a matte finish and a beautiful color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I have really dark under-eye circles, so I use this along with the Lancome concealer, and it makes my skin look wonderful (like I'm not wearing foundation). Other than the under-eye circles, I don't need extreme coverage, but I do need to even my tone a bit and this does the trick.  I cannot go a day without using this (apply it every morning), and I love that I only have to do a touch-up if I plan on going out later in the evening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: My face has become dry, due to aging. I find that the dual finish flows so easly on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Throwing it away... I've used it for a month or two and noticed a trend that on the days I wea rthis make up (I don't wear makeup everyday) I get dozens of new pimples. I've tried cleaning the sponge, replacing the sponge, etc. No luck... my skin looks worse. Funny thing is the coverage is really good so it covers those pimples right up... but regardless, I don't want any more acne than I already have. Also the scent is SO strong... I smell like an old lady. I think there's just too much extra garbage thrown in.;

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the flawless look the dual finish has on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Wow, just wow! This stuff broke me out like there is no tomorrow. I really can't say much about this product because all I remember is I was horrified by the breakout that this caused (almost seemed like an allergic reaction) that I returned it immediately. I do remember that it was buildable, and you could get the coverage you wanted. Also, it was in a cute compact you can take wherever u want. But that's about it. With the breakouts this caused me, it is so not worth it. I rather be without foundation. So disappointing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Wonderful! I absloutely love this product and have been using it for years now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i loveeeeeeeeeeeeeeee this. i use it everyday. i always try new things then end up buying this one again. i love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: great finish and covers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this product is one the best i have tried in my life. this product hide your fine line but it looks natural on your face. you would love it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This makeup smells like nasty perfume. Didn't care for it, returned the product....
I've tried others and this one seems to offer the most coverage without looking cakey.

I have been using dual finish for 17 years. Every time i have decided to try something different i always wind up going to back to dual finish And believe me when i say i have tried everything It gives an even flawless finish and lasts all day.
Love this product. Great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the way this makeup cover all spots and still looks so natural.Some times I forgot I have makeup on! They have done a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this product very much. I first purchased it while on vacation when I had forgotten my powder. I like the fact that it is both a cream-like makeup and a powder. It is not only great to use at home but also when I travel.

reviews.review_title: Loved it for years, still can't be beat
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I always come back to this Lancome favorite. Every once in a while a product comes along that I'll try for a while (most recently Bare Minerals, which is also good), but in the end I always come back to this. I can get any level of coverage I want (brush on for light, use the pad for medium, and use it wet for heavy), plus it smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Always a favorite...clean, soft and perfect. Have been a fan for 6 years and Sephora is the few places I can always find my color!
The best Powder Compact I've used so far. Very easy to apply, natural yet beautiful matt finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this is the best pressed powder ever!! im always running late in the mornings and this is something that i can do in the car on my way to school!! i do not break out alot and if your looking for something that just gives a nice natural look that you can do for those little touch up this is a must have!!! it looks great and i can control how much i really want on my face. i use lancome's uv expert 20 as a moisturizer/sun sceen and it acts as a great base

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm a 74 year old great- grandmother who has been blessed with a great complexion ,which people are always admiring! I don't use any foundation, just a moisturizer and Matte Clair 11 dual finish powder. Not a day goes by that someone doesn't compliment me on my skin! Thi is my secret weapon!

Really like this powder. I've tried others in my quest to find the perfect powder & keep switching back to this one. I love that it can be applied with a brush or sponge. And, when compared to others (like Smashbox) it is very reasonably priced. It was about the same price as Smashbox but had twice as much in the container! And performed about the same too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it! This powder is my go to when I need to look better but don't want to take time for a full make-up. A little moisture, some concealer and Dual Finish. Ta-dah! I also love it over foundation when I want a bit more coverage than loose powder--travels great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Very flattering shade, and also great that you can get the amount of coverage you need--dry or wet application.

reviews.review_title: Lancome Dual Finish Versatile Powder Makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder is very subtle and mattifying. I love Lancome and this is a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love Dual Finish, I wear it everday and I have not found a powder makeup that I like better! It perfects my skin tone and covers blemishs w/out being cakey!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product is easy to use and has flawless coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about 4 years and LOVE it! I like to try different things but I always go back to this product. Flawless skin! I get amazed every morning whem I apply it on my face. I think this is my favotire make up product ever!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Take your time and get the right shade, I had a very helpful sales person who gave me three to choose from based on her assessment of my skin color -- a real time saver. The shade I chose matches perfectly (Lancome does seem to nail it more often than other brands) and I use it daily. As another reviewer mentioned, I also put it over my tinted moisturizer, or just my sunscreen and I feel like I have a flawless canvas to work from. It's a great feeling to start your day without the worry of looking too made up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Great finish, but not enough oil control. My face shined up much faster with this on than with other powders. Not sure why. I really like it otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended Lancome dual finish makeup- she said that she uses it both wet and dry for different levels of coverage (and perfection). I bought it and tried it. I was underwhelmed at first (I tried it both by itself and wet - using the provided sponge). A few weeks later I was out of my normal powder and used this over my foundation as a powder with my own powder brush. I LOVED IT. This product needed some playing around with to understand how it works and to get your own version of what you want. I now use it with a tinted SPF moisturizer and it is the perfect coverage- what the moisturizer lacks in coverage the powder makes up for and doesn't look over done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: LANCOME DUAL FINISH COVERS GREAT AND DOES NOT GET CAKEY..THE COLORS MATCH MY SKIN TONE PERFECTLY AND EVEN OUT MY SKIN TONE
This is an excellent product.....i use it almost everyday..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years. It is the only powder I will use and I have tried many. I can use it dry or damp for full coverage. It's wonderful, covers nicely and doesn't clump into the lines. I would recommend this to anyone wanting sheer coverage without looking old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: My father bought this for my mom and we were on a cruise at the time and i applied this on my moms face and it did very good coverage considering my mom has some spots on her face, anyways i tried it on me and it was amazing. We went to a party and it lasted all night long. Great results!

reviews.review_title: one of my fav must haves
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: i can't leave the house without dual finish. even on my lazy days-dual finish, gloss,mascara, a beautiful scent is something i can't do without!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm the type of person who doesn't like feeling like she is wearing liquid foundation.
