I tend to think that I look too made-up if I'm wearing liquid foundation, especially since my make-up staples are dark lipstick and black eyeliner. That's why I love this Lancome powder. I used to wear loose powder (Clinique) but found that the coverage was too light and didn't last long enough. This powder is very fine and matches the yellow undertones in my Asian skin. Plus it's much easier to carry around for touch-ups than loose powder or foundation. I haven't had the problems expressed by other reviewers like dryness. I've just purchased this product in the summer time so I haven't been using a primer or moisturizer prior to applying. I do use a toner right before, though, so that might explain why I don't have patchy dry areas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have tried every makeup to powder product from every manufacturer that I know of. Lancome has the best by far. It is not to drying, it is not too greasy like others. It gives complete coverage for a flawless finish. I am constantly getting compliments on it. Plus, it comes in many different colors so you always get your perfect match. I highly recommend and I am pick! :)

reviews.review_title: Not enough coverage, doesn't control oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I thought powder foundation is supposed to be good for oily skin and should last much longer than liquid foundation. However my skin becomes oily after 2 hours of applying this foundation and wears off very quickly. It only has a light-medium coverage and doesn't cover my acne scars at all. I bought the Matte Linen which is supposed to be yellow-based but it still looks pink on my face compared to my neck. Lancome foundations (whether liquid or powder) never work for me. I will return it tomorrow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: For the past eight years this has been a staple of my make up wardrobe. I always wear it dry over lotion of foundation to give my face an eveness in tone that never looks cakey. My skin runs dry, but as long as I have on moisturizer, this doesn't make my face look dry.
this powder is the best i have ever used. it blends so well and is very like, doesn't feel or look caked on even when you do have quite a bit on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Perfect to use over a tinted moisturizer. It gives a bit more coverage than regular powder in a natural-looking color. Plus it has a nice fragrance. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This gives a great matte finish without looking inhuman. The shade that I got Matte Porcelaine D'Ivoire I is actually perfect for my skin tone, because it doesn't cancel out my natural blush. It compliments it and covers uneven areas. I really like this product! And you don't need to use much either. Just a few swipes with that plushy applicator and the shine on my forehead disappears. My skin is relatively oily by the way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I'm not a regular foundation user so I really like this product because it is easy to apply and doesn't go on in a massive cloud powder that covers clothing and counter top. This is light and airy and still provides enough coverage to conceal enlarged pores. You can use it damp or dry but I prefer a dry application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: this product is fabulous. goes on great and last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: i have tried so many different powders and keep coming back to this one. there are tons of colors to select from, it gives a nice finish, is buildable, and does not cake. it looks great on my skin and does not give a powdery appearane after application since it just sinks into the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Used with Teint Idole, it provides too much coverage. I felt it was just too much make-up and it looked too heavy. It smears onto clothing and comes off far too easily. Although, it is a good product overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been using their dual finish powder since I was 15. (I used to steal it frpm my mom) It has always worked with my skin and never fails to impress.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used it since college. Every now and then, I have tried more and less expensive products and jhave always come back to Dual Finish. It is the best for combination skin, never drying you out even in the coldest weather. It is also has a natural finish. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I've used this for years and I always buy it when I run out. Nothing is the same!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I could never find the right color for my skin. I am very fair but very pink in my complexion. I bought the Matte Porcelain Delicate I and it was perfect. I recommend going to a Sephora store though if you can because online it looks less pink than some other shades, so it is a little confusing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: You discontinued Rose Clair matte II This color is very grey in tone in comparison. Service poor in check out. Manager was even there and wouldn't help out anyone, just talked, and talked and talked with waving hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder gives amazing coverage and lasts all day. The powder is also very natural looking and holds up to extremely oily skin. This is the perfect start to a beautiful face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love Lancome powder. It goes on great with a fluffy brush and covers make up great. It's not heavy and it doesn't feel like you're wearing anythind at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The best one I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I mostly use this compact for touch up during the day and to set my Renergie foundation. It is a great product and there are so many shades to choose from -- there's a shade for everyone! Lancome products never disappoint me!!

reviews.review_title: Works as well for coverage as a liquid foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This powder works so well for coverage, it could be a foundation. No need for liquid coverage anymore. The one complaint I have is that both sponges do not fit in the compact and as with any compact, you want to keep the sponges off of the powder when not using to keep the facial oils in the sponges out of the powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the absolute best coverage and most versatile powder. It is never greasy or oily looking and it lasts all day. I look like I have perfect skin and I don't, but no one else knows that but me! A little goes a long way and for the price you can't beat it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have a very odd skintone...my body stays tan but my face stays palelish during the year, and i have yellow undertones. its really hard to find powders that dont look pink on my face. I bought a color that didnt work out, and returned it for another color. It was really easy to exchange the two. Anyways, don't pay attention to the colors on the website! they look so different in person. I cant believe the difference of looking at the colors in the store and online. They are totally inaccurate on here.  but, the foundation is wonderful and i can wear it over my lancome liquid foundation or alone. I love it. I wear the matte ecru color..which again, does NOT look like this in person. I recommend going to the store or lancome counter before purchasing online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The only thing that I've ever tried from Lancome was lip gloss and I was very happy with the lip gloss and decided to give the face powder a shot and boy am I happy I did. I first applied this powder on my face going to my mothers birthday party which was a pool party. I got into the pool and got wet neck down, was splashed lightly a few times and it was a hot sweaty day and the make up was still in place PERFECTLY even after the party at 10:00p.m. GOOD PRODUCT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I usually love anything made by Lancome, but I was just not thrilled with this make-up. I found that it just didn't provide the coverage I was looking for. I tried to apply it wet as well, and found that method didn't work too well either. I have found powder foundations that work much better, especially for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have used Dual Finish for years and even though I have tried other powder makeup, I always return to Lancomes! It goes on nicely dry w/the sponge and my skin looks flawless! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Always get this makeup-Tried others and then always come back to Lancome dual finish-its perfect for me. Does not dry out skin, although My skin is normal to oily this makeup sometimes can make my face shine but can be controled with a toner before hand or a serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: This compact is my favorite product of all time. It makes my blemished skin look flawless, without looking made-up. It feels light, yet gives me full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: Light coverage even if you use it wet or dry. I liked it over foundation for a very matte smooth finish. It glides on skin and doesn't settle in lines. It has a perfume smell that I could do without. I have sensitive skin and it didn't break me out.

reviews.review_title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was comparing powders and found this one to be the only one thst doesn't cake up because of my oily skin, the colors look natural, great coversge wet or dry, very reasonable price, pleasant fragrance, does not clog pores or cause breakouts on my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I think this makes an excellent face powder for summer because it gives a med to full coverage without having to wear a liquid under it. I've worn this stuff for years, it's tried and true. Makes my skin look flawless and fresh. Very pretty.

I bought this on a whim and couldnt help but notice the really powerful scent of soap. It gives me a headache. I also noticed that the first 2 ingredients are TALC, and MINERAL OIL. The coverage is good but I'd rather return this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Always used Bare Minerals and I was looking to try something else , big mistake. The smell was so strong. I couldn't stand to smell it on my face all day. Finish was extremely matte and fake looking.
